original: Ṛgveda 10
analyzed: ṛgveda

original: RV_10,001.01a agre bṛhann uṣasām ūrdhvo asthān nirjaganvān tamaso jyotiṣāgāt /
analyzed: agre bṛhan uṣasām ūrdhvaḥ asthāt nirjaganvān tamasaḥ jyotiṣā āgāt

original: RV_10,001.01c agnir bhānunā ruśatā svaṅga ā jāto viśvā sadmāny aprāḥ //
analyzed: agniḥ bhānunā ruśatā su aṅgaḥ ā jātaḥ viśvā sadmāni aprāḥ

original: RV_10,001.02a sa jāto garbho asi rodasyor agne cārur vibhṛta oṣadhīṣu /
analyzed: sa jātaḥ garbhaḥ asi rodasyoḥ agne cāruḥ vibhṛtaḥ oṣadhīṣu

original: RV_10,001.02c citraḥ śiśuḥ pari tamāṃsy aktūn pra mātṛbhyo adhi kanikradad gāḥ //
analyzed: citraḥ śiśuḥ pari tamāṃsi aktūn pra mātṛbhyaḥ adhi kanikradat gāḥ

original: RV_10,001.03a viṣṇur itthā paramam asya vidvāñ jāto bṛhann abhi pāti tṛtīyam /
analyzed: viṣṇuḥ itthā paramam asya vidvān jātaḥ bṛhan abhi pāti tṛtīyam

original: RV_10,001.03c āsā yad asya payo akrata svaṃ sacetaso abhy arcanty atra //
analyzed: āsā yat asya payaḥ akrata svam sacetasaḥ abhī arcanti atra

original: RV_10,001.04a ata u tvā pitubhṛto janitrīr annāvṛdham prati caranty annaiḥ /
analyzed: atas u tvā pitu bhṛtaḥ janitrīḥ annāvṛdham prati caranti annaiḥ

original: RV_10,001.04c tā īm praty eṣi punar anyarūpā asi tvaṃ vikṣu mānuṣīṣu hotā //
analyzed: tāḥ īm prati eṣi punar anya rūpā asi tvam vikṣu mānuṣīṣu hotā

original: RV_10,001.05a hotāraṃ citraratham adhvarasya yajñasya-yajñasya ketuṃ ruśantam /
analyzed: hotāram citra ratham adhvarasya yajñasya yajñasya ketum ruśantam

original: RV_10,001.05c pratyardhiṃ devasya-devasya mahnā śriyā tv agnim atithiṃ janānām //
analyzed: pratyardhim devasya devasya mahnā śriyā tu agnim atithim janānām

original: RV_10,001.06a sa tu vastrāṇy adha peśanāni vasāno agnir nābhā pṛthivyāḥ /
analyzed: sa tu vastrāṇi adha peśanāni vasānaḥ agniḥ nābhā pṛthivyāḥ

original: RV_10,001.06c aruṣo jātaḥ pada iḷāyāḥ purohito rājan yakṣīha devān //
analyzed: aruṣaḥ jātaḥ pade iḷāyāḥ purohitaḥ rājan yakṣi iha devān

original: RV_10,001.07a ā hi dyāvāpṛthivī agna ubhe sadā putro na mātarā tatantha /
analyzed: ā hi dyāvāpṛthivī agne ubhe sadā putraḥ na mātarā tatantha

original: RV_10,001.07c pra yāhy acchośato yaviṣṭhāthā vaha sahasyeha devān //
analyzed: pra yāhi acchā uśataḥ yaviṣṭha athā vaha sahasya iha devān

original: RV_10,002.01a piprīhi devāṃ uśato yaviṣṭha vidvāṃ ṛtūṃr ṛtupate yajeha /
analyzed: piprīhi devān uśataḥ yaviṣṭha vidvān ṛtūṃr ṛtu pate yaja iha

original: RV_10,002.01c ye daivyā ṛtvijas tebhir agne tvaṃ hotṝṇām asy āyajiṣṭhaḥ //
analyzed: ye daivyāḥ ṛtvijaḥ tebhiḥ agne tvam hotṝṇām asi āyajiṣṭhaḥ

original: RV_10,002.02a veṣi hotram uta potraṃ janānām mandhātāsi draviṇodā ṛtāvā /
analyzed: veṣi hotram uta potram janānām mandhātā asi draviṇaḥ dāḥ ṛtāvā

original: RV_10,002.02c svāhā vayaṃ kṛṇavāmā havīṃṣi devo devān yajatv agnir arhan //
analyzed: svāhā vayam kṛṇavāmā havīṃṣi devaḥ devān yajatu agniḥ arhan

original: RV_10,002.03a ā devānām api panthām aganma yac chaknavāma tad anu pravoḷhum /
analyzed: ā devānām api panthām aganma yat śaknavāma tat anu pravoḷhum

original: RV_10,002.03c agnir vidvān sa yajāt sed u hotā so adhvarān sa ṛtūn kalpayāti //
analyzed: agniḥ vidvān sa yajāt sa id u hotā saḥ adhvarān saḥ ṛtūn kalpayāti

original: RV_10,002.04a yad vo vayam pramināma vratāni viduṣāṃ devā aviduṣṭarāsaḥ /
analyzed: yat vaḥ vayam pramināma vratāni viduṣām devāḥ a viduṣṭarāsaḥ

original: RV_10,002.04c agniṣ ṭad viśvam ā pṛṇāti vidvān yebhir devāṃ ṛtubhiḥ kalpayāti //
analyzed: agniḥ tat viśvam ā pṛṇāti vidvān yebhiḥ devān ṛtubhiḥ kalpayāti

original: RV_10,002.05a yat pākatrā manasā dīnadakṣā na yajñasya manvate martyāsaḥ /
analyzed: yat pākatrā manasā dīna dakṣāḥ na yajñasya manvate martyāsaḥ

original: RV_10,002.05c agniṣ ṭad dhotā kratuvid vijānan yajiṣṭho devāṃ ṛtuśo yajāti //
analyzed: agniḥ tat hotā kratu vid vijānan yajiṣṭhaḥ devān ṛtuśas yajāti

original: RV_10,002.06a viśveṣāṃ hy adhvarāṇām anīkaṃ citraṃ ketuṃ janitā tvā jajāna /
analyzed: viśveṣām hi adhvarāṇām anīkam citram ketum janitā tvā jajāna

original: RV_10,002.06c sa ā yajasva nṛvatīr anu kṣā spārhā iṣaḥ kṣumatīr viśvajanyāḥ //
analyzed: saḥ ā yajasva nṛvatīḥ anu kṣā spārhāḥ iṣaḥ kṣumatīḥ viśvajanyāḥ

original: RV_10,002.07a yaṃ tvā dyāvāpṛthivī yaṃ tvāpas tvaṣṭā yaṃ tvā sujanimā jajāna /
analyzed: yam tvā dyāvāpṛthivī yam tvā apaḥ tvaṣṭā yam tvā su janimā jajāna

original: RV_10,002.07c panthām anu pravidvān pitṛyāṇaṃ dyumad agne samidhāno vi bhāhi //
analyzed: panthām anu pravidvān pitṛyāṇam dyumat agne samidhānaḥ vi bhāhi

original: RV_10,003.01a ino rājann aratiḥ samiddho raudro dakṣāya suṣumāṃ adarśi /
analyzed: inaḥ rājan aratiḥ samiddhaḥ raudraḥ dakṣāya suṣumān adarśi

original: RV_10,003.01c cikid vi bhāti bhāsā bṛhatāsiknīm eti ruśatīm apājan //
analyzed: cikit vi bhāti bhāsā bṛhatā asiknīm eti ruśatīm apājan

original: RV_10,003.02a kṛṣṇāṃ yad enīm abhi varpasā bhūj janayan yoṣām bṛhataḥ pitur jām /
analyzed: kṛṣṇām yat enīm abhi varpasā bhūt janayan yoṣām bṛhataḥ pituḥ jām

original: RV_10,003.02c ūrdhvam bhānuṃ sūryasya stabhāyan divo vasubhir aratir vi bhāti //
analyzed: ūrdhvam bhānum sūryasya stabhāyan divaḥ vasubhiḥ aratiḥ vi bhāti

original: RV_10,003.03a bhadro bhadrayā sacamāna āgāt svasāraṃ jāro abhy eti paścāt /
analyzed: bhadraḥ bhadrayā sacamānaḥ āgāt svasāram jāraḥ abhī eti paścāt

original: RV_10,003.03c supraketair dyubhir agnir vitiṣṭhan ruśadbhir varṇair abhi rāmam asthāt //
analyzed: su praketaiḥ dyubhiḥ agniḥ vitiṣṭhan ruśadbhiḥ varṇaiḥ abhi rāmam asthāt

original: RV_10,003.04a asya yāmāso bṛhato na vagnūn indhānā agneḥ sakhyuḥ śivasya /
analyzed: asya yāmāsaḥ bṛhataḥ na vagnūn indhānāḥ agneḥ sakhyuḥ śivasya

original: RV_10,003.04c īḍyasya vṛṣṇo bṛhataḥ svāso bhāmāso yāmann aktavaś cikitre //
analyzed: īḍyasya vṛṣṇaḥ bṛhataḥ svāsaḥ bhāmāsaḥ yāman aktavaḥ cikitre

original: RV_10,003.05a svanā na yasya bhāmāsaḥ pavante rocamānasya bṛhataḥ sudivaḥ /
analyzed: svanāḥ na yasya bhāmāsaḥ pavante rocamānasya bṛhataḥ sudivaḥ

original: RV_10,003.05c jyeṣṭhebhir yas tejiṣṭhaiḥ krīḷumadbhir varṣiṣṭhebhir bhānubhir nakṣati dyām //
analyzed: jyeṣṭhebhiḥ yaḥ tejiṣṭhaiḥ krīḍumadbhiḥ varṣiṣṭhebhiḥ bhānubhiḥ nakṣati dyām

original: RV_10,003.06a asya śuṣmāso dadṛśānapaver jehamānasya svanayan niyudbhiḥ /
analyzed: asya śuṣmāsaḥ dadṛśāna paveḥ jehamānasya svanayan niyudbhiḥ

original: RV_10,003.06c pratnebhir yo ruśadbhir devatamo vi rebhadbhir aratir bhāti vibhvā //
analyzed: pratnebhiḥ yaḥ ruśadbhiḥ devatamaḥ vi rebhadbhiḥ aratiḥ bhāti vibhvā

original: RV_10,003.07a sa ā vakṣi mahi na ā ca satsi divaspṛthivyor aratir yuvatyoḥ /
analyzed: saḥ ā vakṣi mahi naḥ ā ca satsi divaspṛthivyoḥ aratiḥ yuvatyoḥ

original: RV_10,003.07c agniḥ sutukaḥ sutukebhir aśvai rabhasvadbhī rabhasvāṃ eha gamyāḥ //
analyzed: agniḥ su tukaḥ su tukebhiḥ aśvaiḥ rabhasvadbhiḥ rabhasvān ā iha gamyāḥ

original: RV_10,004.01a pra te yakṣi pra ta iyarmi manma bhuvo yathā vandyo no haveṣu /
analyzed: pra te yakṣi pra te iyarmi manma bhuvaḥ yathā vandyaḥ naḥ haveṣu

original: RV_10,004.01c dhanvann iva prapā asi tvam agna iyakṣave pūrave pratna rājan //
analyzed: dhanvan iva prapāḥ asi tvam agne iyakṣave pūrave pratna rājan

original: RV_10,004.02a yaṃ tvā janāso abhi saṃcaranti gāva uṣṇam iva vrajaṃ yaviṣṭha /
analyzed: yam tvā janāsaḥ abhi saṃcaranti gāvaḥ uṣṇam iva vrajam yaviṣṭha

original: RV_10,004.02c dūto devānām asi martyānām antar mahāṃś carasi rocanena //
analyzed: dūtaḥ devānām asi martyānām antar mahān carasi rocanena

original: RV_10,004.03a śiśuṃ na tvā jenyaṃ vardhayantī mātā bibharti sacanasyamānā /
analyzed: śiśum na tvā jenyam vardhayantī mātā bibharti sacanasyamānā

original: RV_10,004.03c dhanor adhi pravatā yāsi haryañ jigīṣase paśur ivāvasṛṣṭaḥ //
analyzed: dhanoḥ adhi pravatā yāsi haryam jigīṣase paśuḥ iva avasṛṣṭaḥ

original: RV_10,004.04a mūrā amūra na vayaṃ cikitvo mahitvam agne tvam aṅga vitse /
analyzed: mūrāḥ amūra na vayam cikitvaḥ mahi tvam agne tvam aṅga vitse

original: RV_10,004.04c śaye vavriś carati jihvayādan rerihyate yuvatiṃ viśpatiḥ san //
analyzed: śaye vavriḥ carati jihvayā adan rerihyate yuvatim viśpatiḥ san

original: RV_10,004.05a kūcij jāyate sanayāsu navyo vane tasthau palito dhūmaketuḥ /
analyzed: kūcid jāyate sanayāsu navyaḥ vane tasthau palitaḥ dhūma ketuḥ

original: RV_10,004.05c asnātāpo vṛṣabho na pra veti sacetaso yam praṇayanta martāḥ //
analyzed: a snāta apaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ na pra veti sacetasaḥ yam praṇayanta martāḥ

original: RV_10,004.06a tanūtyajeva taskarā vanargū raśanābhir daśabhir abhy adhītām /
analyzed: tanūtyajā iva taskarāḥ vanargūḥ raśanābhiḥ daśabhiḥ abhī adhītām

original: RV_10,004.06c iyaṃ te agne navyasī manīṣā yukṣvā rathaṃ na śucayadbhir aṅgaiḥ //
analyzed: iyam te agne navyasī manīṣā yukṣvā ratham na śucayadbhiḥ aṅgaiḥ

original: RV_10,004.07a brahma ca te jātavedo namaś ceyaṃ ca gīḥ sadam id vardhanī bhūt /
analyzed: brahma ca te jātavedaḥ namaḥ ca iyam ca gīḥ sadam id vardhanī bhūt

original: RV_10,004.07c rakṣā ṇo agne tanayāni tokā rakṣota nas tanvo aprayucchan //
analyzed: rakṣa naḥ agne tanayāni tokā rakṣa uta naḥ tanvaḥ aprayucchan

original: RV_10,005.01a ekaḥ samudro dharuṇo rayīṇām asmad dhṛdo bhūrijanmā vi caṣṭe /
analyzed: ekaḥ samudraḥ dharuṇaḥ rayīṇām asmat dhṛdaḥ bhūri janmā vi caṣṭe

original: RV_10,005.01c siṣakty ūdhar niṇyor upastha utsasya madhye nihitam padaṃ veḥ //
analyzed: siṣakti ūdhar niṇyoḥ upasthe utsasya madhye nihitam padam veḥ

original: RV_10,005.02a samānaṃ nīḷaṃ vṛṣaṇo vasānāḥ saṃ jagmire mahiṣā arvatībhiḥ /
analyzed: samānam nīḍam vṛṣaṇaḥ vasānāḥ sam jagmire mahiṣāḥ arvatībhiḥ

original: RV_10,005.02c ṛtasya padaṃ kavayo ni pānti guhā nāmāni dadhire parāṇi //
analyzed: ṛtasya padam kavayaḥ ni pānti guhā nāmāni dadhire parāṇi

original: RV_10,005.03a ṛtāyinī māyinī saṃ dadhāte mitvā śiśuṃ jajñatur vardhayantī /
analyzed: ṛtāyinī māyinī sam dadhāte mitvā śiśum jajñatuḥ vardhayantī

original: RV_10,005.03c viśvasya nābhiṃ carato dhruvasya kaveś cit tantum manasā viyantaḥ //
analyzed: viśvasya nābhim carataḥ dhruvasya kaveḥ cit tantum manasā viyantaḥ

original: RV_10,005.04a ṛtasya hi vartanayaḥ sujātam iṣo vājāya pradivaḥ sacante /
analyzed: ṛtasya hi vartanayaḥ su jātam iṣaḥ vājāya pradivaḥ sacante

original: RV_10,005.04c adhīvāsaṃ rodasī vāvasāne ghṛtair annair vāvṛdhāte madhūnām //
analyzed: adhīvāsam rodasī vāvasāne ghṛtaiḥ annaiḥ vāvṛdhāte madhūnām

original: RV_10,005.05a sapta svasṝr aruṣīr vāvaśāno vidvān madhva uj jabhārā dṛśe kam /
analyzed: sapta svasṝḥ aruṣīḥ vāvaśānaḥ vidvān madhvaḥ ud jabhārā dṛśe kam

original: RV_10,005.05c antar yeme antarikṣe purājā icchan vavrim avidat pūṣaṇasya //
analyzed: antar yeme antarikṣe purājāḥ icchan vavrim avidat pūṣaṇasya

original: RV_10,005.06a sapta maryādāḥ kavayas tatakṣus tāsām ekām id abhy aṃhuro gāt /
analyzed: sapta maryādāḥ kavayaḥ tatakṣuḥ tāsām ekām id abhī aṃhuraḥ gāt

original: RV_10,005.06c āyor ha skambha upamasya nīḷe pathāṃ visarge dharuṇeṣu tasthau //
analyzed: āyoḥ ha skambhaḥ upamasya nīḍe pathām visarge dharuṇeṣu tasthau

original: RV_10,005.07a asac ca sac ca parame vyoman dakṣasya janmann aditer upasthe /
analyzed: asat ca sat ca parame vyoman dakṣasya janman aditeḥ upasthe

original: RV_10,005.07c agnir ha naḥ prathamajā ṛtasya pūrva āyuni vṛṣabhaś ca dhenuḥ //
analyzed: agniḥ ha naḥ prathama jāḥ ṛtasya pūrve āyuni vṛṣabhaḥ ca dhenuḥ

original: RV_10,006.01a ayaṃ sa yasya śarmann avobhir agner edhate jaritābhiṣṭau /
analyzed: ayam sa yasya śarman avobhiḥ agneḥ edhate jaritā abhiṣṭau

original: RV_10,006.01c jyeṣṭhebhir yo bhānubhir ṛṣūṇām paryeti parivīto vibhāvā //
analyzed: jyeṣṭhebhiḥ yaḥ bhānubhiḥ ṛṣūṇām paryeti parivītaḥ vibhāvā

original: RV_10,006.02a yo bhānubhir vibhāvā vibhāty agnir devebhir ṛtāvājasraḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ bhānubhiḥ vibhāvā vibhāti agniḥ devebhiḥ ṛtāvā ajasraḥ

original: RV_10,006.02c ā yo vivāya sakhyā sakhibhyo 'parihvṛto atyo na saptiḥ //
analyzed: ā yaḥ vivāya sakhyā sakhibhyaḥ parihvṛtaḥ atyaḥ na saptiḥ

original: RV_10,006.03a īśe yo viśvasyā devavīter īśe viśvāyur uṣaso vyuṣṭau /
analyzed: īśe yaḥ viśvasyāḥ deva vīteḥ īśe viśvāyuḥ uṣasaḥ vyuṣṭau

original: RV_10,006.03c ā yasmin manā havīṃṣy agnāv ariṣṭaratha skabhnāti śūṣaiḥ //
analyzed: ā yasmin manā havīṃṣi agnau ariṣṭa ratha skabhnāti śūṣaiḥ

original: RV_10,006.04a śūṣebhir vṛdho juṣāṇo arkair devāṃ acchā raghupatvā jigāti /
analyzed: śūṣebhiḥ vṛdhaḥ juṣāṇaḥ arkaiḥ devān acchā raghu patvā jigāti

original: RV_10,006.04c mandro hotā sa juhvā yajiṣṭhaḥ sammiślo agnir ā jigharti devān //
analyzed: mandraḥ hotā sa juhvā yajiṣṭhaḥ sammiślaḥ agniḥ ā jigharti devān

original: RV_10,006.05a tam usrām indraṃ na rejamānam agniṃ gīrbhir namobhir ā kṛṇudhvam /
analyzed: tam usrām indram na rejamānam agnim gīrbhiḥ namobhiḥ ā kṛṇudhvam

original: RV_10,006.05c ā yaṃ viprāso matibhir gṛṇanti jātavedasaṃ juhvaṃ sahānām //
analyzed: ā yam viprāsaḥ matibhiḥ gṛṇanti jātavedasam juhvam sahānām

original: RV_10,006.06a saṃ yasmin viśvā vasūni jagmur vāje nāśvāḥ saptīvanta evaiḥ /
analyzed: sam yasmin viśvā vasūni jagmuḥ vāje na aśvāḥ saptīvantaḥ evaiḥ

original: RV_10,006.06c asme ūtīr indravātatamā arvācīnā agna ā kṛṇuṣva //
analyzed: asme ūtīḥ indra vātatamāḥ arvācīnāḥ agne ā kṛṇuṣva

original: RV_10,006.07a adhā hy agne mahnā niṣadyā sadyo jajñāno havyo babhūtha /
analyzed: adhā hi agne mahnā niṣadyā sadyas jajñānaḥ havyaḥ babhūtha

original: RV_10,006.07c taṃ te devāso anu ketam āyann adhāvardhanta prathamāsa ūmāḥ //
analyzed: tam te devāsaḥ anu ketam āyan adha avardhanta prathamāsaḥ ūmāḥ

original: RV_10,007.01a svasti no divo agne pṛthivyā viśvāyur dhehi yajathāya deva /
analyzed: svasti naḥ divaḥ agne pṛthivyāḥ viśvāyuḥ dhehi yajathāya deva

original: RV_10,007.01c sacemahi tava dasma praketair uruṣyā ṇa urubhir deva śaṃsaiḥ //
analyzed: sacemahi tava dasma praketaiḥ uruṣya naḥ urubhiḥ deva śaṃsaiḥ

original: RV_10,007.02a imā agne matayas tubhyaṃ jātā gobhir aśvair abhi gṛṇanti rādhaḥ /
analyzed: imāḥ agne matayaḥ tubhyam jātāḥ gobhiḥ aśvaiḥ abhi gṛṇanti rādhaḥ

original: RV_10,007.02c yadā te marto anu bhogam ānaḍ vaso dadhāno matibhiḥ sujāta //
analyzed: yadā te martaḥ anu bhogam ānaṭ vaso dadhānaḥ matibhiḥ su jāta

original: RV_10,007.03a agnim manye pitaram agnim āpim agnim bhrātaraṃ sadam it sakhāyam /
analyzed: agnim manye pitaram agnim āpim agnim bhrātaram sadam id sakhāyam

original: RV_10,007.03c agner anīkam bṛhataḥ saparyaṃ divi śukraṃ yajataṃ sūryasya //
analyzed: agneḥ anīkam bṛhataḥ saparyam divi śukram yajatam sūryasya

original: RV_10,007.04a sidhrā agne dhiyo asme sanutrīr yaṃ trāyase dama ā nityahotā /
analyzed: sidhrāḥ agne dhiyaḥ asme sanutrīḥ yam trāyase dame ā nitya hotā

original: RV_10,007.04c ṛtāvā sa rohidaśvaḥ purukṣur dyubhir asmā ahabhir vāmam astu //
analyzed: ṛtāvā sa rohit aśvaḥ purukṣuḥ dyubhiḥ asmai ahabhiḥ vāmam astu

original: RV_10,007.05a dyubhir hitam mitram iva prayogam pratnam ṛtvijam adhvarasya jāram /
analyzed: dyubhiḥ hitam mitram iva prayogam pratnam ṛtvijam adhvarasya jāram

original: RV_10,007.05c bāhubhyām agnim āyavo 'jananta vikṣu hotāraṃ ny asādayanta //
analyzed: bāhubhyām agnim āyavaḥ jananta vikṣu hotāram ni asādayanta

original: RV_10,007.06a svayaṃ yajasva divi deva devān kiṃ te pākaḥ kṛṇavad apracetāḥ /
analyzed: svayam yajasva divi deva devān kim te pākaḥ kṛṇavat apracetāḥ

original: RV_10,007.06c yathāyaja ṛtubhir deva devān evā yajasva tanvaṃ sujāta //
analyzed: yathā ayajaḥ ṛtubhiḥ deva devān evā yajasva tanvam su jāta

original: RV_10,007.07a bhavā no agne 'vitota gopā bhavā vayaskṛd uta no vayodhāḥ /
analyzed: bhava naḥ agne vitā uta gopāḥ bhava vayaskṛt uta naḥ vayodhāḥ

original: RV_10,007.07c rāsvā ca naḥ sumaho havyadātiṃ trāsvota nas tanvo aprayucchan //
analyzed: rāsvā ca naḥ su mahas havya dātim trāsvā uta naḥ tanvaḥ aprayucchan

original: RV_10,008.01a pra ketunā bṛhatā yāty agnir ā rodasī vṛṣabho roravīti /
analyzed: pra ketunā bṛhatā yāti agniḥ ā rodasī vṛṣabhaḥ roravīti

original: RV_10,008.01c divaś cid antāṃ upamāṃ ud ānaḷ apām upasthe mahiṣo vavardha //
analyzed: divaḥ cit antām upamām ud ānaṭ apām upasthe mahiṣaḥ vavardha

original: RV_10,008.02a mumoda garbho vṛṣabhaḥ kakudmān asremā vatsaḥ śimīvāṃ arāvīt /
analyzed: mumoda garbhaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ kakudmān asremā vatsaḥ śimīvān arāvīt

original: RV_10,008.02c sa devatāty udyatāni kṛṇvan sveṣu kṣayeṣu prathamo jigāti //
analyzed: sa devatātī udyatāni kṛṇvan sveṣu kṣayeṣu prathamaḥ jigāti

original: RV_10,008.03a ā yo mūrdhānam pitror arabdha ny adhvare dadhire sūro arṇaḥ /
analyzed: ā yaḥ mūrdhānam pitroḥ arabdha ni adhvare dadhire sūraḥ arṇaḥ

original: RV_10,008.03c asya patmann aruṣīr aśvabudhnā ṛtasya yonau tanvo juṣanta //
analyzed: asya patman aruṣīḥ aśva budhnāḥ ṛtasya yonau tanvaḥ juṣanta

original: RV_10,008.04a uṣa-uṣo hi vaso agram eṣi tvaṃ yamayor abhavo vibhāvā /
analyzed: uṣā oṣaḥ hi vaso agram eṣi tvam yamayoḥ abhavaḥ vibhāvā

original: RV_10,008.04c ṛtāya sapta dadhiṣe padāni janayan mitraṃ tanve svāyai //
analyzed: ṛtāya sapta dadhiṣe padāni janayan mitram tanve svāyai

original: RV_10,008.05a bhuvaś cakṣur maha ṛtasya gopā bhuvo varuṇo yad ṛtāya veṣi /
analyzed: bhuvaḥ cakṣuḥ mahaḥ ṛtasya gopāḥ bhuvaḥ varuṇaḥ yat ṛtāya veṣi

original: RV_10,008.05c bhuvo apāṃ napāj jātavedo bhuvo dūto yasya havyaṃ jujoṣaḥ //
analyzed: bhuvaḥ apām napāt jātavedaḥ bhuvaḥ dūtaḥ yasya havyam jujoṣaḥ

original: RV_10,008.06a bhuvo yajñasya rajasaś ca netā yatrā niyudbhiḥ sacase śivābhiḥ /
analyzed: bhuvaḥ yajñasya rajasaḥ ca netā yatrā niyudbhiḥ sacase śivābhiḥ

original: RV_10,008.06c divi mūrdhānaṃ dadhiṣe svarṣāṃ jihvām agne cakṛṣe havyavāham //
analyzed: divi mūrdhānam dadhiṣe svarṣām jihvām agne cakṛṣe havya vāham

original: RV_10,008.07a asya tritaḥ kratunā vavre antar icchan dhītim pitur evaiḥ parasya /
analyzed: asya tritaḥ kratunā vavre antar icchan dhītim pituḥ evaiḥ parasya

original: RV_10,008.07c sacasyamānaḥ pitror upasthe jāmi bruvāṇa āyudhāni veti //
analyzed: sacasyamānaḥ pitroḥ upasthe jāmi bruvāṇaḥ āyudhāni veti

original: RV_10,008.08a sa pitryāṇy āyudhāni vidvān indreṣita āptyo abhy ayudhyat /
analyzed: sa pitryāṇi āyudhāni vidvān indra iṣitaḥ āptyaḥ abhī ayudhyat

original: RV_10,008.08c triśīrṣāṇaṃ saptaraśmiṃ jaghanvān tvāṣṭrasya cin niḥ sasṛje trito gāḥ //
analyzed: tri śīrṣāṇam sapta raśmim jaghanvān tvāṣṭrasya cit niḥ sasṛje tritaḥ gāḥ

original: RV_10,008.09a bhūrīd indra udinakṣantam ojo 'vābhinat satpatir manyamānam /
analyzed: bhūri id indraḥ udinakṣantam ojaḥ vā abhinat satpatiḥ manyamānam

original: RV_10,008.09c tvāṣṭrasya cid viśvarūpasya gonām ācakrāṇas trīṇi śīrṣā parā vark //
analyzed: tvāṣṭrasya cit viśva rūpasya gonām ācakrāṇaḥ trīṇi śīrṣā parā vark

original: RV_10,009.01a āpo hi ṣṭhā mayobhuvas tā na ūrje dadhātana /
analyzed: āpaḥ hi stha mayobhuvaḥ tāḥ naḥ ūrje dadhātana

original: RV_10,009.01c mahe raṇāya cakṣase //
analyzed: mahe raṇāya cakṣase

original: RV_10,009.02a yo vaḥ śivatamo rasas tasya bhājayateha naḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ vaḥ śivatamaḥ rasaḥ tasya bhājayata iha naḥ

original: RV_10,009.02c uśatīr iva mātaraḥ //
analyzed: uśatīḥ iva mātaraḥ

original: RV_10,009.03a tasmā araṃ gamāma vo yasya kṣayāya jinvatha /
analyzed: tasmai aram gamāma vaḥ yasya kṣayāya jinvatha

original: RV_10,009.03c āpo janayathā ca naḥ //
analyzed: āpaḥ janayatha ca naḥ

original: RV_10,009.04a śaṃ no devīr abhiṣṭaya āpo bhavantu pītaye /
analyzed: śam naḥ devīḥ abhiṣṭaye āpaḥ bhavantu pītaye

original: RV_10,009.04c śaṃ yor abhi sravantu naḥ //
analyzed: śam yos abhi sravantu naḥ

original: RV_10,009.05a īśānā vāryāṇāṃ kṣayantīś carṣaṇīnām /
analyzed: īśānāḥ vāryāṇām kṣayantīḥ carṣaṇīnām

original: RV_10,009.05c apo yācāmi bheṣajam //
analyzed: apaḥ yācāmi bheṣajam

original: RV_10,009.06a apsu me somo abravīd antar viśvāni bheṣajā /
analyzed: apsu me somaḥ abravīt antar viśvāni bheṣajā

original: RV_10,009.06c agniṃ ca viśvaśambhuvam //
analyzed: agnim ca viśva śambhuvam

original: RV_10,009.07a āpaḥ pṛṇīta bheṣajaṃ varūthaṃ tanve mama /
analyzed: āpaḥ pṛṇīta bheṣajam varūtham tanve mama

original: RV_10,009.07c jyok ca sūryaṃ dṛśe //
analyzed: jyok ca sūryam dṛśe

original: RV_10,009.08a idam āpaḥ pra vahata yat kiṃ ca duritam mayi /
analyzed: idam āpaḥ pra vahata yat kim ca duritam mayi

original: RV_10,009.08c yad vāham abhidudroha yad vā śepa utānṛtam //
analyzed: yat vā aham abhidudroha yat vā śepe uta anṛtam

original: RV_10,009.09a āpo adyānv acāriṣaṃ rasena sam agasmahi /
analyzed: āpaḥ adya anu acāriṣam rasena sam agasmahi

original: RV_10,009.09c payasvān agna ā gahi tam mā saṃ sṛja varcasā //
analyzed: payasvān agne ā gahi tam mā sam sṛja varcasā

original: RV_10,010.01a o cit sakhāyaṃ sakhyā vavṛtyāṃ tiraḥ purū cid arṇavaṃ jaganvān /
analyzed: ā u cit sakhāyam sakhyā vavṛtyām tiras purū cit arṇavam jaganvān

original: RV_10,010.01c pitur napātam ā dadhīta vedhā adhi kṣami prataraṃ dīdhyānaḥ //
analyzed: pituḥ napātam ā dadhīta vedhāḥ adhi kṣami prataram dīdhyānaḥ

original: RV_10,010.02a na te sakhā sakhyaṃ vaṣṭy etat salakṣmā yad viṣurūpā bhavāti /
analyzed: na te sakhā sakhyam vaṣṭi etat salakṣmā yat viṣurūpā bhavāti

original: RV_10,010.02c mahas putrāso asurasya vīrā divo dhartāra urviyā pari khyan //
analyzed: mahaḥ putrāsaḥ asurasya vīrāḥ divaḥ dhartāraḥ urviyā pari khyan

original: RV_10,010.03a uśanti ghā te amṛtāsa etad ekasya cit tyajasam martyasya /
analyzed: uśanti gha te amṛtāsaḥ etat ekasya cit tyajasam martyasya

original: RV_10,010.03c ni te mano manasi dhāyy asme janyuḥ patis tanvam ā viviśyāḥ //
analyzed: ni te manaḥ manasi dhāyi asme janyuḥ patiḥ tanvam ā viviśyāḥ

original: RV_10,010.04a na yat purā cakṛmā kad dha nūnam ṛtā vadanto anṛtaṃ rapema /
analyzed: na yat purā cakṛma kad ha nūnam ṛtā vadantaḥ anṛtam rapema

original: RV_10,010.04c gandharvo apsv apyā ca yoṣā sā no nābhiḥ paramaṃ jāmi tan nau //
analyzed: gandharvaḥ apsu apyā ca yoṣā sā naḥ nābhiḥ paramam jāmi tat nau

original: RV_10,010.05a garbhe nu nau janitā dampatī kar devas tvaṣṭā savitā viśvarūpaḥ /
analyzed: garbhe nu nau janitā dampatī kaḥ devaḥ tvaṣṭā savitā viśva rūpaḥ

original: RV_10,010.05c nakir asya pra minanti vratāni veda nāv asya pṛthivī uta dyauḥ //
analyzed: nakir asya pra minanti vratāni veda nau asya pṛthivī uta dyauḥ

original: RV_10,010.06a ko asya veda prathamasyāhnaḥ ka īṃ dadarśa ka iha pra vocat /
analyzed: kaḥ asya veda prathamasya ahnaḥ kaḥ īm dadarśa kaḥ iha pra vocat

original: RV_10,010.06c bṛhan mitrasya varuṇasya dhāma kad u brava āhano vīcyā nṝn //
analyzed: bṛhat mitrasya varuṇasya dhāma kad u bravaḥ āhano vīcyā nṝn

original: RV_10,010.07a yamasya mā yamyaṃ kāma āgan samāne yonau sahaśeyyāya /
analyzed: yamasya mā yamyam kāmaḥ āgan samāne yonau sahaśeyyāya

original: RV_10,010.07c jāyeva patye tanvaṃ riricyāṃ vi cid vṛheva rathyeva cakrā //
analyzed: jāyā iva patye tanvam riricyām vi cit vṛheva rathyā iva cakrā

original: RV_10,010.08a na tiṣṭhanti na ni miṣanty ete devānāṃ spaśa iha ye caranti /
analyzed: na tiṣṭhanti na ni miṣanti ete devānām spaśaḥ iha ye caranti

original: RV_10,010.08c anyena mad āhano yāhi tūyaṃ tena vi vṛha rathyeva cakrā //
analyzed: anyena mat āhanaḥ yāhi tūyam tena vi vṛha rathyā iva cakrā

original: RV_10,010.09a rātrībhir asmā ahabhir daśasyet sūryasya cakṣur muhur un mimīyāt /
analyzed: rātrībhiḥ asmai ahabhiḥ daśasyet sūryasya cakṣuḥ muhur ud mimīyāt

original: RV_10,010.09c divā pṛthivyā mithunā sabandhū yamīr yamasya bibhṛyād ajāmi //
analyzed: divā pṛthivyā mithunā sabandhū yamīḥ yamasya bibhṛyāt ajāmi

original: RV_10,010.10a ā ghā tā gacchān uttarā yugāni yatra jāmayaḥ kṛṇavann ajāmi /
analyzed: ā gha tā gacchān uttarā yugāni yatra jāmayaḥ kṛṇavan ajāmi

original: RV_10,010.10c upa barbṛhi vṛṣabhāya bāhum anyam icchasva subhage patim mat //
analyzed: upa barbṛhi vṛṣabhāya bāhum anyam icchasva subhage patim mat

original: RV_10,010.11a kim bhrātāsad yad anātham bhavāti kim u svasā yan nirṛtir nigacchāt /
analyzed: kim bhrātā asat yat anātham bhavāti kim u svasā yat nirṛtiḥ nigacchāt

original: RV_10,010.11c kāmamūtā bahv etad rapāmi tanvā me tanvaṃ sam pipṛgdhi //
analyzed: kāma mūtā bahu etat rapāmi tanvāḥ me tanvam sam pipṛgdhi

original: RV_10,010.12a na vā u te tanvā tanvaṃ sam papṛcyām pāpam āhur yaḥ svasāraṃ nigacchāt /
analyzed: na vai u te tanvā tanvam sam papṛcyām pāpam āhuḥ yaḥ svasāram nigacchāt

original: RV_10,010.12c anyena mat pramudaḥ kalpayasva na te bhrātā subhage vaṣṭy etat //
analyzed: anyena mat pramudaḥ kalpayasva na te bhrātā subhage vaṣṭi etat

original: RV_10,010.13a bato batāsi yama naiva te mano hṛdayaṃ cāvidāma /
analyzed: bataḥ bata asi yama na eva te manaḥ hṛdayam ca avidāma

original: RV_10,010.13c anyā kila tvāṃ kakṣyeva yuktam pari ṣvajāte libujeva vṛkṣam //
analyzed: anyā kila tvām kakṣyā iva yuktam pari svajāte libujā iva vṛkṣam

original: RV_10,010.14a anyam ū ṣu tvaṃ yamy anya u tvām pari ṣvajāte libujeva vṛkṣam /
analyzed: anyam u su tvam yami anyaḥ u tvām pari svajāte libujā iva vṛkṣam

original: RV_10,010.14c tasya vā tvam mana icchā sa vā tavādhā kṛṇuṣva saṃvidaṃ subhadrām //
analyzed: tasya vā tvam manaḥ iccha sa vā tava adha kṛṇuṣva saṃvidam su bhadrām

original: RV_10,011.01a vṛṣā vṛṣṇe duduhe dohasā divaḥ payāṃsi yahvo aditer adābhyaḥ /
analyzed: vṛṣā vṛṣṇe duduhe dohasā divaḥ payāṃsi yahvaḥ aditeḥ adābhyaḥ

original: RV_10,011.01c viśvaṃ sa veda varuṇo yathā dhiyā sa yajñiyo yajatu yajñiyāṃ ṛtūn //
analyzed: viśvam sa veda varuṇaḥ yathā dhiyā sa yajñiyaḥ yajatu yajñiyān ṛtūn

original: RV_10,011.02a rapad gandharvīr apyā ca yoṣaṇā nadasya nāde pari pātu me manaḥ /
analyzed: rapat gandharvīḥ apyā ca yoṣaṇā nadasya nāde pari pātu me manaḥ

original: RV_10,011.02c iṣṭasya madhye aditir ni dhātu no bhrātā no jyeṣṭhaḥ prathamo vi vocati //
analyzed: iṣṭasya madhye aditiḥ ni dhātu naḥ bhrātā naḥ jyeṣṭhaḥ prathamaḥ vi vocati

original: RV_10,011.03a so cin nu bhadrā kṣumatī yaśasvaty uṣā uvāsa manave svarvatī /
analyzed: sā u cit nu bhadrā kṣumatī yaśasvatī uṣāḥ uvāsa manave svarvatī

original: RV_10,011.03c yad īm uśantam uśatām anu kratum agniṃ hotāraṃ vidathāya jījanan //
analyzed: yat īm uśantam uśatām anu kratum agnim hotāram vidathāya jījanan

original: RV_10,011.04a adha tyaṃ drapsaṃ vibhvaṃ vicakṣaṇaṃ vir ābharad iṣitaḥ śyeno adhvare /
analyzed: adha tyam drapsam vibhvam vicakṣaṇam viḥ ābharat iṣitaḥ śyenaḥ adhvare

original: RV_10,011.04c yadī viśo vṛṇate dasmam āryā agniṃ hotāram adha dhīr ajāyata //
analyzed: yadi viśaḥ vṛṇate dasmam āryāḥ agnim hotāram adha dhīḥ ajāyata

original: RV_10,011.05a sadāsi raṇvo yavaseva puṣyate hotrābhir agne manuṣaḥ svadhvaraḥ /
analyzed: sadā asi raṇvaḥ yavasā iva puṣyate hotrābhiḥ agne manuṣaḥ su adhvaraḥ

original: RV_10,011.05c viprasya vā yac chaśamāna ukthyaṃ vājaṃ sasavāṃ upayāsi bhūribhiḥ //
analyzed: viprasya vā yat śaśamānaḥ ukthyam vājam sasavān upayāsi bhūribhiḥ

original: RV_10,011.06a ud īraya pitarā jāra ā bhagam iyakṣati haryato hṛtta iṣyati /
analyzed: ud īraya pitarā jāraḥ ā bhagam iyakṣati haryataḥ hṛttas iṣyati

original: RV_10,011.06c vivakti vahniḥ svapasyate makhas taviṣyate asuro vepate matī //
analyzed: vivakti vahniḥ svapasyate makhaḥ taviṣyate asuraḥ vepate matī

original: RV_10,011.07a yas te agne sumatim marto akṣat sahasaḥ sūno ati sa pra śṛṇve /
analyzed: yaḥ te agne sumatim martaḥ akṣat sahasaḥ sūno ati sa pra śṛṇve

original: RV_10,011.07c iṣaṃ dadhāno vahamāno aśvair ā sa dyumāṃ amavān bhūṣati dyūn //
analyzed: iṣam dadhānaḥ vahamānaḥ aśvaiḥ ā sa dyumān amavān bhūṣati dyūn

original: RV_10,011.08a yad agna eṣā samitir bhavāti devī deveṣu yajatā yajatra /
analyzed: yat agne eṣā samitiḥ bhavāti devī deveṣu yajatā yajatra

original: RV_10,011.08c ratnā ca yad vibhajāsi svadhāvo bhāgaṃ no atra vasumantaṃ vītāt //
analyzed: ratnā ca yat vibhajāsi svadhāvas bhāgam naḥ atra vasumantam vītāt

original: RV_10,011.09a śrudhī no agne sadane sadhasthe yukṣvā ratham amṛtasya dravitnum /
analyzed: śrudhi naḥ agne sadane sadhasthe yukṣva ratham amṛtasya dravitnum

original: RV_10,011.09c ā no vaha rodasī devaputre mākir devānām apa bhūr iha syāḥ //
analyzed: ā naḥ vaha rodasī deva putre mākir devānām apa bhūḥ iha syāḥ

original: RV_10,012.01a dyāvā ha kṣāmā prathame ṛtenābhiśrāve bhavataḥ satyavācā /
analyzed: dyāvā ha kṣāmā prathame ṛtena abhiśrāve bhavataḥ satya vācā

original: RV_10,012.01c devo yan martān yajathāya kṛṇvan sīdad dhotā pratyaṅ svam asuṃ yan //
analyzed: devaḥ yat martān yajathāya kṛṇvan sīdat hotā pratyaṅ svam asum yan

original: RV_10,012.02a devo devān paribhūr ṛtena vahā no havyam prathamaś cikitvān /
analyzed: devaḥ devān paribhūḥ ṛtena vaha naḥ havyam prathamaḥ cikitvān

original: RV_10,012.02c dhūmaketuḥ samidhā bhāṛjīko mandro hotā nityo vācā yajīyān //
analyzed: dhūma ketuḥ samidhā bhāṛjīkaḥ mandraḥ hotā nityaḥ vācā yajīyān

original: RV_10,012.03a svāvṛg devasyāmṛtaṃ yadī gor ato jātāso dhārayanta urvī /
analyzed: svāvṛj devasya amṛtam yadi goḥ atas jātāsaḥ dhārayante urvī

original: RV_10,012.03c viśve devā anu tat te yajur gur duhe yad enī divyaṃ ghṛtaṃ vāḥ //
analyzed: viśve devāḥ anu tat te yajuḥ guḥ duhe yat enī divyam ghṛtam vār

original: RV_10,012.04a arcāmi vāṃ vardhāyāpo ghṛtasnū dyāvābhūmī śṛṇutaṃ rodasī me /
analyzed: arcāmi vām vardhāya apaḥ ghṛtasnū dyāvābhūmī śṛṇutam rodasī me

original: RV_10,012.04c ahā yad dyāvo 'sunītim ayan madhvā no atra pitarā śiśītām //
analyzed: ahā yat dyāvaḥ sunītim ayan madhvā naḥ atra pitarā śiśītām

original: RV_10,012.05a kiṃ svin no rājā jagṛhe kad asyāti vrataṃ cakṛmā ko vi veda /
analyzed: kim svid naḥ rājā jagṛhe kad asya ati vratam cakṛma kaḥ vi veda

original: RV_10,012.05c mitraś cid dhi ṣmā juhurāṇo devāñ chloko na yātām api vājo asti //
analyzed: mitraḥ cit hi sma juhurāṇaḥ devām ślokaḥ na yātām api vājaḥ asti

original: RV_10,012.06a durmantv atrāmṛtasya nāma salakṣmā yad viṣurūpā bhavāti /
analyzed: durmantu atra amṛtasya nāma salakṣmā yat viṣurūpā bhavāti

original: RV_10,012.06c yamasya yo manavate sumantv agne tam ṛṣva pāhy aprayucchan //
analyzed: yamasya yaḥ manavate sumantu agne tam ṛṣva pāhi aprayucchan

original: RV_10,012.07a yasmin devā vidathe mādayante vivasvataḥ sadane dhārayante /
analyzed: yasmin devāḥ vidathe mādayante vivasvataḥ sadane dhārayante

original: RV_10,012.07c sūrye jyotir adadhur māsy aktūn pari dyotaniṃ carato ajasrā //
analyzed: sūrye jyotiḥ adadhuḥ māsi aktūn pari dyotanim carataḥ ajasrā

original: RV_10,012.08a yasmin devā manmani saṃcaranty apīcye na vayam asya vidma /
analyzed: yasmin devāḥ manmani saṃcaranti apīcye na vayam asya vidma

original: RV_10,012.08c mitro no atrāditir anāgān savitā devo varuṇāya vocat //
analyzed: mitraḥ naḥ atra aditiḥ anāgān savitā devaḥ varuṇāya vocat

original: RV_10,012.09a śrudhī no agne sadane sadhasthe yukṣvā ratham amṛtasya dravitnum /
analyzed: śrudhi naḥ agne sadane sadhasthe yukṣva ratham amṛtasya dravitnum

original: RV_10,012.09c ā no vaha rodasī devaputre mākir devānām apa bhūr iha syāḥ //
analyzed: ā naḥ vaha rodasī deva putre mākir devānām apa bhūḥ iha syāḥ

original: RV_10,013.01a yuje vām brahma pūrvyaṃ namobhir vi śloka etu pathyeva sūreḥ /
analyzed: yuje vām brahma pūrvyam namobhiḥ vi ślokaḥ etu pathyā iva sūreḥ

original: RV_10,013.01c śṛṇvantu viśve amṛtasya putrā ā ye dhāmāni divyāni tasthuḥ //
analyzed: śṛṇvantu viśve amṛtasya putrāḥ ā ye dhāmāni divyāni tasthuḥ

original: RV_10,013.02a yame iva yatamāne yad aitam pra vām bharan mānuṣā devayantaḥ /
analyzed: yame iva yatamāne yat aitam pra vām bharan mānuṣāḥ devayantaḥ

original: RV_10,013.02c ā sīdataṃ svam u lokaṃ vidāne svāsasthe bhavatam indave naḥ //
analyzed: ā sīdatam svam u lokam vidāne svāsasthe bhavatam indave naḥ

original: RV_10,013.03a pañca padāni rupo anv arohaṃ catuṣpadīm anv emi vratena /
analyzed: pañca padāni rupaḥ anu aroham catuṣpadīm anu emi vratena

original: RV_10,013.03c akṣareṇa prati mima etām ṛtasya nābhāv adhi sam punāmi //
analyzed: akṣareṇa prati mime etām ṛtasya nābhau adhi sam punāmi

original: RV_10,013.04a devebhyaḥ kam avṛṇīta mṛtyum prajāyai kam amṛtaṃ nāvṛṇīta /
analyzed: devebhyaḥ kam avṛṇīta mṛtyum prajāyai kam amṛtam na avṛṇīta

original: RV_10,013.04c bṛhaspatiṃ yajñam akṛṇvata ṛṣim priyāṃ yamas tanvam prārirecīt //
analyzed: bṛhaspatim yajñam akṛṇvata ṛṣim priyām yamaḥ tanvam prārirecīt

original: RV_10,013.05a sapta kṣaranti śiśave marutvate pitre putrāso apy avīvatann ṛtam /
analyzed: sapta kṣaranti śiśave marutvate pitre putrāsaḥ api avīvatan ṛtam

original: RV_10,013.05c ubhe id asyobhayasya rājata ubhe yatete ubhayasya puṣyataḥ //
analyzed: ubhe id asya ubhayasya rājataḥ ubhe yatete ubhayasya puṣyataḥ

original: RV_10,014.01a pareyivāṃsam pravato mahīr anu bahubhyaḥ panthām anupaspaśānam /
analyzed: pareyivāṃsam pravataḥ mahīḥ anu bahubhyaḥ panthām anupaspaśānam

original: RV_10,014.01c vaivasvataṃ saṃgamanaṃ janānāṃ yamaṃ rājānaṃ haviṣā duvasya //
analyzed: vaivasvatam saṃgamanam janānām yamam rājānam haviṣā duvasya

original: RV_10,014.02a yamo no gātum prathamo viveda naiṣā gavyūtir apabhartavā u /
analyzed: yamaḥ naḥ gātum prathamaḥ viveda na eṣā gavyūtiḥ apabhartavai u

original: RV_10,014.02c yatrā naḥ pūrve pitaraḥ pareyur enā jajñānāḥ pathyā anu svāḥ //
analyzed: yatra naḥ pūrve pitaraḥ pareyuḥ enāḥ jajñānāḥ pathyāḥ anu svāḥ

original: RV_10,014.03a mātalī kavyair yamo aṅgirobhir bṛhaspatir ṛkvabhir vāvṛdhānaḥ /
analyzed: mātalī kavyaiḥ yamaḥ aṅgirobhiḥ bṛhaspatiḥ ṛkvabhiḥ vāvṛdhānaḥ

original: RV_10,014.03c yāṃś ca devā vāvṛdhur ye ca devān svāhānye svadhayānye madanti //
analyzed: yān ca devāḥ vāvṛdhuḥ ye ca devān svāhā anye svadhayā anye madanti

original: RV_10,014.04a imaṃ yama prastaram ā hi sīdāṅgirobhiḥ pitṛbhiḥ saṃvidānaḥ /
analyzed: imam yama prastaram ā hi sīda aṅgirobhiḥ pitṛbhiḥ saṃvidānaḥ

original: RV_10,014.04c ā tvā mantrāḥ kaviśastā vahantv enā rājan haviṣā mādayasva //
analyzed: ā tvā mantrāḥ kavi śastāḥ vahantu enā rājan haviṣā mādayasva

original: RV_10,014.05a aṅgirobhir ā gahi yajñiyebhir yama vairūpair iha mādayasva /
analyzed: aṅgirobhiḥ ā gahi yajñiyebhiḥ yama vairūpaiḥ iha mādayasva

original: RV_10,014.05c vivasvantaṃ huve yaḥ pitā te 'smin yajñe barhiṣy ā niṣadya //
analyzed: vivasvantam huve yaḥ pitā te smin yajñe barhiṣi ā niṣadya

original: RV_10,014.06a aṅgiraso naḥ pitaro navagvā atharvāṇo bhṛgavaḥ somyāsaḥ /
analyzed: aṅgirasaḥ naḥ pitaraḥ navagvāḥ atharvāṇaḥ bhṛgavaḥ somyāsaḥ

original: RV_10,014.06c teṣāṃ vayaṃ sumatau yajñiyānām api bhadre saumanase syāma //
analyzed: teṣām vayam sumatau yajñiyānām api bhadre saumanase syāma

original: RV_10,014.07a prehi prehi pathibhiḥ pūrvyebhir yatrā naḥ pūrve pitaraḥ pareyuḥ /
analyzed: prehi prehi pathibhiḥ pūrvyebhiḥ yatrā naḥ pūrve pitaraḥ pareyuḥ

original: RV_10,014.07c ubhā rājānā svadhayā madantā yamam paśyāsi varuṇaṃ ca devam //
analyzed: ubhā rājānā svadhayā madantā yamam paśyāsi varuṇam ca devam

original: RV_10,014.08a saṃ gacchasva pitṛbhiḥ saṃ yameneṣṭāpūrtena parame vyoman /
analyzed: sam gacchasva pitṛbhiḥ sam yamena iṣṭāpūrtena parame vyoman

original: RV_10,014.08c hitvāyāvadyam punar astam ehi saṃ gacchasva tanvā suvarcāḥ //
analyzed: hitvā ayāvadyam punar astam ehi sam gacchasva tanvā su varcāḥ

original: RV_10,014.09a apeta vīta vi ca sarpatāto 'smā etam pitaro lokam akran /
analyzed: apeta vīta vi ca sarpata atas sma etam pitaraḥ lokam akran

original: RV_10,014.09c ahobhir adbhir aktubhir vyaktaṃ yamo dadāty avasānam asmai //
analyzed: ahobhiḥ adbhiḥ aktubhiḥ vyaktam yamaḥ dadāti avasānam asmai

original: RV_10,014.10a ati drava sārameyau śvānau caturakṣau śabalau sādhunā pathā /
analyzed: ati drava sārameyau śvānau catur akṣau śabalau sādhunā pathā

original: RV_10,014.10c athā pitṝn suvidatrāṃ upehi yamena ye sadhamādam madanti //
analyzed: athā pitṝn suvidatrām upehi yamena ye sadhamādam madanti

original: RV_10,014.11a yau te śvānau yama rakṣitārau caturakṣau pathirakṣī nṛcakṣasau /
analyzed: yau te śvānau yama rakṣitārau catur akṣau pathirakṣī nṛ cakṣasau

original: RV_10,014.11c tābhyām enam pari dehi rājan svasti cāsmā anamīvaṃ ca dhehi //
analyzed: tābhyām enam pari dehi rājan svasti ca asmai anamīvam ca dhehi

original: RV_10,014.12a urūṇasāv asutṛpā udumbalau yamasya dūtau carato janāṃ anu /
analyzed: uru nasau asu tṛpau udumbalau yamasya dūtau carataḥ janān anu

original: RV_10,014.12c tāv asmabhyaṃ dṛśaye sūryāya punar dātām asum adyeha bhadram //
analyzed: tau asmabhyam dṛśaye sūryāya punar dātām asum adyā iha bhadram

original: RV_10,014.13a yamāya somaṃ sunuta yamāya juhutā haviḥ /
analyzed: yamāya somam sunuta yamāya juhuta haviḥ

original: RV_10,014.13c yamaṃ ha yajño gacchaty agnidūto araṅkṛtaḥ //
analyzed: yamam ha yajñaḥ gacchati agni dūtaḥ araṅkṛtaḥ

original: RV_10,014.14a yamāya ghṛtavad dhavir juhota pra ca tiṣṭhata /
analyzed: yamāya ghṛtavat haviḥ juhota pra ca tiṣṭhata

original: RV_10,014.14c sa no deveṣv ā yamad dīrgham āyuḥ pra jīvase //
analyzed: sa naḥ deveṣu ā yamat dīrgham āyuḥ pra jīvase

original: RV_10,014.15a yamāya madhumattamaṃ rājñe havyaṃ juhotana /
analyzed: yamāya madhumattamam rājñe havyam juhotana

original: RV_10,014.15c idaṃ nama ṛṣibhyaḥ pūrvajebhyaḥ pūrvebhyaḥ pathikṛdbhyaḥ //
analyzed: idam namaḥ ṛṣibhyaḥ pūrva jebhyaḥ pūrvebhyaḥ pathikṛdbhyaḥ

original: RV_10,014.16a trikadrukebhiḥ patati ṣaḷ urvīr ekam id bṛhat /
analyzed: trikadrukebhiḥ patati ṣaḍ urvīḥ ekam id bṛhat

original: RV_10,014.16c triṣṭub gāyatrī chandāṃsi sarvā tā yama āhitā //
analyzed: triṣṭubh gāyatrī chandāṃsi sarvā tā yame āhitā

original: RV_10,015.01a ud īratām avara ut parāsa un madhyamāḥ pitaraḥ somyāsaḥ /
analyzed: ud īratām avare ud parāsaḥ ud madhyamāḥ pitaraḥ somyāsaḥ

original: RV_10,015.01c asuṃ ya īyur avṛkā ṛtajñās te no 'vantu pitaro haveṣu //
analyzed: asum ye īyuḥ avṛkāḥ ṛta jñāḥ te naḥ vantu pitaraḥ haveṣu

original: RV_10,015.02a idam pitṛbhyo namo astv adya ye pūrvāso ya uparāsa īyuḥ /
analyzed: idam pitṛbhyaḥ namaḥ astu adya ye pūrvāsaḥ ye uparāsaḥ īyuḥ

original: RV_10,015.02c ye pārthive rajasy ā niṣattā ye vā nūnaṃ suvṛjanāsu vikṣu //
analyzed: ye pārthive rajasi ā niṣattāḥ ye vā nūnam su vṛjanāsu vikṣu

original: RV_10,015.03a āham pitṝn suvidatrāṃ avitsi napātaṃ ca vikramaṇaṃ ca viṣṇoḥ /
analyzed: ā aham pitṝn suvidatrām avitsi napātam ca vikramaṇam ca viṣṇoḥ

original: RV_10,015.03c barhiṣado ye svadhayā sutasya bhajanta pitvas ta ihāgamiṣṭhāḥ //
analyzed: barhiṣadaḥ ye svadhayā sutasya bhajanta pitvaḥ te iha āgamiṣṭhāḥ

original: RV_10,015.04a barhiṣadaḥ pitara ūty arvāg imā vo havyā cakṛmā juṣadhvam /
analyzed: barhiṣadaḥ pitaraḥ ūtī arvāk imā vaḥ havyā cakṛma juṣadhvam

original: RV_10,015.04c ta ā gatāvasā śantamenāthā naḥ śaṃ yor arapo dadhāta //
analyzed: te ā gata avasā śantamena athā naḥ śam yos arapaḥ dadhāta

original: RV_10,015.05a upahūtāḥ pitaraḥ somyāso barhiṣyeṣu nidhiṣu priyeṣu /
analyzed: upahūtāḥ pitaraḥ somyāsaḥ barhiṣyeṣu nidhiṣu priyeṣu

original: RV_10,015.05c ta ā gamantu ta iha śruvantv adhi bruvantu te 'vantv asmān //
analyzed: te ā gamantu te iha śruvantu adhi bruvantu te vantu asmān

original: RV_10,015.06a ācyā jānu dakṣiṇato niṣadyemaṃ yajñam abhi gṛṇīta viśve /
analyzed: ācya jānu dakṣiṇatas niṣadya imam yajñam abhi gṛṇīta viśve

original: RV_10,015.06c mā hiṃsiṣṭa pitaraḥ kena cin no yad va āgaḥ puruṣatā karāma //
analyzed: mā hiṃsiṣṭa pitaraḥ kena cit naḥ yat vaḥ āgaḥ puruṣa tā karāma

original: RV_10,015.07a āsīnāso aruṇīnām upasthe rayiṃ dhatta dāśuṣe martyāya /
analyzed: āsīnāsaḥ aruṇīnām upasthe rayim dhatta dāśuṣe martyāya

original: RV_10,015.07c putrebhyaḥ pitaras tasya vasvaḥ pra yacchata ta ihorjaṃ dadhāta //
analyzed: putrebhyaḥ pitaraḥ tasya vasvaḥ pra yacchata te iha ūrjam dadhāta

original: RV_10,015.08a ye naḥ pūrve pitaraḥ somyāso 'nūhire somapīthaṃ vasiṣṭhāḥ /
analyzed: ye naḥ pūrve pitaraḥ somyāsaḥ nūhire soma pītham vasiṣṭhāḥ

original: RV_10,015.08c tebhir yamaḥ saṃrarāṇo havīṃṣy uśann uśadbhiḥ pratikāmam attu //
analyzed: tebhiḥ yamaḥ saṃrarāṇaḥ havīṃṣi uśan uśadbhiḥ pratikāmam attu

original: RV_10,015.09a ye tātṛṣur devatrā jehamānā hotrāvida stomataṣṭāso arkaiḥ /
analyzed: ye tātṛṣuḥ devatrā jehamānāḥ hotrā vidaḥ stoma taṣṭāsaḥ arkaiḥ

original: RV_10,015.09c āgne yāhi suvidatrebhir arvāṅ satyaiḥ kavyaiḥ pitṛbhir gharmasadbhiḥ //
analyzed: ā agne yāhi suvidatrebhiḥ arvāṅ satyaiḥ kavyaiḥ pitṛbhiḥ gharma sadbhiḥ

original: RV_10,015.10a ye satyāso havirado haviṣpā indreṇa devaiḥ sarathaṃ dadhānāḥ /
analyzed: ye satyāsaḥ haviḥ adaḥ haviṣpāḥ indreṇa devaiḥ sa ratham dadhānāḥ

original: RV_10,015.10c āgne yāhi sahasraṃ devavandaiḥ paraiḥ pūrvaiḥ pitṛbhir gharmasadbhiḥ //
analyzed: ā agne yāhi sahasram deva vandaiḥ paraiḥ pūrvaiḥ pitṛbhiḥ gharma sadbhiḥ

original: RV_10,015.11a agniṣvāttāḥ pitara eha gacchata sadaḥ-sadaḥ sadata supraṇītayaḥ /
analyzed: agniṣvāttāḥ pitaraḥ ā iha gacchata sadaḥ sadaḥ sadata su praṇītayaḥ

original: RV_10,015.11c attā havīṃṣi prayatāni barhiṣy athā rayiṃ sarvavīraṃ dadhātana //
analyzed: atta havīṃṣi prayatāni barhiṣi athā rayim sarva vīram dadhātana

original: RV_10,015.12a tvam agna īḷito jātavedo 'vāḍ ḍhavyāni surabhīṇi kṛtvī /
analyzed: tvam agne īḍitaḥ jātavedaḥ vār havyāni surabhīṇi kṛtvī

original: RV_10,015.12c prādāḥ pitṛbhyaḥ svadhayā te akṣann addhi tvaṃ deva prayatā havīṃṣi //
analyzed: prādāḥ pitṛbhyaḥ svadhayā te akṣan addhi tvam deva prayatā havīṃṣi

original: RV_10,015.13a ye ceha pitaro ye ca neha yāṃś ca vidma yāṃ u ca na pravidma /
analyzed: ye ca iha pitaraḥ ye ca na iha yān ca vidma yān u ca na pravidma

original: RV_10,015.13c tvaṃ vettha yati te jātavedaḥ svadhābhir yajñaṃ sukṛtaṃ juṣasva //
analyzed: tvam vettha yati te jātavedaḥ svadhābhiḥ yajñam su kṛtam juṣasva

original: RV_10,015.14a ye agnidagdhā ye anagnidagdhā madhye divaḥ svadhayā mādayante /
analyzed: ye agni dagdhāḥ ye an agni dagdhāḥ madhye divaḥ svadhayā mādayante

original: RV_10,015.14c tebhiḥ svarāḷ asunītim etāṃ yathāvaśaṃ tanvaṃ kalpayasva //
analyzed: tebhiḥ svarāj asu nītim etām yathāvaśam tanvam kalpayasva

original: RV_10,016.01a mainam agne vi daho mābhi śoco māsya tvacaṃ cikṣipo mā śarīram /
analyzed: mā enam agne vi dahaḥ mā abhi śocaḥ mā asya tvacam cikṣipaḥ mā śarīram

original: RV_10,016.01c yadā śṛtaṃ kṛṇavo jātavedo 'them enam pra hiṇutāt pitṛbhyaḥ //
analyzed: yadā śṛtam kṛṇavaḥ jātavedaḥ thā īm enam pra hiṇutāt pitṛbhyaḥ

original: RV_10,016.02a śṛtaṃ yadā karasi jātavedo 'them enam pari dattāt pitṛbhyaḥ /
analyzed: śṛtam yadā karasi jātavedaḥ thā īm enam pari dattāt pitṛbhyaḥ

original: RV_10,016.02c yadā gacchāty asunītim etām athā devānāṃ vaśanīr bhavāti //
analyzed: yadā gacchāti asunītim etām athā devānām vaśanīḥ bhavāti

original: RV_10,016.03a sūryaṃ cakṣur gacchatu vātam ātmā dyāṃ ca gaccha pṛthivīṃ ca dharmaṇā /
analyzed: sūryam cakṣuḥ gacchatu vātam ātmā dyām ca gaccha pṛthivīm ca dharmaṇā

original: RV_10,016.03c apo vā gaccha yadi tatra te hitam oṣadhīṣu prati tiṣṭhā śarīraiḥ //
analyzed: apaḥ vā gaccha yadi tatra te hitam oṣadhīṣu prati tiṣṭha śarīraiḥ

original: RV_10,016.04a ajo bhāgas tapasā taṃ tapasva taṃ te śocis tapatu taṃ te arciḥ /
analyzed: ajaḥ bhāgaḥ tapasā tam tapasva tam te śociḥ tapatu tam te arciḥ

original: RV_10,016.04c yās te śivās tanvo jātavedas tābhir vahainaṃ sukṛtām u lokam //
analyzed: yāḥ te śivāḥ tanvaḥ jātavedaḥ tābhiḥ vaha enam su kṛtām u lokam

original: RV_10,016.05a ava sṛja punar agne pitṛbhyo yas ta āhutaś carati svadhābhiḥ /
analyzed: ava sṛja punar agne pitṛbhyaḥ yaḥ te āhutaḥ carati svadhābhiḥ

original: RV_10,016.05c āyur vasāna upa vetu śeṣaḥ saṃ gacchatāṃ tanvā jātavedaḥ //
analyzed: āyuḥ vasānaḥ upa vetu śeṣaḥ sam gacchatām tanvā jātavedaḥ

original: RV_10,016.06a yat te kṛṣṇaḥ śakuna ātutoda pipīlaḥ sarpa uta vā śvāpadaḥ /
analyzed: yat te kṛṣṇaḥ śakunaḥ ātutoda pipīlaḥ sarpaḥ uta vā śvāpadaḥ

original: RV_10,016.06c agniṣ ṭad viśvād agadaṃ kṛṇotu somaś ca yo brāhmaṇāṃ āviveśa //
analyzed: agniḥ tat viśvāt agadam kṛṇotu somaḥ ca yaḥ brāhmaṇān āviveśa

original: RV_10,016.07a agner varma pari gobhir vyayasva sam prorṇuṣva pīvasā medasā ca /
analyzed: agneḥ varma pari gobhiḥ vyayasva sam pra ūrṇuṣva pīvasā medasā ca

original: RV_10,016.07c net tvā dhṛṣṇur harasā jarhṛṣāṇo dadhṛg vidhakṣyan paryaṅkhayāte //
analyzed: na id tvā dhṛṣṇuḥ harasā jarhṛṣāṇaḥ dadhṛṣ vidhakṣyan paryaṅkhayāte

original: RV_10,016.08a imam agne camasam mā vi jihvaraḥ priyo devānām uta somyānām /
analyzed: imam agne camasam mā vi jihvaraḥ priyaḥ devānām uta somyānām

original: RV_10,016.08c eṣa yaś camaso devapānas tasmin devā amṛtā mādayante //
analyzed: eṣa yaḥ camasaḥ deva pānaḥ tasmin devāḥ amṛtāḥ mādayante

original: RV_10,016.09a kravyādam agnim pra hiṇomi dūraṃ yamarājño gacchatu ripravāhaḥ /
analyzed: kravya adam agnim pra hiṇomi dūram yama rājñaḥ gacchatu ripra vāhaḥ

original: RV_10,016.09c ihaivāyam itaro jātavedā devebhyo havyaṃ vahatu prajānan //
analyzed: iha eva ayam itaraḥ jātavedāḥ devebhyaḥ havyam vahatu prajānan

original: RV_10,016.10a yo agniḥ kravyāt praviveśa vo gṛham imam paśyann itaraṃ jātavedasam /
analyzed: yaḥ agniḥ kravyād praviveśa vaḥ gṛham imam paśyan itaram jātavedasam

original: RV_10,016.10c taṃ harāmi pitṛyajñāya devaṃ sa gharmam invāt parame sadhasthe //
analyzed: tam harāmi pitṛ yajñāya devam sa gharmam invāt parame sadhasthe

original: RV_10,016.11a yo agniḥ kravyavāhanaḥ pitṝn yakṣad ṛtāvṛdhaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ agniḥ kravya vāhanaḥ pitṝn yakṣat ṛtāvṛdhaḥ

original: RV_10,016.11c pred u havyāni vocati devebhyaś ca pitṛbhya ā //
analyzed: pra id u havyāni vocati devebhyaḥ ca pitṛbhyaḥ ā

original: RV_10,016.12a uśantas tvā ni dhīmahy uśantaḥ sam idhīmahi /
analyzed: uśantaḥ tvā ni dhīmahi uśantaḥ sam idhīmahi

original: RV_10,016.12c uśann uśata ā vaha pitṝn haviṣe attave //
analyzed: uśan uśataḥ ā vaha pitṝn haviṣe attave

original: RV_10,016.13a yaṃ tvam agne samadahas tam u nir vāpayā punaḥ /
analyzed: yam tvam agne samadahaḥ tam u niḥ vāpaya punar

original: RV_10,016.13c kiyāmbv atra rohatu pākadūrvā vyalkaśā //
analyzed: kiyāmbu atra rohatu pākadūrvā vyalkaśā

original: RV_10,016.14a śītike śītikāvati hlādike hlādikāvati /
analyzed: śītike śītikāvati hlādike hlādikāvati

original: RV_10,016.14c maṇḍūkyā su saṃ gama imaṃ sv agniṃ harṣaya //
analyzed: maṇḍūkyā su sam gamaḥ imam su agnim harṣaya

original: RV_10,017.01a tvaṣṭā duhitre vahatuṃ kṛṇotītīdaṃ viśvam bhuvanaṃ sam eti /
analyzed: tvaṣṭā duhitre vahatum kṛṇoti iti idam viśvam bhuvanam sam eti

original: RV_10,017.01c yamasya mātā paryuhyamānā maho jāyā vivasvato nanāśa //
analyzed: yamasya mātā paryuhyamānā mahaḥ jāyā vivasvataḥ nanāśa

original: RV_10,017.02a apāgūhann amṛtām martyebhyaḥ kṛtvī savarṇām adadur vivasvate /
analyzed: apāgūhan amṛtām martyebhyaḥ kṛtvī savarṇām adaduḥ vivasvate

original: RV_10,017.02c utāśvināv abharad yat tad āsīd ajahād u dvā mithunā saraṇyūḥ //
analyzed: uta aśvinau abharat yat tat āsīt ajahāt u dvā mithunā saraṇyūḥ

original: RV_10,017.03a pūṣā tvetaś cyāvayatu pra vidvān anaṣṭapaśur bhuvanasya gopāḥ /
analyzed: pūṣā tvā itas cyāvayatu pra vidvān a naṣṭa paśuḥ bhuvanasya gopāḥ

original: RV_10,017.03c sa tvaitebhyaḥ pari dadat pitṛbhyo 'gnir devebhyaḥ suvidatriyebhyaḥ //
analyzed: sa tvā etebhyaḥ pari dadat pitṛbhyaḥ gniḥ devebhyaḥ suvidatriyebhyaḥ

original: RV_10,017.04a āyur viśvāyuḥ pari pāsati tvā pūṣā tvā pātu prapathe purastāt /
analyzed: āyuḥ viśvāyuḥ pari pāsati tvā pūṣā tvā pātu prapathe purastāt

original: RV_10,017.04c yatrāsate sukṛto yatra te yayus tatra tvā devaḥ savitā dadhātu //
analyzed: yatra āsate su kṛtaḥ yatra te yayuḥ tatra tvā devaḥ savitā dadhātu

original: RV_10,017.05a pūṣemā āśā anu veda sarvāḥ so asmāṃ abhayatamena neṣat /
analyzed: pūṣā imāḥ āśāḥ anu veda sarvāḥ saḥ asmām abhayatamena neṣat

original: RV_10,017.05c svastidā āghṛṇiḥ sarvavīro 'prayucchan pura etu prajānan //
analyzed: svasti dāḥ āghṛṇiḥ sarva vīraḥ prayucchan puras etu prajānan

original: RV_10,017.06a prapathe pathām ajaniṣṭa pūṣā prapathe divaḥ prapathe pṛthivyāḥ /
analyzed: prapathe pathām ajaniṣṭa pūṣā prapathe divaḥ prapathe pṛthivyāḥ

original: RV_10,017.06c ubhe abhi priyatame sadhasthe ā ca parā ca carati prajānan //
analyzed: ubhe abhi priyatame sadhasthe ā ca parā ca carati prajānan

original: RV_10,017.07a sarasvatīṃ devayanto havante sarasvatīm adhvare tāyamāne /
analyzed: sarasvatīm devayantaḥ havante sarasvatīm adhvare tāyamāne

original: RV_10,017.07c sarasvatīṃ sukṛto ahvayanta sarasvatī dāśuṣe vāryaṃ dāt //
analyzed: sarasvatīm su kṛtaḥ ahvayanta sarasvatī dāśuṣe vāryam dāt

original: RV_10,017.08a sarasvati yā sarathaṃ yayātha svadhābhir devi pitṛbhir madantī /
analyzed: sarasvati yā sa ratham yayātha svadhābhiḥ devi pitṛbhiḥ madantī

original: RV_10,017.08c āsadyāsmin barhiṣi mādayasvānamīvā iṣa ā dhehy asme //
analyzed: āsadya asmin barhiṣi mādayasva anamīvāḥ iṣaḥ ā dhehi asme

original: RV_10,017.09a sarasvatīṃ yām pitaro havante dakṣiṇā yajñam abhinakṣamāṇāḥ /
analyzed: sarasvatīm yām pitaraḥ havante dakṣiṇā yajñam abhinakṣamāṇāḥ

original: RV_10,017.09c sahasrārgham iḷo atra bhāgaṃ rāyas poṣaṃ yajamāneṣu dhehi //
analyzed: sahasra argham iḍaḥ atra bhāgam rāyaḥ poṣam yajamāneṣu dhehi

original: RV_10,017.10a āpo asmān mātaraḥ śundhayantu ghṛtena no ghṛtapvaḥ punantu /
analyzed: āpaḥ asmān mātaraḥ śundhayantu ghṛtena naḥ ghṛta pvaḥ punantu

original: RV_10,017.10c viśvaṃ hi ripram pravahanti devīr ud id ābhyaḥ śucir ā pūta emi //
analyzed: viśvam hi ripram pravahanti devīḥ ud id ābhyaḥ śuciḥ ā pūtaḥ emi

original: RV_10,017.11a drapsaś caskanda prathamāṃ anu dyūn imaṃ ca yonim anu yaś ca pūrvaḥ /
analyzed: drapsaḥ caskanda prathamām anu dyūn imam ca yonim anu yaḥ ca pūrvaḥ

original: RV_10,017.11c samānaṃ yonim anu saṃcarantaṃ drapsaṃ juhomy anu sapta hotrāḥ //
analyzed: samānam yonim anu saṃcarantam drapsam juhomi anu sapta hotrāḥ

original: RV_10,017.12a yas te drapsa skandati yas te aṃśur bāhucyuto dhiṣaṇāyā upasthāt /
analyzed: yaḥ te drapsaḥ skandati yaḥ te aṃśuḥ bāhu cyutaḥ dhiṣaṇāyāḥ upasthāt

original: RV_10,017.12c adhvaryor vā pari vā yaḥ pavitrāt taṃ te juhomi manasā vaṣaṭkṛtam //
analyzed: adhvaryoḥ vā pari vā yaḥ pavitrāt tam te juhomi manasā vaṣaṭkṛtam

original: RV_10,017.13a yas te drapsa skanno yas te aṃśur avaś ca yaḥ paraḥ srucā /
analyzed: yaḥ te drapsaḥ skannaḥ yaḥ te aṃśuḥ avas ca yaḥ paras srucā

original: RV_10,017.13c ayaṃ devo bṛhaspatiḥ saṃ taṃ siñcatu rādhase //
analyzed: ayam devaḥ bṛhaspatiḥ sam tam siñcatu rādhase

original: RV_10,017.14a payasvatīr oṣadhayaḥ payasvan māmakaṃ vacaḥ /
analyzed: payasvatīḥ oṣadhayaḥ payasvat māmakam vacaḥ

original: RV_10,017.14c apām payasvad it payas tena mā saha śundhata //
analyzed: apām payasvat id payaḥ tena mā saha śundhata

original: RV_10,018.01a param mṛtyo anu parehi panthāṃ yas te sva itaro devayānāt /
analyzed: param mṛtyo anu parehi panthām yaḥ te svaḥ itaraḥ deva yānāt

original: RV_10,018.01c cakṣuṣmate śṛṇvate te bravīmi mā naḥ prajāṃ rīriṣo mota vīrān //
analyzed: cakṣuṣmate śṛṇvate te bravīmi mā naḥ prajām rīriṣaḥ mā uta vīrān

original: RV_10,018.02a mṛtyoḥ padaṃ yopayanto yad aita drāghīya āyuḥ prataraṃ dadhānāḥ /
analyzed: mṛtyoḥ padam yopayantaḥ yat aita drāghīyaḥ āyuḥ prataram dadhānāḥ

original: RV_10,018.02c āpyāyamānāḥ prajayā dhanena śuddhāḥ pūtā bhavata yajñiyāsaḥ //
analyzed: āpyāyamānāḥ prajayā dhanena śuddhāḥ pūtāḥ bhavata yajñiyāsaḥ

original: RV_10,018.03a ime jīvā vi mṛtair āvavṛtrann abhūd bhadrā devahūtir no adya /
analyzed: ime jīvāḥ vi mṛtaiḥ āvavṛtran abhūt bhadrā deva hūtiḥ naḥ adya

original: RV_10,018.03c prāñco agāma nṛtaye hasāya drāghīya āyuḥ prataraṃ dadhānāḥ //
analyzed: prāñcaḥ agāma nṛtaye hasāya drāghīyaḥ āyuḥ prataram dadhānāḥ

original: RV_10,018.04a imaṃ jīvebhyaḥ paridhiṃ dadhāmi maiṣāṃ nu gād aparo artham etam /
analyzed: imam jīvebhyaḥ paridhim dadhāmi mā eṣām nu gāt aparaḥ artham etam

original: RV_10,018.04c śataṃ jīvantu śaradaḥ purūcīr antar mṛtyuṃ dadhatām parvatena //
analyzed: śatam jīvantu śaradaḥ purūcīḥ antar mṛtyum dadhatām parvatena

original: RV_10,018.05a yathāhāny anupūrvam bhavanti yatha ṛtava ṛtubhir yanti sādhu /
analyzed: yathā ahāni anupūrvam bhavanti yathā ṛtavaḥ ṛtubhiḥ yanti sādhu

original: RV_10,018.05c yathā na pūrvam aparo jahāty evā dhātar āyūṃṣi kalpayaiṣām //
analyzed: yathā na pūrvam aparaḥ jahāti eva dhātar āyūṃṣi kalpaya eṣām

original: RV_10,018.06a ā rohatāyur jarasaṃ vṛṇānā anupūrvaṃ yatamānā yati ṣṭha /
analyzed: ā rohata āyuḥ jarasam vṛṇānāḥ anupūrvam yatamānāḥ yati stha

original: RV_10,018.06c iha tvaṣṭā sujanimā sajoṣā dīrgham āyuḥ karati jīvase vaḥ //
analyzed: iha tvaṣṭā su janimā sajoṣāḥ dīrgham āyuḥ karati jīvase vaḥ

original: RV_10,018.07a imā nārīr avidhavāḥ supatnīr āñjanena sarpiṣā saṃ viśantu /
analyzed: imāḥ nārīḥ avidhavāḥ su patnīḥ āñjanena sarpiṣā sam viśantu

original: RV_10,018.07c anaśravo 'namīvāḥ suratnā ā rohantu janayo yonim agre //
analyzed: anaśravaḥ namīvāḥ su ratnāḥ ā rohantu janayaḥ yonim agre

original: RV_10,018.08a ud īrṣva nāry abhi jīvalokaṃ gatāsum etam upa śeṣa ehi /
analyzed: ud īrṣva nāri abhi jīva lokam gatāsum etam upa śeṣe ehi

original: RV_10,018.08c hastagrābhasya didhiṣos tavedam patyur janitvam abhi sam babhūtha //
analyzed: hasta grābhasya didhiṣoḥ tava idam patyuḥ janitvam abhi sam babhūtha

original: RV_10,018.09a dhanur hastād ādadāno mṛtasyāsme kṣatrāya varcase balāya /
analyzed: dhanuḥ hastāt ādadānaḥ mṛtasya asme kṣatrāya varcase balāya

original: RV_10,018.09c atraiva tvam iha vayaṃ suvīrā viśvā spṛdho abhimātīr jayema //
analyzed: atra eva tvam iha vayam su vīrāḥ viśvāḥ spṛdhaḥ abhimātīḥ jayema

original: RV_10,018.10a upa sarpa mātaram bhūmim etām uruvyacasam pṛthivīṃ suśevām /
analyzed: upa sarpa mātaram bhūmim etām uru vyacasam pṛthivīm su śevām

original: RV_10,018.10c ūrṇamradā yuvatir dakṣiṇāvata eṣā tvā pātu nirṛter upasthāt //
analyzed: ūrṇamradā yuvatiḥ dakṣiṇāvataḥ eṣā tvā pātu nirṛteḥ upasthāt

original: RV_10,018.11a uc chvañcasva pṛthivi mā ni bādhathāḥ sūpāyanāsmai bhava sūpavañcanā /
analyzed: ud śvañcasva pṛthivi mā ni bādhathāḥ su upāyanā asmai bhava su upavañcanā

original: RV_10,018.11c mātā putraṃ yathā sicābhy enam bhūma ūrṇuhi //
analyzed: mātā putram yathā sicā abhi enam bhūme ūrṇuhi

original: RV_10,018.12a ucchvañcamānā pṛthivī su tiṣṭhatu sahasram mita upa hi śrayantām /
analyzed: ucchvañcamānā pṛthivī su tiṣṭhatu sahasram mitaḥ upa hi śrayantām

original: RV_10,018.12c te gṛhāso ghṛtaścuto bhavantu viśvāhāsmai śaraṇāḥ santv atra //
analyzed: te gṛhāsaḥ ghṛtaścutaḥ bhavantu viśvāhā asmai śaraṇāḥ santu atra

original: RV_10,018.13a ut te stabhnāmi pṛthivīṃ tvat parīmaṃ logaṃ nidadhan mo ahaṃ riṣam /
analyzed: ud te stabhnāmi pṛthivīm tvat pari imam logam nidadhan mā u aham riṣam

original: RV_10,018.13c etāṃ sthūṇām pitaro dhārayantu te 'trā yamaḥ sādanā te minotu //
analyzed: etām sthūṇām pitaraḥ dhārayantu te trāḥ yamaḥ sādanā te minotu

original: RV_10,018.14a pratīcīne mām ahanīṣvāḥ parṇam ivā dadhuḥ /
analyzed: pratīcīne mām ahanīṣvāḥ parṇam iva ā dadhuḥ

original: RV_10,018.14c pratīcīṃ jagrabhā vācam aśvaṃ raśanayā yathā //
analyzed: pratīcīm jagrabhāḥ vācam aśvam raśanayā yathā

original: RV_10,019.01a ni vartadhvam mānu gātāsmān siṣakta revatīḥ /
analyzed: ni vartadhvam mā anu gāta asmān siṣakta revatīḥ

original: RV_10,019.01c agnīṣomā punarvasū asme dhārayataṃ rayim //
analyzed: agnīṣomā punarvasū asme dhārayatam rayim

original: RV_10,019.02a punar enā ni vartaya punar enā ny ā kuru /
analyzed: punar enāḥ ni vartaya punar enāḥ ni ā kuru

original: RV_10,019.02c indra eṇā ni yacchatv agnir enā upājatu //
analyzed: indraḥ eṇā ni yacchatu agniḥ enāḥ upājatu

original: RV_10,019.03a punar etā ni vartantām asmin puṣyantu gopatau /
analyzed: punar etāḥ ni vartantām asmin puṣyantu gopatau

original: RV_10,019.03c ihaivāgne ni dhārayeha tiṣṭhatu yā rayiḥ //
analyzed: iha eva agne ni dhāraya iha tiṣṭhatu yā rayiḥ

original: RV_10,019.04a yan niyānaṃ nyayanaṃ saṃjñānaṃ yat parāyaṇam /
analyzed: yat niyānam nyayanam saṃjñānam yat parāyaṇam

original: RV_10,019.04c āvartanaṃ nivartanaṃ yo gopā api taṃ huve //
analyzed: āvartanam nivartanam yaḥ gopāḥ api tam huve

original: RV_10,019.05a ya udānaḍ vyayanaṃ ya udānaṭ parāyaṇam /
analyzed: yaḥ udānaṭ vyayanam yaḥ udānaṭ parāyaṇam

original: RV_10,019.05c āvartanaṃ nivartanam api gopā ni vartatām //
analyzed: āvartanam nivartanam api gopāḥ ni vartatām

original: RV_10,019.06a ā nivarta ni vartaya punar na indra gā dehi /
analyzed: ā nivarta ni vartaya punar naḥ indra gāḥ dehi

original: RV_10,019.06c jīvābhir bhunajāmahai //
analyzed: jīvābhiḥ bhunajāmahai

original: RV_10,019.07a pari vo viśvato dadha ūrjā ghṛtena payasā /
analyzed: pari vaḥ viśvatas dadhe ūrjā ghṛtena payasā

original: RV_10,019.07c ye devāḥ ke ca yajñiyās te rayyā saṃ sṛjantu naḥ //
analyzed: ye devāḥ ke ca yajñiyāḥ te rayyā sam sṛjantu naḥ

original: RV_10,019.08a ā nivartana vartaya ni nivartana vartaya /
analyzed: ā nivartana vartaya ni nivartana vartaya

original: RV_10,019.08c bhūmyāś catasraḥ pradiśas tābhya enā ni vartaya //
analyzed: bhūmyāḥ catasraḥ pradiśaḥ tābhyaḥ enāḥ ni vartaya

original: RV_10,020.01a bhadraṃ no api vātaya manaḥ //
analyzed: bhadram naḥ api vātaya manaḥ

original: RV_10,020.02a agnim īḷe bhujāṃ yaviṣṭhaṃ śāsā mitraṃ durdharītum /
analyzed: agnim īḍe bhujām yaviṣṭham śāsā mitram durdharītum

original: RV_10,020.02c yasya dharman svar enīḥ saparyanti mātur ūdhaḥ //
analyzed: yasya dharman svar enīḥ saparyanti mātuḥ ūdhaḥ

original: RV_10,020.03a yam āsā kṛpanīḷam bhāsāketuṃ vardhayanti /
analyzed: yam āsā kṛpa nīḍam bhāsā ketum vardhayanti

original: RV_10,020.03c bhrājate śreṇidan //
analyzed: bhrājate śreṇidan

original: RV_10,020.04a aryo viśāṃ gātur eti pra yad ānaḍ divo antān /
analyzed: aryaḥ viśām gātuḥ eti pra yat ānaṭ divaḥ antān

original: RV_10,020.04c kavir abhraṃ dīdyānaḥ //
analyzed: kaviḥ abhram dīdyānaḥ

original: RV_10,020.05a juṣad dhavyā mānuṣasyordhvas tasthāv ṛbhvā yajñe /
analyzed: juṣat havyā mānuṣasya ūrdhvaḥ tasthau ṛbhvāḥ yajñe

original: RV_10,020.05c minvan sadma pura eti //
analyzed: minvan sadma puras eti

original: RV_10,020.06a sa hi kṣemo havir yajñaḥ śruṣṭīd asya gātur eti /
analyzed: sa hi kṣemaḥ haviḥ yajñaḥ śruṣṭī id asya gātuḥ eti

original: RV_10,020.06c agniṃ devā vāśīmantam //
analyzed: agnim devāḥ vāśīmantam

original: RV_10,020.07a yajñāsāhaṃ duva iṣe 'gnim pūrvasya śevasya /
analyzed: yajñāsāham duvaḥ iṣe gnim pūrvasya śevasya

original: RV_10,020.07c adreḥ sūnum āyum āhuḥ //
analyzed: adreḥ sūnum āyum āhuḥ

original: RV_10,020.08a naro ye ke cāsmad ā viśvet te vāma ā syuḥ /
analyzed: naraḥ ye ke ca asmat ā viśvā id te vāme ā syuḥ

original: RV_10,020.08c agniṃ haviṣā vardhantaḥ //
analyzed: agnim haviṣā vardhantaḥ

original: RV_10,020.09a kṛṣṇaḥ śveto 'ruṣo yāmo asya bradhna ṛjra uta śoṇo yaśasvān /
analyzed: kṛṣṇaḥ śvetaḥ ruṣaḥ yāmaḥ asya bradhnaḥ ṛjraḥ uta śoṇaḥ yaśasvān

original: RV_10,020.09c hiraṇyarūpaṃ janitā jajāna //
analyzed: hiraṇya rūpam janitā jajāna

original: RV_10,020.10a evā te agne vimado manīṣām ūrjo napād amṛtebhiḥ sajoṣāḥ /
analyzed: eva te agne vimadaḥ manīṣām ūrjaḥ napāt amṛtebhiḥ sajoṣāḥ

original: RV_10,020.10c gira ā vakṣat sumatīr iyāna iṣam ūrjaṃ sukṣitiṃ viśvam ābhāḥ //
analyzed: giraḥ ā vakṣat sumatīḥ iyānaḥ iṣam ūrjam su kṣitim viśvam ābhāḥ

original: RV_10,021.01a āgniṃ na svavṛktibhir hotāraṃ tvā vṛṇīmahe /
analyzed: ā agnim na svavṛktibhiḥ hotāram tvā vṛṇīmahe

original: RV_10,021.01c yajñāya stīrṇabarhiṣe vi vo made śīram pāvakaśociṣaṃ vivakṣase //
analyzed: yajñāya stīrṇa barhiṣe vi vaḥ made śīram pāvaka śociṣam vivakṣase

original: RV_10,021.02a tvām u te svābhuvaḥ śumbhanty aśvarādhasaḥ /
analyzed: tvām u te su ābhuvaḥ śumbhanti aśva rādhasaḥ

original: RV_10,021.02c veti tvām upasecanī vi vo mada ṛjītir agna āhutir vivakṣase //
analyzed: vā iti tvām upasecanī vi vaḥ madaḥ ṛjītiḥ agne āhutiḥ vivakṣase

original: RV_10,021.03a tve dharmāṇa āsate juhūbhiḥ siñcatīr iva /
analyzed: tve dharmāṇaḥ āsate juhūbhiḥ siñcatīḥ iva

original: RV_10,021.03c kṛṣṇā rūpāṇy arjunā vi vo made viśvā adhi śriyo dhiṣe vivakṣase //
analyzed: kṛṣṇā rūpāṇi arjunā vi vaḥ made viśvāḥ adhi śriyaḥ dhiṣe vivakṣase

original: RV_10,021.04a yam agne manyase rayiṃ sahasāvann amartya /
analyzed: yam agne manyase rayim sahasāvan amartya

original: RV_10,021.04c tam ā no vājasātaye vi vo made yajñeṣu citram ā bharā vivakṣase //
analyzed: tam ā naḥ vājasātaye vi vaḥ made yajñeṣu citram ā bhara vivakṣase

original: RV_10,021.05a agnir jāto atharvaṇā vidad viśvāni kāvyā /
analyzed: agniḥ jātaḥ atharvaṇā vidat viśvāni kāvyā

original: RV_10,021.05c bhuvad dūto vivasvato vi vo made priyo yamasya kāmyo vivakṣase //
analyzed: bhuvat dūtaḥ vivasvataḥ vi vaḥ made priyaḥ yamasya kāmyaḥ vivakṣase

original: RV_10,021.06a tvāṃ yajñeṣv īḷate 'gne prayaty adhvare /
analyzed: tvām yajñeṣu īḍate gne prayati adhvare

original: RV_10,021.06c tvaṃ vasūni kāmyā vi vo made viśvā dadhāsi dāśuṣe vivakṣase //
analyzed: tvam vasūni kāmyā vi vaḥ made viśvā dadhāsi dāśuṣe vivakṣase

original: RV_10,021.07a tvāṃ yajñeṣv ṛtvijaṃ cārum agne ni ṣedire /
analyzed: tvām yajñeṣu ṛtvijam cārum agne ni sedire

original: RV_10,021.07c ghṛtapratīkam manuṣo vi vo made śukraṃ cetiṣṭham akṣabhir vivakṣase //
analyzed: ghṛta pratīkam manuṣaḥ vi vaḥ made śukram cetiṣṭham akṣabhiḥ vivakṣase

original: RV_10,021.08a agne śukreṇa śociṣoru prathayase bṛhat /
analyzed: agne śukreṇa śociṣā uru prathayase bṛhat

original: RV_10,021.08c abhikrandan vṛṣāyase vi vo made garbhaṃ dadhāsi jāmiṣu vivakṣase //
analyzed: abhikrandan vṛṣāyase vi vaḥ made garbham dadhāsi jāmiṣu vivakṣase

original: RV_10,022.01a kuha śruta indraḥ kasminn adya jane mitro na śrūyate /
analyzed: kuha śrutaḥ indraḥ kasmin adya jane mitraḥ na śrūyate

original: RV_10,022.01c ṛṣīṇāṃ vā yaḥ kṣaye guhā vā carkṛṣe girā //
analyzed: ṛṣīṇām vā yaḥ kṣaye guhā vā carkṛṣe girā

original: RV_10,022.02a iha śruta indro asme adya stave vajry ṛcīṣamaḥ /
analyzed: iha śrutaḥ indraḥ asme adya stave vajrī ṛcīṣamaḥ

original: RV_10,022.02c mitro na yo janeṣv ā yaśaś cakre asāmy ā //
analyzed: mitraḥ na yaḥ janeṣu ā yaśaḥ cakre asāmi ā

original: RV_10,022.03a maho yas patiḥ śavaso asāmy ā maho nṛmṇasya tūtujiḥ /
analyzed: mahaḥ yaḥ patiḥ śavasaḥ asāmi ā mahaḥ nṛmṇasya tūtujiḥ

original: RV_10,022.03c bhartā vajrasya dhṛṣṇoḥ pitā putram iva priyam //
analyzed: bhartā vajrasya dhṛṣṇoḥ pitā putram iva priyam

original: RV_10,022.04a yujāno aśvā vātasya dhunī devo devasya vajrivaḥ /
analyzed: yujānaḥ aśvā vātasya dhunī devaḥ devasya vajrivas

original: RV_10,022.04c syantā pathā virukmatā sṛjāna stoṣy adhvanaḥ //
analyzed: syantā pathā virukmatā sṛjāna stoṣi adhvanaḥ

original: RV_10,022.05a tvaṃ tyā cid vātasyāśvāgā ṛjrā tmanā vahadhyai /
analyzed: tvam tyā cit vātasya aśvāgāḥ ṛjrā tmanā vahadhyai

original: RV_10,022.05c yayor devo na martyo yantā nakir vidāyyaḥ //
analyzed: yayoḥ devaḥ na martyaḥ yantā nakir vidāyyaḥ

original: RV_10,022.06a adha gmantośanā pṛcchate vāṃ kadarthā na ā gṛham /
analyzed: adha gmantā uśanā pṛcchate vām kadarthāḥ naḥ ā gṛham

original: RV_10,022.06c ā jagmathuḥ parākād divaś ca gmaś ca martyam //
analyzed: ā jagmathuḥ parākāt divaḥ ca gmaḥ ca martyam

original: RV_10,022.07a ā na indra pṛkṣase 'smākam brahmodyatam /
analyzed: ā naḥ indra pṛkṣase smākam brahma udyatam

original: RV_10,022.07c tat tvā yācāmahe 'vaḥ śuṣṇaṃ yad dhann amānuṣam //
analyzed: tat tvā yācāmahe vaḥ śuṣṇam yat han amānuṣam

original: RV_10,022.08a akarmā dasyur abhi no amantur anyavrato amānuṣaḥ /
analyzed: akarmā dasyuḥ abhi naḥ amantuḥ anya vrataḥ amānuṣaḥ

original: RV_10,022.08c tvaṃ tasyāmitrahan vadhar dāsasya dambhaya //
analyzed: tvam tasya amitra han vadhar dāsasya dambhaya

original: RV_10,022.09a tvaṃ na indra śūra śūrair uta tvotāso barhaṇā /
analyzed: tvam naḥ indra śūra śūraiḥ uta tvotāsaḥ barhaṇā

original: RV_10,022.09c purutrā te vi pūrtayo navanta kṣoṇayo yathā //
analyzed: purutrā te vi pūrtayaḥ navanta kṣoṇayaḥ yathā

original: RV_10,022.10a tvaṃ tān vṛtrahatye codayo nṝn kārpāṇe śūra vajrivaḥ /
analyzed: tvam tān vṛtra hatye codayaḥ nṝn kārpāṇe śūra vajrivas

original: RV_10,022.10c guhā yadī kavīnāṃ viśāṃ nakṣatraśavasām //
analyzed: guhā yadī kavīnām viśām nakṣatra śavasām

original: RV_10,022.11a makṣū tā ta indra dānāpnasa ākṣāṇe śūra vajrivaḥ /
analyzed: makṣū tā te indra dānā apnasaḥ ākṣāṇe śūra vajrivas

original: RV_10,022.11c yad dha śuṣṇasya dambhayo jātaṃ viśvaṃ sayāvabhiḥ //
analyzed: yat ha śuṣṇasya dambhayaḥ jātam viśvam sa yāvabhiḥ

original: RV_10,022.12a mākudhryag indra śūra vasvīr asme bhūvann abhiṣṭayaḥ /
analyzed: mākudhryak indra śūra vasvīḥ asme bhūvan abhiṣṭayaḥ

original: RV_10,022.12c vayaṃ-vayaṃ ta āsāṃ sumne syāma vajrivaḥ //
analyzed: vayam vayam te āsām sumne syāma vajrivas

original: RV_10,022.13a asme tā ta indra santu satyāhiṃsantīr upaspṛśaḥ /
analyzed: asme tā te indra santu satyā a hiṃsantīḥ upaspṛśaḥ

original: RV_10,022.13c vidyāma yāsām bhujo dhenūnāṃ na vajrivaḥ //
analyzed: vidyāma yāsām bhujaḥ dhenūnām na vajrivas

original: RV_10,022.14a ahastā yad apadī vardhata kṣāḥ śacībhir vedyānām /
analyzed: a hastā yat a padī vardhata kṣāḥ śacībhiḥ vedyānām

original: RV_10,022.14c śuṣṇam pari pradakṣiṇid viśvāyave ni śiśnathaḥ //
analyzed: śuṣṇam pari pradakṣiṇit viśvāyave ni śiśnathaḥ

original: RV_10,022.15a pibā-pibed indra śūra somam mā riṣaṇyo vasavāna vasuḥ san /
analyzed: piba a piba id indra śūra somam mā riṣaṇyaḥ vasavāna vasuḥ san

original: RV_10,022.15c uta trāyasva gṛṇato maghono mahaś ca rāyo revatas kṛdhī naḥ //
analyzed: uta trāyasva gṛṇataḥ maghonaḥ mahaḥ ca rāyaḥ revataḥ kṛdhī naḥ

original: RV_10,023.01a yajāmaha indraṃ vajradakṣiṇaṃ harīṇāṃ rathyaṃ vivratānām /
analyzed: yajāmahe indram vajra dakṣiṇam harīṇām rathyam vivratānām

original: RV_10,023.01c pra śmaśru dodhuvad ūrdhvathā bhūd vi senābhir dayamāno vi rādhasā //
analyzed: pra śmaśru dodhuvat ūrdhvathā bhūt vi senābhiḥ dayamānaḥ vi rādhasā

original: RV_10,023.02a harī nv asya yā vane vide vasv indro maghair maghavā vṛtrahā bhuvat /
analyzed: harī nu asya yā vane vide vasū indraḥ maghaiḥ maghavā vṛtrahā bhuvat

original: RV_10,023.02c ṛbhur vāja ṛbhukṣāḥ patyate śavo 'va kṣṇaumi dāsasya nāma cit //
analyzed: ṛbhuḥ vājaḥ ṛbhukṣāḥ patyate śavaḥ vaḥ kṣṇaumi dāsasya nāma cit

original: RV_10,023.03a yadā vajraṃ hiraṇyam id athā rathaṃ harī yam asya vahato vi sūribhiḥ /
analyzed: yadā vajram hiraṇyam id athā ratham harī yam asya vahataḥ vi sūribhiḥ

original: RV_10,023.03c ā tiṣṭhati maghavā sanaśruta indro vājasya dīrghaśravasas patiḥ //
analyzed: ā tiṣṭhati maghavā sana śrutaḥ indraḥ vājasya dīrgha śravasaḥ patiḥ

original: RV_10,023.04a so cin nu vṛṣṭir yūthyā svā sacāṃ indraḥ śmaśrūṇi haritābhi pruṣṇute /
analyzed: sā u cit nu vṛṣṭiḥ yūthyā svā sacā indraḥ śmaśrūṇi haritā abhi pruṣṇute

original: RV_10,023.04c ava veti sukṣayaṃ sute madhūd id dhūnoti vāto yathā vanam //
analyzed: ava veti su kṣayam sute madhu ud id dhūnoti vātaḥ yathā vanam

original: RV_10,023.05a yo vācā vivāco mṛdhravācaḥ purū sahasrāśivā jaghāna /
analyzed: yaḥ vācā vivācaḥ mṛdhravācaḥ purū sahasrā aśivā jaghāna

original: RV_10,023.05c tat-tad id asya pauṃsyaṃ gṛṇīmasi piteva yas taviṣīṃ vāvṛdhe śavaḥ //
analyzed: tat tat id asya pauṃsyam gṛṇīmasi pitā iva yaḥ taviṣīm vāvṛdhe śavaḥ

original: RV_10,023.06a stomaṃ ta indra vimadā ajījanann apūrvyam purutamaṃ sudānave /
analyzed: stomam te indra vimadāḥ ajījanan apūrvyam purutamam sudānave

original: RV_10,023.06c vidmā hy asya bhojanam inasya yad ā paśuṃ na gopāḥ karāmahe //
analyzed: vidma hi asya bhojanam inasya yat ā paśum na gopāḥ karāmahe

original: RV_10,023.07a mākir na enā sakhyā vi yauṣus tava cendra vimadasya ca ṛṣeḥ /
analyzed: mākir naḥ enā sakhyā vi yauṣuḥ tava ca indra vimadasya ca ṛṣeḥ

original: RV_10,023.07c vidmā hi te pramatiṃ deva jāmivad asme te santu sakhyā śivāni //
analyzed: vidma hi te pramatim deva jāmi vat asme te santu sakhyā śivāni

original: RV_10,024.01a indra somam imam piba madhumantaṃ camū sutam /
analyzed: indra somam imam piba madhumantam camū sutam

original: RV_10,024.01c asme rayiṃ ni dhāraya vi vo made sahasriṇam purūvaso vivakṣase //
analyzed: asme rayim ni dhāraya vi vaḥ made sahasriṇam purūvaso vivakṣase

original: RV_10,024.02a tvāṃ yajñebhir ukthair upa havyebhir īmahe /
analyzed: tvām yajñebhiḥ ukthaiḥ upa havyebhiḥ īmahe

original: RV_10,024.02c śacīpate śacīnāṃ vi vo made śreṣṭhaṃ no dhehi vāryaṃ vivakṣase //
analyzed: śacīpate śacīnām vi vaḥ made śreṣṭham naḥ dhehi vāryam vivakṣase

original: RV_10,024.03a yas patir vāryāṇām asi radhrasya coditā /
analyzed: yaḥ patiḥ vāryāṇām asi radhrasya coditā

original: RV_10,024.03c indra stotṝṇām avitā vi vo made dviṣo naḥ pāhy aṃhaso vivakṣase //
analyzed: indra stotṝṇām avitā vi vaḥ made dviṣaḥ naḥ pāhi aṃhasaḥ vivakṣase

original: RV_10,024.04a yuvaṃ śakrā māyāvinā samīcī nir amanthatam /
analyzed: yuvam śakrā māyāvinā samīcī niḥ amanthatam

original: RV_10,024.04c vimadena yad īḷitā nāsatyā niramanthatam //
analyzed: vimadena yat īḍitā nāsatyā niramanthatam

original: RV_10,024.05a viśve devā akṛpanta samīcyor niṣpatantyoḥ /
analyzed: viśve devāḥ akṛpanta samīcyoḥ niṣpatantyoḥ

original: RV_10,024.05c nāsatyāv abruvan devāḥ punar ā vahatād iti //
analyzed: nāsatyau abruvan devāḥ punar ā vahatāt iti

original: RV_10,024.06a madhuman me parāyaṇam madhumat punar āyanam /
analyzed: madhumat me parāyaṇam madhumat punar āyanam

original: RV_10,024.06c tā no devā devatayā yuvam madhumatas kṛtam //
analyzed: tā naḥ devā devatayā yuvam madhumataḥ kṛtam

original: RV_10,025.01a bhadraṃ no api vātaya mano dakṣam uta kratum /
analyzed: bhadram naḥ api vātaya manaḥ dakṣam uta kratum

original: RV_10,025.01c adhā te sakhye andhaso vi vo made raṇan gāvo na yavase vivakṣase //
analyzed: adhā te sakhye andhasaḥ vi vaḥ made raṇan gāvaḥ na yavase vivakṣase

original: RV_10,025.02a hṛdispṛśas ta āsate viśveṣu soma dhāmasu /
analyzed: hṛdispṛśaḥ te āsate viśveṣu soma dhāmasu

original: RV_10,025.02c adhā kāmā ime mama vi vo made vi tiṣṭhante vasūyavo vivakṣase //
analyzed: adhā kāmāḥ ime mama vi vaḥ made vi tiṣṭhante vasūyavaḥ vivakṣase

original: RV_10,025.03a uta vratāni soma te prāham mināmi pākyā /
analyzed: uta vratāni soma te pra aham mināmi pākyā

original: RV_10,025.03c adhā piteva sūnave vi vo made mṛḷā no abhi cid vadhād vivakṣase //
analyzed: adhā pitā iva sūnave vi vaḥ made mṛḍa naḥ abhi cit vadhāt vivakṣase

original: RV_10,025.04a sam u pra yanti dhītayaḥ sargāso 'vatāṃ iva /
analyzed: sam u pra yanti dhītayaḥ sargāsaḥ vatām iva

original: RV_10,025.04c kratuṃ naḥ soma jīvase vi vo made dhārayā camasāṃ iva vivakṣase //
analyzed: kratum naḥ soma jīvase vi vaḥ made dhārayā camasān iva vivakṣase

original: RV_10,025.05a tava tye soma śaktibhir nikāmāso vy ṛṇvire /
analyzed: tava tye soma śaktibhiḥ nikāmāsaḥ vi ṛṇvire

original: RV_10,025.05c gṛtsasya dhīrās tavaso vi vo made vrajaṃ gomantam aśvinaṃ vivakṣase //
analyzed: gṛtsasya dhīrāḥ tavasaḥ vi vaḥ made vrajam gomantam aśvinam vivakṣase

original: RV_10,025.06a paśuṃ naḥ soma rakṣasi purutrā viṣṭhitaṃ jagat /
analyzed: paśum naḥ soma rakṣasi purutrā viṣṭhitam jagat

original: RV_10,025.06c samākṛṇoṣi jīvase vi vo made viśvā sampaśyan bhuvanā vivakṣase //
analyzed: samākṛṇoṣi jīvase vi vaḥ made viśvā sampaśyan bhuvanā vivakṣase

original: RV_10,025.07a tvaṃ naḥ soma viśvato gopā adābhyo bhava /
analyzed: tvam naḥ soma viśvatas gopāḥ adābhyaḥ bhava

original: RV_10,025.07c sedha rājann apa sridho vi vo made mā no duḥśaṃsa īśatā vivakṣase //
analyzed: sedha rājan apa sridhaḥ vi vaḥ made mā naḥ duḥśaṃsaḥ īśatā vivakṣase

original: RV_10,025.08a tvaṃ naḥ soma sukratur vayodheyāya jāgṛhi /
analyzed: tvam naḥ soma su kratuḥ vayodheyāya jāgṛhi

original: RV_10,025.08c kṣetravittaro manuṣo vi vo made druho naḥ pāhy aṃhaso vivakṣase //
analyzed: kṣetra vittaraḥ manuṣaḥ vi vaḥ made druhaḥ naḥ pāhi aṃhasaḥ vivakṣase

original: RV_10,025.09a tvaṃ no vṛtrahantamendrasyendo śivaḥ sakhā /
analyzed: tvam naḥ vṛtra hantama indrasya indo śivaḥ sakhā

original: RV_10,025.09c yat sīṃ havante samithe vi vo made yudhyamānās tokasātau vivakṣase //
analyzed: yat sīm havante samithe vi vaḥ made yudhyamānāḥ toka sātau vivakṣase

original: RV_10,025.10a ayaṃ gha sa turo mada indrasya vardhata priyaḥ /
analyzed: ayam gha sa turaḥ madaḥ indrasya vardhata priyaḥ

original: RV_10,025.10c ayaṃ kakṣīvato maho vi vo made matiṃ viprasya vardhayad vivakṣase //
analyzed: ayam kakṣīvataḥ mahaḥ vi vaḥ made matim viprasya vardhayat vivakṣase

original: RV_10,025.11a ayaṃ viprāya dāśuṣe vājāṃ iyarti gomataḥ /
analyzed: ayam viprāya dāśuṣe vājān iyarti gomataḥ

original: RV_10,025.11c ayaṃ saptabhya ā varaṃ vi vo made prāndhaṃ śroṇaṃ ca tāriṣad vivakṣase //
analyzed: ayam saptabhyaḥ ā varam vi vaḥ made pra andham śroṇam ca tāriṣat vivakṣase

original: RV_10,026.01a pra hy acchā manīṣā spārhā yanti niyutaḥ /
analyzed: pra hi acchā manīṣā spārhāḥ yanti niyutaḥ

original: RV_10,026.01c pra dasrā niyudrathaḥ pūṣā aviṣṭu māhinaḥ //
analyzed: pra dasrā niyut rathaḥ pūṣā aviṣṭu māhinaḥ

original: RV_10,026.02a yasya tyan mahitvaṃ vātāpyam ayaṃ janaḥ /
analyzed: yasya tyad mahi tvam vātāpyam ayam janaḥ

original: RV_10,026.02c vipra ā vaṃsad dhītibhiś ciketa suṣṭutīnām //
analyzed: vipraḥ ā vaṃsat dhītibhiḥ ciketa suṣṭutīnām

original: RV_10,026.03a sa veda suṣṭutīnām indur na pūṣā vṛṣā /
analyzed: sa veda suṣṭutīnām induḥ na pūṣā vṛṣā

original: RV_10,026.03c abhi psuraḥ pruṣāyati vrajaṃ na ā pruṣāyati //
analyzed: abhi psuraḥ pruṣāyati vrajam naḥ ā pruṣāyati

original: RV_10,026.04a maṃsīmahi tvā vayam asmākaṃ deva pūṣan /
analyzed: maṃsīmahi tvā vayam asmākam deva pūṣan

original: RV_10,026.04c matīnāṃ ca sādhanaṃ viprāṇāṃ cādhavam //
analyzed: matīnām ca sādhanam viprāṇām ca ādhavam

original: RV_10,026.05a pratyardhir yajñānām aśvahayo rathānām /
analyzed: pratyardhiḥ yajñānām aśva hayaḥ rathānām

original: RV_10,026.05c ṛṣiḥ sa yo manurhito viprasya yāvayatsakhaḥ //
analyzed: ṛṣiḥ sa yaḥ manuḥ hitaḥ viprasya yāvayat sakhaḥ

original: RV_10,026.06a ādhīṣamāṇāyāḥ patiḥ śucāyāś ca śucasya ca /
analyzed: ādhīṣamāṇāyāḥ patiḥ śucāyāḥ ca śucasya ca

original: RV_10,026.06c vāsovāyo 'vīnām ā vāsāṃsi marmṛjat //
analyzed: vāsovāyo vīnām ā vāsāṃsi marmṛjat

original: RV_10,026.07a ino vājānām patir inaḥ puṣṭīnāṃ sakhā /
analyzed: inaḥ vājānām patiḥ inaḥ puṣṭīnām sakhā

original: RV_10,026.07c pra śmaśru haryato dūdhod vi vṛthā yo adābhyaḥ //
analyzed: pra śmaśru haryataḥ dūdhot vi vṛthā yaḥ adābhyaḥ

original: RV_10,026.08a ā te rathasya pūṣann ajā dhuraṃ vavṛtyuḥ /
analyzed: ā te rathasya pūṣan ajāḥ dhuram vavṛtyuḥ

original: RV_10,026.08c viśvasyārthinaḥ sakhā sanojā anapacyutaḥ //
analyzed: viśvasya arthinaḥ sakhā sanaḥ jāḥ an apacyutaḥ

original: RV_10,026.09a asmākam ūrjā ratham pūṣā aviṣṭu māhinaḥ /
analyzed: asmākam ūrjā ratham pūṣā aviṣṭu māhinaḥ

original: RV_10,026.09c bhuvad vājānāṃ vṛdha imaṃ naḥ śṛṇavad dhavam //
analyzed: bhuvat vājānām vṛdhaḥ imam naḥ śṛṇavat dhavam

original: RV_10,027.01a asat su me jaritaḥ sābhivego yat sunvate yajamānāya śikṣam /
analyzed: asat su me jaritar sa abhivegaḥ yat sunvate yajamānāya śikṣam

original: RV_10,027.01c anāśīrdām aham asmi prahantā satyadhvṛtaṃ vṛjināyantam ābhum //
analyzed: an āśīḥ dām aham asmi prahantā satya dhvṛtam vṛjināyantam ābhum

original: RV_10,027.02a yadīd ahaṃ yudhaye saṃnayāny adevayūn tanvā śūśujānān /
analyzed: yadi id aham yudhaye saṃnayāni adevayūn tanvā śūśujānān

original: RV_10,027.02c amā te tumraṃ vṛṣabham pacāni tīvraṃ sutam pañcadaśaṃ ni ṣiñcam //
analyzed: amā te tumram vṛṣabham pacāni tīvram sutam pañcadaśam ni siñcam

original: RV_10,027.03a nāhaṃ taṃ veda ya iti bravīty adevayūn samaraṇe jaghanvān /
analyzed: na aham tam veda yaḥ iti bravīti adevayūn samaraṇe jaghanvān

original: RV_10,027.03c yadāvākhyat samaraṇam ṛghāvad ād id dha me vṛṣabhā pra bruvanti //
analyzed: yadā avākhyat samaraṇam ṛghāvat āt id ha me vṛṣabhā pra bruvanti

original: RV_10,027.04a yad ajñāteṣu vṛjaneṣv āsaṃ viśve sato maghavāno ma āsan /
analyzed: yat ajñāteṣu vṛjaneṣu āsam viśve sataḥ maghavānaḥ me āsan

original: RV_10,027.04c jināmi vet kṣema ā santam ābhum pra taṃ kṣiṇām parvate pādagṛhya //
analyzed: jināmi vet kṣeme ā santam ābhum pra tam kṣiṇām parvate pādagṛhya

original: RV_10,027.05a na vā u māṃ vṛjane vārayante na parvatāso yad aham manasye /
analyzed: na vai u mām vṛjane vārayante na parvatāsaḥ yat aham manasye

original: RV_10,027.05c mama svanāt kṛdhukarṇo bhayāta eved anu dyūn kiraṇaḥ sam ejāt //
analyzed: mama svanāt kṛdhu karṇaḥ bhayāt eva id anu dyūn kiraṇaḥ sam ejāt

original: RV_10,027.06a darśan nv atra śṛtapāṃ anindrān bāhukṣadaḥ śarave patyamānān /
analyzed: darśan nu atra śṛta pām an indrān bāhukṣadaḥ śarave patyamānān

original: RV_10,027.06c ghṛṣuṃ vā ye niniduḥ sakhāyam adhy ū nv eṣu pavayo vavṛtyuḥ //
analyzed: ghṛṣum vā ye niniduḥ sakhāyam adhi u nu eṣu pavayaḥ vavṛtyuḥ

original: RV_10,027.07a abhūr v aukṣīr vy u āyur ānaḍ darṣan nu pūrvo aparo nu darṣat /
analyzed: abhūḥ u aukṣīḥ vi u āyuḥ ānaṭ darṣat nu pūrvaḥ aparaḥ nu darṣat

original: RV_10,027.07c dve pavaste pari taṃ na bhūto yo asya pāre rajaso viveṣa //
analyzed: dve pavaste pari tam na bhūtaḥ yaḥ asya pāre rajasaḥ viveṣa

original: RV_10,027.08a gāvo yavam prayutā aryo akṣan tā apaśyaṃ sahagopāś carantīḥ /
analyzed: gāvaḥ yavam prayutāḥ aryaḥ akṣan tāḥ apaśyam saha gopāḥ carantīḥ

original: RV_10,027.08c havā id aryo abhitaḥ sam āyan kiyad āsu svapatiś chandayāte //
analyzed: havāḥ id aryaḥ abhitas sam āyan kiyat āsu sva patiḥ chandayāte

original: RV_10,027.09a saṃ yad vayaṃ yavasādo janānām ahaṃ yavāda urvajre antaḥ /
analyzed: sam yat vayam yavasādaḥ janānām aham yava ādaḥ urvajre antar

original: RV_10,027.09c atrā yukto 'vasātāram icchād atho ayuktaṃ yunajad vavanvān //
analyzed: atrā yuktaḥ vasātāram icchāt atha u a yuktam yunajat vavanvān

original: RV_10,027.10a atred u me maṃsase satyam uktaṃ dvipāc ca yac catuṣpāt saṃsṛjāni /
analyzed: atrā id u me maṃsase satyam uktam dvipād ca yat catuṣpād saṃsṛjāni

original: RV_10,027.10c strībhir yo atra vṛṣaṇam pṛtanyād ayuddho asya vi bhajāni vedaḥ //
analyzed: strībhiḥ yaḥ atra vṛṣaṇam pṛtanyāt ayuddhaḥ asya vi bhajāni vedaḥ

original: RV_10,027.11a yasyānakṣā duhitā jātv āsa kas tāṃ vidvāṃ abhi manyāte andhām /
analyzed: yasya anakṣā duhitā jātu āsa kaḥ tām vidvān abhi manyāte andhām

original: RV_10,027.11c kataro menim prati tam mucāte ya īṃ vahāte ya īṃ vā vareyāt //
analyzed: kataraḥ menim prati tam mucāte yaḥ īm vahāte yaḥ īm vā vareyāt

original: RV_10,027.12a kiyatī yoṣā maryato vadhūyoḥ pariprītā panyasā vāryeṇa /
analyzed: kiyatī yoṣā maryataḥ vadhūyoḥ pariprītā panyasā vāryeṇa

original: RV_10,027.12c bhadrā vadhūr bhavati yat supeśāḥ svayaṃ sā mitraṃ vanute jane cit //
analyzed: bhadrā vadhūḥ bhavati yat supeśāḥ svayam sā mitram vanute jane cit

original: RV_10,027.13a patto jagāra pratyañcam atti śīrṣṇā śiraḥ prati dadhau varūtham /
analyzed: pattas jagāra pratyañcam atti śīrṣṇā śiraḥ prati dadhau varūtham

original: RV_10,027.13c āsīna ūrdhvām upasi kṣiṇāti nyaṅṅ uttānām anv eti bhūmim //
analyzed: āsīnaḥ ūrdhvām upasi kṣiṇāti nyaṅ uttānām anu eti bhūmim

original: RV_10,027.14a bṛhann acchāyo apalāśo arvā tasthau mātā viṣito atti garbhaḥ /
analyzed: bṛhan acchāyaḥ apalāśaḥ arvā tasthau mātā viṣitaḥ atti garbhaḥ

original: RV_10,027.14c anyasyā vatsaṃ rihatī mimāya kayā bhuvā ni dadhe dhenur ūdhaḥ //
analyzed: anyasyāḥ vatsam rihatī mimāya kayā bhuvā ni dadhe dhenuḥ ūdhaḥ

original: RV_10,027.15a sapta vīrāso adharād ud āyann aṣṭottarāttāt sam ajagmiran te /
analyzed: sapta vīrāsaḥ adharāt ud āyan aṣṭa uttarāttāt sam ajagmiran te

original: RV_10,027.15c nava paścātāt sthivimanta āyan daśa prāk sānu vi tiranty aśnaḥ //
analyzed: nava paścātāt sthivimantaḥ āyan daśa prāk sānu vi tiranti aśnaḥ

original: RV_10,027.16a daśānām ekaṃ kapilaṃ samānaṃ taṃ hinvanti kratave pāryāya /
analyzed: daśānām ekam kapilam samānam tam hinvanti kratave pāryāya

original: RV_10,027.16c garbham mātā sudhitaṃ vakṣaṇāsv avenantaṃ tuṣayantī bibharti //
analyzed: garbham mātā sudhitam vakṣaṇāsu a venantam tuṣayantī bibharti

original: RV_10,027.17a pīvānam meṣam apacanta vīrā nyuptā akṣā anu dīva āsan /
analyzed: pīvānam meṣam apacanta vīrāḥ nyuptāḥ akṣāḥ anu dīvaḥ āsan

original: RV_10,027.17c dvā dhanum bṛhatīm apsv antaḥ pavitravantā carataḥ punantā //
