original: RV_10,050.01a pra vo mahe mandamānāyāndhaso 'rcā viśvānarāya viśvābhuve /
analyzed: pra vaḥ mahe mandamānāya andhasaḥ rcā viśvānarāya viśvābhuve

original: RV_10,050.01c indrasya yasya sumakhaṃ saho mahi śravo nṛmṇaṃ ca rodasī saparyataḥ //
analyzed: indrasya yasya su makham sahaḥ mahi śravaḥ nṛmṇam ca rodasī saparyataḥ

original: RV_10,050.02a so cin nu sakhyā narya ina stutaś carkṛtya indro māvate nare /
analyzed: saḥ cit nu sakhyā naryaḥ ina stutaḥ carkṛtyaḥ indraḥ māvate nare

original: RV_10,050.02c viśvāsu dhūrṣu vājakṛtyeṣu satpate vṛtre vāpsv abhi śūra mandase //
analyzed: viśvāsu dhūrṣu vājakṛtyeṣu satpate vṛtre vā apsu abhi śūra mandase

original: RV_10,050.03a ke te nara indra ye ta iṣe ye te sumnaṃ sadhanyam iyakṣān /
analyzed: ke te naraḥ indra ye te iṣe ye te sumnam sa dhanyam iyakṣān

original: RV_10,050.03c ke te vājāyāsuryāya hinvire ke apsu svāsūrvarāsu pauṃsye //
analyzed: ke te vājāya asuryāya hinvire ke apsu svāsu urvarāsu pauṃsye

original: RV_10,050.04a bhuvas tvam indra brahmaṇā mahān bhuvo viśveṣu savaneṣu yajñiyaḥ /
analyzed: bhuvaḥ tvam indra brahmaṇā mahān bhuvaḥ viśveṣu savaneṣu yajñiyaḥ

original: RV_10,050.04c bhuvo nṝṃś cyautno viśvasmin bhare jyeṣṭhaś ca mantro viśvacarṣaṇe //
analyzed: bhuvaḥ nṝn cyautnaḥ viśvasmin bhare jyeṣṭhaḥ ca mantraḥ viśvacarṣaṇe

original: RV_10,050.05a avā nu kaṃ jyāyān yajñavanaso mahīṃ ta omātrāṃ kṛṣṭayo viduḥ /
analyzed: avā nu kam jyāyān yajñavanasaḥ mahīm te omātrām kṛṣṭayaḥ viduḥ

original: RV_10,050.05c aso nu kam ajaro vardhāś ca viśved etā savanā tūtumā kṛṣe //
analyzed: asaḥ nu kam ajaraḥ vardhāḥ ca viśvā id etā savanā tūtumā kṛṣe

original: RV_10,050.06a etā viśvā savanā tūtumā kṛṣe svayaṃ sūno sahaso yāni dadhiṣe /
analyzed: etā viśvā savanā tūtumā kṛṣe svayam sūno sahasaḥ yāni dadhiṣe

original: RV_10,050.06c varāya te pātraṃ dharmaṇe tanā yajño mantro brahmodyataṃ vacaḥ //
analyzed: varāya te pātram dharmaṇe tanā yajñaḥ mantraḥ brahma udyatam vacaḥ

original: RV_10,050.07a ye te vipra brahmakṛtaḥ sute sacā vasūnāṃ ca vasunaś ca dāvane /
analyzed: ye te vipra brahma kṛtaḥ sute sacā vasūnām ca vasunaḥ ca dāvane

original: RV_10,050.07c pra te sumnasya manasā pathā bhuvan made sutasya somyasyāndhasaḥ //
analyzed: pra te sumnasya manasā pathā bhuvan made sutasya somyasya andhasaḥ

original: RV_10,051.01a mahat tad ulbaṃ sthaviraṃ tad āsīd yenāviṣṭitaḥ praviveśithāpaḥ /
analyzed: mahat tat ulbam sthaviram tat āsīt yena āviṣṭitaḥ praviveśitha apaḥ

original: RV_10,051.01c viśvā apaśyad bahudhā te agne jātavedas tanvo deva ekaḥ //
analyzed: viśvāḥ apaśyat bahudhā te agne jātavedaḥ tanvaḥ devaḥ ekaḥ

original: RV_10,051.02a ko mā dadarśa katamaḥ sa devo yo me tanvo bahudhā paryapaśyat /
analyzed: kaḥ mā dadarśa katamaḥ sa devaḥ yaḥ me tanvaḥ bahudhā paryapaśyat

original: RV_10,051.02c kvāha mitrāvaruṇā kṣiyanty agner viśvāḥ samidho devayānīḥ //
analyzed: kva aha mitrāvaruṇā kṣiyanti agneḥ viśvāḥ samidhaḥ deva yānīḥ

original: RV_10,051.03a aicchāma tvā bahudhā jātavedaḥ praviṣṭam agne apsv oṣadhīṣu /
analyzed: aicchāma tvā bahudhā jātavedaḥ praviṣṭam agne apsu oṣadhīṣu

original: RV_10,051.03c taṃ tvā yamo acikec citrabhāno daśāntaruṣyād atirocamānam //
analyzed: tam tvā yamaḥ aciket citrabhāno daśa antaruṣyāt atirocamānam

original: RV_10,051.04a hotrād ahaṃ varuṇa bibhyad āyaṃ ned eva mā yunajann atra devāḥ /
analyzed: hotrāt aham varuṇa bibhyat āyam na id eva mā yunajan atra devāḥ

original: RV_10,051.04c tasya me tanvo bahudhā niviṣṭā etam arthaṃ na ciketāham agniḥ //
analyzed: tasya me tanvaḥ bahudhā niviṣṭāḥ etam artham na ciketa aham agniḥ

original: RV_10,051.05a ehi manur devayur yajñakāmo 'raṅkṛtyā tamasi kṣeṣy agne /
analyzed: ehi manuḥ devayuḥ yajña kāmaḥ raṅkṛtya tamasi kṣeṣi agne

original: RV_10,051.05c sugān pathaḥ kṛṇuhi devayānān vaha havyāni sumanasyamānaḥ //
analyzed: su gān pathaḥ kṛṇuhi deva yānān vaha havyāni sumanasyamānaḥ

original: RV_10,051.06a agneḥ pūrve bhrātaro artham etaṃ rathīvādhvānam anv āvarīvuḥ /
analyzed: agneḥ pūrve bhrātaraḥ artham etam rathī iva adhvānam anu āvarīvuḥ

original: RV_10,051.06c tasmād bhiyā varuṇa dūram āyaṃ gauro na kṣepnor avije jyāyāḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt bhiyā varuṇa dūram āyam gauraḥ na kṣepnoḥ avije jyāyāḥ

original: RV_10,051.07a kurmas ta āyur ajaraṃ yad agne yathā yukto jātavedo na riṣyāḥ /
analyzed: kurmaḥ te āyuḥ ajaram yat agne yathā yuktaḥ jātavedaḥ na riṣyāḥ

original: RV_10,051.07c athā vahāsi sumanasyamāno bhāgaṃ devebhyo haviṣaḥ sujāta //
analyzed: athā vahāsi sumanasyamānaḥ bhāgam devebhyaḥ haviṣaḥ su jāta

original: RV_10,051.08a prayājān me anuyājāṃś ca kevalān ūrjasvantaṃ haviṣo datta bhāgam /
analyzed: prayājān me anuyājān ca kevalān ūrjasvantam haviṣaḥ datta bhāgam

original: RV_10,051.08c ghṛtaṃ cāpām puruṣaṃ cauṣadhīnām agneś ca dīrgham āyur astu devāḥ //
analyzed: ghṛtam ca apām puruṣam ca oṣadhīnām agneḥ ca dīrgham āyuḥ astu devāḥ

original: RV_10,051.09a tava prayājā anuyājāś ca kevala ūrjasvanto haviṣaḥ santu bhāgāḥ /
analyzed: tava prayājāḥ anuyājāḥ ca kevale ūrjasvantaḥ haviṣaḥ santu bhāgāḥ

original: RV_10,051.09c tavāgne yajño 'yam astu sarvas tubhyaṃ namantām pradiśaś catasraḥ //
analyzed: tava agne yajñaḥ yam astu sarvaḥ tubhyam namantām pradiśaḥ catasraḥ

original: RV_10,052.01a viśve devāḥ śāstana mā yatheha hotā vṛto manavai yan niṣadya /
analyzed: viśve devāḥ śāstana mā yathā iha hotā vṛtaḥ manavai yat niṣadya

original: RV_10,052.01c pra me brūta bhāgadheyaṃ yathā vo yena pathā havyam ā vo vahāni //
analyzed: pra me brūta bhāgadheyam yathā vaḥ yena pathā havyam ā vaḥ vahāni

original: RV_10,052.02a ahaṃ hotā ny asīdaṃ yajīyān viśve devā maruto mā junanti /
analyzed: aham hotā ni asīdam yajīyān viśve devāḥ marutaḥ mā junanti

original: RV_10,052.02c ahar-ahar aśvinādhvaryavaṃ vām brahmā samid bhavati sāhutir vām //
analyzed: ahar ahar aśvinā ādhvaryavam vām brahmā samidh bhavati sā āhutiḥ vām

original: RV_10,052.03a ayaṃ yo hotā kir u sa yamasya kam apy ūhe yat samañjanti devāḥ /
analyzed: ayam yaḥ hotā kis u sa yamasya kam api ūhe yat samañjanti devāḥ

original: RV_10,052.03c ahar-ahar jāyate māsi-māsy athā devā dadhire havyavāham //
analyzed: ahar ahar jāyate māsi māsi athā devāḥ dadhire havyavāham

original: RV_10,052.04a māṃ devā dadhire havyavāham apamluktam bahu kṛcchrā carantam /
analyzed: mām devāḥ dadhire havya vāham apamluktam bahu kṛcchrā carantam

original: RV_10,052.04c agnir vidvān yajñaṃ naḥ kalpayāti pañcayāmaṃ trivṛtaṃ saptatantum //
analyzed: agniḥ vidvān yajñam naḥ kalpayāti pañca yāmam trivṛtam sapta tantum

original: RV_10,052.05a ā vo yakṣy amṛtatvaṃ suvīraṃ yathā vo devā varivaḥ karāṇi /
analyzed: ā vaḥ yakṣi amṛta tvam su vīram yathā vaḥ devāḥ varivaḥ karāṇi

original: RV_10,052.05c ā bāhvor vajram indrasya dheyām athemā viśvāḥ pṛtanā jayāti //
analyzed: ā bāhvoḥ vajram indrasya dheyām atha imāḥ viśvāḥ pṛtanāḥ jayāti

original: RV_10,052.06a trīṇi śatā trī sahasrāṇy agniṃ triṃśac ca devā nava cāsaparyan /
analyzed: trīṇi śatā trī sahasrāṇi agnim triṃśat ca devāḥ nava ca asaparyan

original: RV_10,052.06c aukṣan ghṛtair astṛṇan barhir asmā ād id dhotāraṃ ny asādayanta //
analyzed: aukṣan ghṛtaiḥ astṛṇan barhiḥ asmai āt id hotāram ni asādayanta

original: RV_10,053.01a yam aicchāma manasā so 'yam āgād yajñasya vidvān paruṣaś cikitvān /
analyzed: yam aicchāma manasā saḥ yam āgāt yajñasya vidvān paruṣaḥ cikitvān

original: RV_10,053.01c sa no yakṣad devatātā yajīyān ni hi ṣatsad antaraḥ pūrvo asmat //
analyzed: sa naḥ yakṣat devatātā yajīyān ni hi satsat antaraḥ pūrvaḥ asmat

original: RV_10,053.02a arādhi hotā niṣadā yajīyān abhi prayāṃsi sudhitāni hi khyat /
analyzed: arādhi hotā niṣadā yajīyān abhi prayāṃsi sudhitāni hi khyat

original: RV_10,053.02c yajāmahai yajñiyān hanta devāṃ īḷāmahā īḍyāṃ ājyena //
analyzed: yajāmahai yajñiyān hanta devān īḍāmahai īḍyān ājyena

original: RV_10,053.03a sādhvīm akar devavītiṃ no adya yajñasya jihvām avidāma guhyām /
analyzed: sādhvīm akaḥ deva vītim naḥ adya yajñasya jihvām avidāma guhyām

original: RV_10,053.03c sa āyur āgāt surabhir vasāno bhadrām akar devahūtiṃ no adya //
analyzed: saḥ āyuḥ āgāt surabhiḥ vasānaḥ bhadrām akaḥ deva hūtim naḥ adya

original: RV_10,053.04a tad adya vācaḥ prathamam masīya yenāsurāṃ abhi devā asāma /
analyzed: tat adya vācaḥ prathamam masīya yena asurān abhi devāḥ asāma

original: RV_10,053.04c ūrjāda uta yajñiyāsaḥ pañca janā mama hotraṃ juṣadhvam //
analyzed: ūrjādaḥ uta yajñiyāsaḥ pañca janāḥ mama hotram juṣadhvam

original: RV_10,053.05a pañca janā mama hotraṃ juṣantāṃ gojātā uta ye yajñiyāsaḥ /
analyzed: pañca janāḥ mama hotram juṣantām go jātāḥ uta ye yajñiyāsaḥ

original: RV_10,053.05c pṛthivī naḥ pārthivāt pātv aṃhaso 'ntarikṣaṃ divyāt pātv asmān //
analyzed: pṛthivī naḥ pārthivāt pātu aṃhasaḥ ntarikṣam divyāt pātu asmān

original: RV_10,053.06a tantuṃ tanvan rajaso bhānum anv ihi jyotiṣmataḥ patho rakṣa dhiyā kṛtān /
analyzed: tantum tanvan rajasaḥ bhānum anu ihi jyotiṣmataḥ pathaḥ rakṣa dhiyā kṛtān

original: RV_10,053.06c anulbaṇaṃ vayata joguvām apo manur bhava janayā daivyaṃ janam //
analyzed: anulbaṇam vayata joguvām apaḥ manuḥ bhava janaya daivyam janam

original: RV_10,053.07a akṣānaho nahyatanota somyā iṣkṛṇudhvaṃ raśanā ota piṃśata /
analyzed: akṣānahaḥ nahyatana uta somyāḥ iṣkṛṇudhvam raśanāḥ ā uta piṃśata

original: RV_10,053.07c aṣṭāvandhuraṃ vahatābhito rathaṃ yena devāso anayann abhi priyam //
analyzed: aṣṭāvandhuram vahata abhitas ratham yena devāsaḥ anayan abhi priyam

original: RV_10,053.08a aśmanvatī rīyate saṃ rabhadhvam ut tiṣṭhata pra taratā sakhāyaḥ /
analyzed: aśmanvatī rīyate sam rabhadhvam ud tiṣṭhata pra tarata sakhāyaḥ

original: RV_10,053.08c atrā jahāma ye asann aśevāḥ śivān vayam ut taremābhi vājān //
analyzed: atra jahāma ye asan aśevāḥ śivān vayam ud tarema abhi vājān

original: RV_10,053.09a tvaṣṭā māyā ved apasām apastamo bibhrat pātrā devapānāni śantamā /
analyzed: tvaṣṭā māyāḥ vet apasām apastamaḥ bibhrat pātrā deva pānāni śantamā

original: RV_10,053.09c śiśīte nūnam paraśuṃ svāyasaṃ yena vṛścād etaśo brahmaṇas patiḥ //
analyzed: śiśīte nūnam paraśum su āyasam yena vṛścāt etaśaḥ brahmaṇaḥ patiḥ

original: RV_10,053.10a sato nūnaṃ kavayaḥ saṃ śiśīta vāśībhir yābhir amṛtāya takṣatha /
analyzed: sataḥ nūnam kavayaḥ sam śiśīta vāśībhiḥ yābhiḥ amṛtāya takṣatha

original: RV_10,053.10c vidvāṃsaḥ padā guhyāni kartana yena devāso amṛtatvam ānaśuḥ //
analyzed: vidvāṃsaḥ padā guhyāni kartana yena devāsaḥ amṛta tvam ānaśuḥ

original: RV_10,053.11a garbhe yoṣām adadhur vatsam āsany apīcyena manasota jihvayā /
analyzed: garbhe yoṣām adadhuḥ vatsam āsani apīcyena manasā uta jihvayā

original: RV_10,053.11c sa viśvāhā sumanā yogyā abhi siṣāsanir vanate kāra ij jitim //
analyzed: sa viśvāhā sumanāḥ yogyā abhi siṣāsaniḥ vanate kāre id jitim

original: RV_10,054.01a tāṃ su te kīrtim maghavan mahitvā yat tvā bhīte rodasī ahvayetām /
analyzed: tām su te kīrtim maghavan mahitvā yat tvā bhīte rodasī ahvayetām

original: RV_10,054.01c prāvo devāṃ ātiro dāsam ojaḥ prajāyai tvasyai yad aśikṣa indra //
analyzed: prāvaḥ devān ātiraḥ dāsam ojaḥ prajāyai tvasyai yat aśikṣaḥ indra

original: RV_10,054.02a yad acaras tanvā vāvṛdhāno balānīndra prabruvāṇo janeṣu /
analyzed: yat acaraḥ tanvā vāvṛdhānaḥ balāni indra prabruvāṇaḥ janeṣu

original: RV_10,054.02c māyet sā te yāni yuddhāny āhur nādya śatruṃ nanu purā vivitse //
analyzed: māyā id sā te yāni yuddhāni āhuḥ na adya śatrum nanu purā vivitse

original: RV_10,054.03a ka u nu te mahimanaḥ samasyāsmat pūrva ṛṣayo 'ntam āpuḥ /
analyzed: kaḥ u nu te mahimanaḥ samasya asmat pūrve ṛṣayaḥ ntam āpuḥ

original: RV_10,054.03c yan mātaraṃ ca pitaraṃ ca sākam ajanayathās tanvaḥ svāyāḥ //
analyzed: yat mātaram ca pitaram ca sākam ajanayathāḥ tanvaḥ svāyāḥ

original: RV_10,054.04a catvāri te asuryāṇi nāmādābhyāni mahiṣasya santi /
analyzed: catvāri te asuryāṇi nāma adābhyāni mahiṣasya santi

original: RV_10,054.04c tvam aṅga tāni viśvāni vitse yebhiḥ karmāṇi maghavañ cakartha //
analyzed: tvam aṅga tāni viśvāni vitse yebhiḥ karmāṇi maghavan cakartha

original: RV_10,054.05a tvaṃ viśvā dadhiṣe kevalāni yāny āvir yā ca guhā vasūni /
analyzed: tvam viśvā dadhiṣe kevalāni yāni āvis yā ca guhā vasūni

original: RV_10,054.05c kāmam in me maghavan mā vi tārīs tvam ājñātā tvam indrāsi dātā //
analyzed: kāmam id me maghavan mā vi tārīḥ tvam ājñātā tvam indra asi dātā

original: RV_10,054.06a yo adadhāj jyotiṣi jyotir antar yo asṛjan madhunā sam madhūni /
analyzed: yaḥ adadhāt jyotiṣi jyotiḥ antar yaḥ asṛjat madhunā sam madhūni

original: RV_10,054.06c adha priyaṃ śūṣam indrāya manma brahmakṛto bṛhadukthād avāci //
analyzed: adha priyam śūṣam indrāya manma brahma kṛtaḥ bṛhat ukthāt avāci

original: RV_10,055.01a dūre tan nāma guhyam parācair yat tvā bhīte ahvayetāṃ vayodhai /
analyzed: dūre tat nāma guhyam parācais yat tvā bhīte ahvayetām vayodhai

original: RV_10,055.01c ud astabhnāḥ pṛthivīṃ dyām abhīke bhrātuḥ putrān maghavan titviṣāṇaḥ //
analyzed: ud astabhnāḥ pṛthivīm dyām abhīke bhrātuḥ putrān maghavan titviṣāṇaḥ

original: RV_10,055.02a mahat tan nāma guhyam puruspṛg yena bhūtaṃ janayo yena bhavyam /
analyzed: mahat tat nāma guhyam puruspṛh yena bhūtam janayaḥ yena bhavyam

original: RV_10,055.02c pratnaṃ jātaṃ jyotir yad asya priyam priyāḥ sam aviśanta pañca //
analyzed: pratnam jātam jyotiḥ yat asya priyam priyāḥ sam aviśanta pañca

original: RV_10,055.03a ā rodasī apṛṇād ota madhyam pañca devāṃ ṛtuśaḥ sapta-sapta /
analyzed: ā rodasī apṛṇāt ā uta madhyam pañca devān ṛtuśas sapta sapta

original: RV_10,055.03c catustriṃśatā purudhā vi caṣṭe sarūpeṇa jyotiṣā vivratena //
analyzed: catustriṃśatā purudhā vi caṣṭe sa rūpeṇa jyotiṣā vivratena

original: RV_10,055.04a yad uṣa aucchaḥ prathamā vibhānām ajanayo yena puṣṭasya puṣṭam /
analyzed: yat uṣaḥ aucchaḥ prathamā vibhānām ajanayaḥ yena puṣṭasya puṣṭam

original: RV_10,055.04c yat te jāmitvam avaram parasyā mahan mahatyā asuratvam ekam //
analyzed: yat te jāmi tvam avaram parasyāḥ mahat mahatyāḥ asura tvam ekam

original: RV_10,055.05a vidhuṃ dadrāṇaṃ samane bahūnāṃ yuvānaṃ santam palito jagāra /
analyzed: vidhum dadrāṇam samane bahūnām yuvānam santam palitaḥ jagāra

original: RV_10,055.05c devasya paśya kāvyam mahitvādyā mamāra sa hyaḥ sam āna //
analyzed: devasya paśya kāvyam mahi tvā adyā mamāra sa hyas sam āna

original: RV_10,055.06a śākmanā śāko aruṇaḥ suparṇa ā yo mahaḥ śūraḥ sanād anīḷaḥ /
analyzed: śākmanā śākaḥ aruṇaḥ suparṇaḥ ā yaḥ mahaḥ śūraḥ sanāt anīḍaḥ

original: RV_10,055.06c yac ciketa satyam it tan na moghaṃ vasu spārham uta jetota dātā //
analyzed: yat ciketa satyam id tat na mogham vasu spārham uta jetā uta dātā

original: RV_10,055.07a aibhir dade vṛṣṇyā pauṃsyāni yebhir aukṣad vṛtrahatyāya vajrī /
analyzed: ā ebhiḥ dade vṛṣṇyā pauṃsyāni yebhiḥ aukṣat vṛtra hatyāya vajrī

original: RV_10,055.07c ye karmaṇaḥ kriyamāṇasya mahna ṛtekarmam udajāyanta devāḥ //
analyzed: ye karmaṇaḥ kriyamāṇasya mahnaḥ ṛtekarmam udajāyanta devāḥ

original: RV_10,055.08a yujā karmāṇi janayan viśvaujā aśastihā viśvamanās turāṣāṭ /
analyzed: yujā karmāṇi janayan viśva ojāḥ aśasti hā viśva manāḥ turāṣāh

original: RV_10,055.08c pītvī somasya diva ā vṛdhānaḥ śūro nir yudhādhamad dasyūn //
analyzed: pītvī somasya divaḥ ā vṛdhānaḥ śūraḥ niḥ yudhā adhamat dasyūn

original: RV_10,056.01a idaṃ ta ekam para ū ta ekaṃ tṛtīyena jyotiṣā saṃ viśasva /
analyzed: idam te ekam paras u te ekam tṛtīyena jyotiṣā sam viśasva

original: RV_10,056.01c saṃveśane tanvaś cārur edhi priyo devānām parame janitre //
analyzed: saṃveśane tanvaḥ cāruḥ edhi priyaḥ devānām parame janitre

original: RV_10,056.02a tanūṣ ṭe vājin tanvaṃ nayantī vāmam asmabhyaṃ dhātu śarma tubhyam /
analyzed: tanūḥ te vājin tanvam nayantī vāmam asmabhyam dhātu śarma tubhyam

original: RV_10,056.02c ahruto maho dharuṇāya devān divīva jyotiḥ svam ā mimīyāḥ //
analyzed: ahrutaḥ mahaḥ dharuṇāya devān divi iva jyotiḥ svam ā mimīyāḥ

original: RV_10,056.03a vājy asi vājinenā suvenīḥ suvita stomaṃ suvito divaṃ gāḥ /
analyzed: vājī asi vājinena suvenīḥ suvitaḥ stomam suvitaḥ divam gāḥ

original: RV_10,056.03c suvito dharma prathamānu satyā suvito devān suvito 'nu patma //
analyzed: suvitaḥ dharma prathamā anu satyā suvitaḥ devān suvitaḥ nu patma

original: RV_10,056.04a mahimna eṣām pitaraś caneśire devā deveṣv adadhur api kratum /
analyzed: mahimnaḥ eṣām pitaraḥ cana īśire devāḥ deveṣu adadhuḥ api kratum

original: RV_10,056.04c sam avivyacur uta yāny atviṣur aiṣāṃ tanūṣu ni viviśuḥ punaḥ //
analyzed: sam avivyacuḥ uta yāni atviṣuḥ ā eṣām tanūṣu ni viviśuḥ punar

original: RV_10,056.05a sahobhir viśvam pari cakramū rajaḥ pūrvā dhāmāny amitā mimānāḥ /
analyzed: sahobhiḥ viśvam pari cakramuḥ rajaḥ pūrvā dhāmāni amitā mimānāḥ

original: RV_10,056.05c tanūṣu viśvā bhuvanā ni yemire prāsārayanta purudha prajā anu //
analyzed: tanūṣu viśvā bhuvanā ni yemire prāsārayanta purudha prajāḥ anu

original: RV_10,056.06a dvidhā sūnavo 'suraṃ svarvidam āsthāpayanta tṛtīyena karmaṇā /
analyzed: dvidhā sūnavaḥ suram svar vidam āsthāpayanta tṛtīyena karmaṇā

original: RV_10,056.06c svām prajām pitaraḥ pitryaṃ saha āvareṣv adadhus tantum ātatam //
analyzed: svām prajām pitaraḥ pitryam sahaḥ ā avareṣu adadhuḥ tantum ātatam

original: RV_10,056.07a nāvā na kṣodaḥ pradiśaḥ pṛthivyāḥ svastibhir ati durgāṇi viśvā /
analyzed: nāvā na kṣodaḥ pradiśaḥ pṛthivyāḥ svastibhiḥ ati durgāṇi viśvā

original: RV_10,056.07c svām prajām bṛhaduktho mahitvāvareṣv adadhād ā pareṣu //
analyzed: svām prajām bṛhadukthaḥ mahitvā avareṣu adadhāt ā pareṣu

original: RV_10,057.01a mā pra gāma patho vayam mā yajñād indra sominaḥ /
analyzed: mā pra gāma pathaḥ vayam mā yajñāt indra sominaḥ

original: RV_10,057.01c mānta sthur no arātayaḥ //
analyzed: mā antar sthuḥ naḥ arātayaḥ

original: RV_10,057.02a yo yajñasya prasādhanas tantur deveṣv ātataḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ yajñasya prasādhanaḥ tantuḥ deveṣu ātataḥ

original: RV_10,057.02c tam āhutaṃ naśīmahi //
analyzed: tam āhutam naśīmahi

original: RV_10,057.03a mano nv ā huvāmahe nārāśaṃsena somena /
analyzed: manaḥ nu ā huvāmahe nārāśaṃsena somena

original: RV_10,057.03c pitṝṇāṃ ca manmabhiḥ //
analyzed: pitṝṇām ca manmabhiḥ

original: RV_10,057.04a ā ta etu manaḥ punaḥ kratve dakṣāya jīvase /
analyzed: ā te etu manaḥ punar kratve dakṣāya jīvase

original: RV_10,057.04c jyok ca sūryaṃ dṛśe //
analyzed: jyok ca sūryam dṛśe

original: RV_10,057.05a punar naḥ pitaro mano dadātu daivyo janaḥ /
analyzed: punar naḥ pitaraḥ manaḥ dadātu daivyaḥ janaḥ

original: RV_10,057.05c jīvaṃ vrātaṃ sacemahi //
analyzed: jīvam vrātam sacemahi

original: RV_10,057.06a vayaṃ soma vrate tava manas tanūṣu bibhrataḥ /
analyzed: vayam soma vrate tava manaḥ tanūṣu bibhrataḥ

original: RV_10,057.06c prajāvantaḥ sacemahi //
analyzed: prajāvantaḥ sacemahi

original: RV_10,058.01a yat te yamaṃ vaivasvatam mano jagāma dūrakam /
analyzed: yat te yamam vaivasvatam manaḥ jagāma dūrakam

original: RV_10,058.01c tat ta ā vartayāmasīha kṣayāya jīvase //
analyzed: tat te ā vartayāmasi iha kṣayāya jīvase

original: RV_10,058.02a yat te divaṃ yat pṛthivīm mano jagāma dūrakam /
analyzed: yat te divam yat pṛthivīm manaḥ jagāma dūrakam

original: RV_10,058.02c tat ta ā vartayāmasīha kṣayāya jīvase //
analyzed: tat te ā vartayāmasi iha kṣayāya jīvase

original: RV_10,058.03a yat te bhūmiṃ caturbhṛṣṭim mano jagāma dūrakam /
analyzed: yat te bhūmim catur bhṛṣṭim manaḥ jagāma dūrakam

original: RV_10,058.03c tat ta ā vartayāmasīha kṣayāya jīvase //
analyzed: tat te ā vartayāmasi iha kṣayāya jīvase

original: RV_10,058.04a yat te catasraḥ pradiśo mano jagāma dūrakam /
analyzed: yat te catasraḥ pradiśaḥ manaḥ jagāma dūrakam

original: RV_10,058.04c tat ta ā vartayāmasīha kṣayāya jīvase //
analyzed: tat te ā vartayāmasi iha kṣayāya jīvase

original: RV_10,058.05a yat te samudram arṇavam mano jagāma dūrakam /
analyzed: yat te samudram arṇavam manaḥ jagāma dūrakam

original: RV_10,058.05c tat ta ā vartayāmasīha kṣayāya jīvase //
analyzed: tat te ā vartayāmasi iha kṣayāya jīvase

original: RV_10,058.06a yat te marīcīḥ pravato mano jagāma dūrakam /
analyzed: yat te marīcīḥ pravataḥ manaḥ jagāma dūrakam

original: RV_10,058.06c tat ta ā vartayāmasīha kṣayāya jīvase //
analyzed: tat te ā vartayāmasi iha kṣayāya jīvase

original: RV_10,058.07a yat te apo yad oṣadhīr mano jagāma dūrakam /
analyzed: yat te apaḥ yat oṣadhīḥ manaḥ jagāma dūrakam

original: RV_10,058.07c tat ta ā vartayāmasīha kṣayāya jīvase //
analyzed: tat te ā vartayāmasi iha kṣayāya jīvase

original: RV_10,058.08a yat te sūryaṃ yad uṣasam mano jagāma dūrakam /
analyzed: yat te sūryam yat uṣasam manaḥ jagāma dūrakam

original: RV_10,058.08c tat ta ā vartayāmasīha kṣayāya jīvase //
analyzed: tat te ā vartayāmasi iha kṣayāya jīvase

original: RV_10,058.09a yat te parvatān bṛhato mano jagāma dūrakam /
analyzed: yat te parvatān bṛhataḥ manaḥ jagāma dūrakam

original: RV_10,058.09c tat ta ā vartayāmasīha kṣayāya jīvase //
analyzed: tat te ā vartayāmasi iha kṣayāya jīvase

original: RV_10,058.10a yat te viśvam idaṃ jagan mano jagāma dūrakam /
analyzed: yat te viśvam idam jagat manaḥ jagāma dūrakam

original: RV_10,058.10c tat ta ā vartayāmasīha kṣayāya jīvase //
analyzed: tat te ā vartayāmasi iha kṣayāya jīvase

original: RV_10,058.11a yat te parāḥ parāvato mano jagāma dūrakam /
analyzed: yat te parāḥ parāvataḥ manaḥ jagāma dūrakam

original: RV_10,058.11c tat ta ā vartayāmasīha kṣayāya jīvase //
analyzed: tat te ā vartayāmasi iha kṣayāya jīvase

original: RV_10,058.12a yat te bhūtaṃ ca bhavyaṃ ca mano jagāma dūrakam /
analyzed: yat te bhūtam ca bhavyam ca manaḥ jagāma dūrakam

original: RV_10,058.12c tat ta ā vartayāmasīha kṣayāya jīvase //
analyzed: tat te ā vartayāmasi iha kṣayāya jīvase

original: RV_10,059.01a pra tāry āyuḥ prataraṃ navīya sthātāreva kratumatā rathasya /
analyzed: pra tāri āyuḥ prataram navīya sthātārā iva kratumatā rathasya

original: RV_10,059.01c adha cyavāna ut tavīty artham parātaraṃ su nirṛtir jihītām //
analyzed: adha cyavānaḥ ud tavītī artham parātaram su nirṛtiḥ jihītām

original: RV_10,059.02a sāman nu rāye nidhiman nv annaṃ karāmahe su purudha śravāṃsi /
analyzed: sāman nu rāye nidhimat nu annam karāmahe su purudha śravāṃsi

original: RV_10,059.02c tā no viśvāni jaritā mamattu parātaraṃ su nirṛtir jihītām //
analyzed: tā naḥ viśvāni jaritā mamattu parātaram su nirṛtiḥ jihītām

original: RV_10,059.03a abhī ṣv aryaḥ pauṃsyair bhavema dyaur na bhūmiṃ girayo nājrān /
analyzed: abhi su aryaḥ pauṃsyaiḥ bhavema dyauḥ na bhūmim girayaḥ na ajrān

original: RV_10,059.03c tā no viśvāni jaritā ciketa parātaraṃ su nirṛtir jihītām //
analyzed: tā naḥ viśvāni jaritā ciketa parātaram su nirṛtiḥ jihītām

original: RV_10,059.04a mo ṣu ṇaḥ soma mṛtyave parā dāḥ paśyema nu sūryam uccarantam /
analyzed: mā u su naḥ soma mṛtyave parā dāḥ paśyema nu sūryam uccarantam

original: RV_10,059.04c dyubhir hito jarimā sū no astu parātaraṃ su nirṛtir jihītām //
analyzed: dyubhiḥ hitaḥ jarimā su naḥ astu parātaram su nirṛtiḥ jihītām

original: RV_10,059.05a asunīte mano asmāsu dhāraya jīvātave su pra tirā na āyuḥ /
analyzed: asunīte manaḥ asmāsu dhāraya jīvātave su pra tira naḥ āyuḥ

original: RV_10,059.05c rārandhi naḥ sūryasya saṃdṛśi ghṛtena tvaṃ tanvaṃ vardhayasva //
analyzed: rārandhi naḥ sūryasya saṃdṛśi ghṛtena tvam tanvam vardhayasva

original: RV_10,059.06a asunīte punar asmāsu cakṣuḥ punaḥ prāṇam iha no dhehi bhogam /
analyzed: asunīte punar asmāsu cakṣuḥ punar prāṇam iha naḥ dhehi bhogam

original: RV_10,059.06c jyok paśyema sūryam uccarantam anumate mṛḷayā naḥ svasti //
analyzed: jyok paśyema sūryam uccarantam anumate mṛḍaya naḥ svasti

original: RV_10,059.07a punar no asum pṛthivī dadātu punar dyaur devī punar antarikṣam /
analyzed: punar naḥ asum pṛthivī dadātu punar dyauḥ devī punar antarikṣam

original: RV_10,059.07c punar naḥ somas tanvaṃ dadātu punaḥ pūṣā pathyāṃ yā svastiḥ //
analyzed: punar naḥ somaḥ tanvam dadātu punar pūṣā pathyām yā svastiḥ

original: RV_10,059.08a śaṃ rodasī subandhave yahvī ṛtasya mātarā /
analyzed: śam rodasī su bandhave yahvī ṛtasya mātarā

original: RV_10,059.08c bharatām apa yad rapo dyauḥ pṛthivi kṣamā rapo mo ṣu te kiṃ canāmamat //
analyzed: bharatām apa yat rapaḥ dyauḥ pṛthivi kṣamā rapaḥ mā u su te kim cana amamat

original: RV_10,059.09a ava dvake ava trikā divaś caranti bheṣajā /
analyzed: ava dvake ava trikā divaḥ caranti bheṣajā

original: RV_10,059.09c kṣamā cariṣṇv ekakam bharatām apa yad rapo dyauḥ pṛthivi kṣamā rapo mo ṣu te kiṃ canāmamat //
analyzed: kṣamā cariṣṇu ekakam bharatām apa yat rapaḥ dyauḥ pṛthivi kṣamā rapaḥ mā u su te kim cana amamat

original: RV_10,059.10a sam indreraya gām anaḍvāhaṃ ya āvahad uśīnarāṇyā anaḥ /
analyzed: sam indra īraya gām anaḍvāham yaḥ āvahat uśīnarāṇyāḥ anaḥ

original: RV_10,059.10c bharatām apa yad rapo dyauḥ pṛthivi kṣamā rapo mo ṣu te kiṃ canāmamat //
analyzed: bharatām apa yat rapaḥ dyauḥ pṛthivi kṣamā rapaḥ mā u su te kim cana amamat

original: RV_10,060.01a ā janaṃ tveṣasaṃdṛśam māhīnānām upastutam /
analyzed: ā janam tveṣa saṃdṛśam māhīnānām upastutam

original: RV_10,060.01c aganma bibhrato namaḥ //
analyzed: aganma bibhrataḥ namaḥ

original: RV_10,060.02a asamātiṃ nitośanaṃ tveṣaṃ niyayinaṃ ratham /
analyzed: asamātim nitośanam tveṣam niyayinam ratham

original: RV_10,060.02c bhajerathasya satpatim //
analyzed: bhajerathasya sat patim

original: RV_10,060.03a yo janān mahiṣāṃ ivātitasthau pavīravān /
analyzed: yaḥ janān mahiṣān iva atitasthau pavīravān

original: RV_10,060.03c utāpavīravān yudhā //
analyzed: uta a pavīravān yudhā

original: RV_10,060.04a yasyekṣvākur upa vrate revān marāyy edhate /
analyzed: yasya ikṣvākuḥ upa vrate revān marāyī edhate

original: RV_10,060.04c divīva pañca kṛṣṭayaḥ //
analyzed: divi iva pañca kṛṣṭayaḥ

original: RV_10,060.05a indra kṣatrāsamātiṣu rathaproṣṭheṣu dhāraya /
analyzed: indra kṣatrāsamātiṣu rathaproṣṭheṣu dhāraya

original: RV_10,060.05c divīva sūryaṃ dṛśe //
analyzed: divi iva sūryam dṛśe

original: RV_10,060.06a agastyasya nadbhyaḥ saptī yunakṣi rohitā /
analyzed: agastyasya nadbhyaḥ saptī yunakṣi rohitā

original: RV_10,060.06c paṇīn ny akramīr abhi viśvān rājann arādhasaḥ //
analyzed: paṇīn ni akramīḥ abhi viśvān rājan arādhasaḥ

original: RV_10,060.07a ayam mātāyam pitāyaṃ jīvātur āgamat /
analyzed: ayam mātā ayam pitā ayam jīvātuḥ āgamat

original: RV_10,060.07c idaṃ tava prasarpaṇaṃ subandhav ehi nir ihi //
analyzed: idam tava prasarpaṇam subandho ehi niḥ ihi

original: RV_10,060.08a yathā yugaṃ varatrayā nahyanti dharuṇāya kam /
analyzed: yathā yugam varatrayā nahyanti dharuṇāya kam

original: RV_10,060.08c evā dādhāra te mano jīvātave na mṛtyave 'tho ariṣṭatātaye //
analyzed: evā dādhāra te manaḥ jīvātave na mṛtyave thaḥ ariṣṭatātaye

original: RV_10,060.09a yatheyam pṛthivī mahī dādhāremān vanaspatīn /
analyzed: yathā iyam pṛthivī mahī dādhāra imān vanaspatīn

original: RV_10,060.09c evā dādhāra te mano jīvātave na mṛtyave 'tho ariṣṭatātaye //
analyzed: evā dādhāra te manaḥ jīvātave na mṛtyave thaḥ ariṣṭatātaye

original: RV_10,060.10a yamād ahaṃ vaivasvatāt subandhor mana ābharam /
analyzed: yamāt aham vaivasvatāt subandhoḥ manaḥ ābharam

original: RV_10,060.10c jīvātave na mṛtyave 'tho ariṣṭatātaye //
analyzed: jīvātave na mṛtyave thaḥ ariṣṭatātaye

original: RV_10,060.11a nyag vāto 'va vāti nyak tapati sūryaḥ /
analyzed: nyak vātaḥ va vāti nyak tapati sūryaḥ

original: RV_10,060.11c nīcīnam aghnyā duhe nyag bhavatu te rapaḥ //
analyzed: nīcīnam aghnyā duhe nyak bhavatu te rapaḥ

original: RV_10,060.12a ayam me hasto bhagavān ayam me bhagavattaraḥ /
analyzed: ayam me hastaḥ bhagavān ayam me bhagavattaraḥ

original: RV_10,060.12c ayam me viśvabheṣajo 'yaṃ śivābhimarśanaḥ //
analyzed: ayam me viśva bheṣajaḥ yam śiva abhimarśanaḥ

original: RV_10,061.01a idam itthā raudraṃ gūrtavacā brahma kratvā śacyām antar ājau /
analyzed: idam itthā raudram gūrta vacāḥ brahma kratvā śacyām antar ājau

original: RV_10,061.01c krāṇā yad asya pitarā maṃhaneṣṭhāḥ parṣat pakthe ahann ā sapta hotṝn //
analyzed: krāṇāḥ yat asya pitarā maṃhaneṣṭhāḥ parṣat pakthe ahan ā sapta hotṝn

original: RV_10,061.02a sa id dānāya dabhyāya vanvañ cyavānaḥ sūdair amimīta vedim /
analyzed: saḥ id dānāya dabhyāya vanvam cyavānaḥ sūdaiḥ amimīta vedim

original: RV_10,061.02c tūrvayāṇo gūrtavacastamaḥ kṣodo na reta itaūti siñcat //
analyzed: tūrvayāṇaḥ gūrta vacastamaḥ kṣodaḥ na retaḥ itaūti siñcat

original: RV_10,061.03a mano na yeṣu havaneṣu tigmaṃ vipaḥ śacyā vanutho dravantā /
analyzed: manaḥ na yeṣu havaneṣu tigmam vipaḥ śacyā vanuthaḥ dravantā

original: RV_10,061.03c ā yaḥ śaryābhis tuvinṛmṇo asyāśrīṇītādiśaṃ gabhastau //
analyzed: ā yaḥ śaryābhiḥ tuvi nṛmṇaḥ asya āśrīṇīta ādiśam gabhastau

original: RV_10,061.04a kṛṣṇā yad goṣv aruṇīṣu sīdad divo napātāśvinā huve vām /
analyzed: kṛṣṇā yat goṣu aruṇīṣu sīdat divaḥ napātā aśvinā huve vām

original: RV_10,061.04c vītam me yajñam ā gatam me annaṃ vavanvāṃsā neṣam asmṛtadhrū //
analyzed: vītam me yajñam ā gatam me annam vavanvāṃsā na iṣam asmṛtadhrū

original: RV_10,061.05a prathiṣṭa yasya vīrakarmam iṣṇad anuṣṭhitaṃ nu naryo apauhat /
analyzed: prathiṣṭa yasya vīrakarmam iṣṇat anuṣṭhitam nu naryaḥ apauhat

original: RV_10,061.05c punas tad ā vṛhati yat kanāyā duhitur ā anubhṛtam anarvā //
analyzed: punar tat ā vṛhati yat kanāyāḥ duhituḥ ā anubhṛtam anarvā

original: RV_10,061.06a madhyā yat kartvam abhavad abhīke kāmaṃ kṛṇvāne pitari yuvatyām /
analyzed: madhyā yat kartvam abhavat abhīke kāmam kṛṇvāne pitari yuvatyām

original: RV_10,061.06c manānag reto jahatur viyantā sānau niṣiktaṃ sukṛtasya yonau //
analyzed: manānaś retaḥ jahatuḥ viyantā sānau niṣiktam sukṛtasya yonau

original: RV_10,061.07a pitā yat svāṃ duhitaram adhiṣkan kṣmayā retaḥ saṃjagmāno ni ṣiñcat /
analyzed: pitā yat svām duhitaram adhiṣkan kṣmayā retaḥ saṃjagmānaḥ ni siñcat

original: RV_10,061.07c svādhyo 'janayan brahma devā vāstoṣ patiṃ vratapāṃ nir atakṣan //
analyzed: su ādhyaḥ janayan brahma devāḥ vāstoḥ patim vrata pām niḥ atakṣan

original: RV_10,061.08a sa īṃ vṛṣā na phenam asyad ājau smad ā paraid apa dabhracetāḥ /
analyzed: saḥ īm vṛṣā na phenam asyat ājau smat ā parait apa dabhra cetāḥ

original: RV_10,061.08c sarat padā na dakṣiṇā parāvṛṅ na tā nu me pṛśanyo jagṛbhre //
analyzed: sarat padā na dakṣiṇā parāvṛj na tāḥ nu me pṛśanyaḥ jagṛbhre

original: RV_10,061.09a makṣū na vahniḥ prajāyā upabdir agniṃ na nagna upa sīdad ūdhaḥ /
analyzed: makṣū na vahniḥ prajāyāḥ upabdiḥ agnim na nagnaḥ upa sīdat ūdhar

original: RV_10,061.09c sanitedhmaṃ sanitota vājaṃ sa dhartā jajñe sahasā yavīyut //
analyzed: sanitā idhmam sanitā uta vājam sa dhartā jajñe sahasā yavīyudh

original: RV_10,061.10a makṣū kanāyāḥ sakhyaṃ navagvā ṛtaṃ vadanta ṛtayuktim agman /
analyzed: makṣū kanāyāḥ sakhyam navagvāḥ ṛtam vadantaḥ ṛta yuktim agman

original: RV_10,061.10c dvibarhaso ya upa gopam āgur adakṣiṇāso acyutā dudukṣan //
analyzed: dvibarhasaḥ ye upa gopam āguḥ a dakṣiṇāsaḥ acyutā dudukṣan

original: RV_10,061.11a makṣū kanāyāḥ sakhyaṃ navīyo rādho na reta ṛtam it turaṇyan /
analyzed: makṣū kanāyāḥ sakhyam navīyaḥ rādhaḥ na retaḥ ṛtam id turaṇyan

original: RV_10,061.11c śuci yat te rekṇa āyajanta sabardughāyāḥ paya usriyāyāḥ //
analyzed: śuci yat te rekṇaḥ āyajanta sabardughāyāḥ payaḥ usriyāyāḥ

original: RV_10,061.12a paśvā yat paścā viyutā budhanteti bravīti vaktarī rarāṇaḥ /
analyzed: paśvā yat paścā viyutā budhanta iti bravīti vaktari rarāṇaḥ

original: RV_10,061.12c vasor vasutvā kāravo 'nehā viśvaṃ viveṣṭi draviṇam upa kṣu //
analyzed: vasoḥ vasu tvā kāravaḥ nehāḥ viśvam viveṣṭi draviṇam upa kṣu

original: RV_10,061.13a tad in nv asya pariṣadvāno agman purū sadanto nārṣadam bibhitsan /
analyzed: tat id nu asya pariṣadvānaḥ agman purū sadantaḥ nārṣadam bibhitsan

original: RV_10,061.13c vi śuṣṇasya saṃgrathitam anarvā vidat puruprajātasya guhā yat //
analyzed: vi śuṣṇasya saṃgrathitam anarvā vidat puru prajātasya guhā yat

original: RV_10,061.14a bhargo ha nāmota yasya devāḥ svar ṇa ye triṣadhasthe niṣeduḥ /
analyzed: bhargaḥ ha nāma uta yasya devāḥ svar na ye triṣadhasthe niṣeduḥ

original: RV_10,061.14c agnir ha nāmota jātavedāḥ śrudhī no hotar ṛtasya hotādhruk //
analyzed: agniḥ ha nāma uta jātavedāḥ śrudhi naḥ hotar ṛtasya hotā adhruk

original: RV_10,061.15a uta tyā me raudrāv arcimantā nāsatyāv indra gūrtaye yajadhyai /
analyzed: uta tyā me raudrau arcimantā nāsatyau indra gūrtaye yajadhyai

original: RV_10,061.15c manuṣvad vṛktabarhiṣe rarāṇā mandū hitaprayasā vikṣu yajyū //
analyzed: manuṣvat vṛktabarhiṣe rarāṇā mandū hitaprayasā vikṣu yajyū

original: RV_10,061.16a ayaṃ stuto rājā vandi vedhā apaś ca vipras tarati svasetuḥ /
analyzed: ayam stutaḥ rājā vandi vedhāḥ apaḥ ca vipraḥ tarati sva setuḥ

original: RV_10,061.16c sa kakṣīvantaṃ rejayat so agniṃ nemiṃ na cakram arvato raghudru //
analyzed: sa kakṣīvantam rejayat saḥ agnim nemim na cakram arvataḥ raghudru

original: RV_10,061.17a sa dvibandhur vaitaraṇo yaṣṭā sabardhuṃ dhenum asvaṃ duhadhyai /
analyzed: sa dvi bandhuḥ vaitaraṇaḥ yaṣṭā sabardhum dhenum duhadhyai

original: RV_10,061.17c saṃ yan mitrāvaruṇā vṛñja ukthair jyeṣṭhebhir aryamaṇaṃ varūthaiḥ //
analyzed: sam yat mitrāvaruṇā vṛñje ukthaiḥ jyeṣṭhebhiḥ aryamaṇam varūthaiḥ

original: RV_10,061.18a tadbandhuḥ sūrir divi te dhiyandhā nābhānediṣṭho rapati pra venan /
analyzed: tad bandhuḥ sūriḥ divi te nābhānediṣṭhaḥ rapati pra venan

original: RV_10,061.18c sā no nābhiḥ paramāsya vā ghāhaṃ tat paścā katithaś cid āsa //
analyzed: sā naḥ nābhiḥ paramā asya vā gha aham tat paścā katithaḥ cit āsa

original: RV_10,061.19a iyam me nābhir iha me sadhastham ime me devā ayam asmi sarvaḥ /
analyzed: iyam me nābhiḥ iha me sadhastham ime me devāḥ ayam asmi sarvaḥ

original: RV_10,061.19c dvijā aha prathamajā ṛtasyedaṃ dhenur aduhaj jāyamānā //
analyzed: dvijāḥ aha prathama jāḥ ṛtasya idam dhenuḥ aduhat jāyamānā

original: RV_10,061.20a adhāsu mandro aratir vibhāvāva syati dvivartanir vaneṣāṭ /
analyzed: mandraḥ aratiḥ vibhāvā ava syati dvi vartaniḥ vaneṣāh

original: RV_10,061.20c ūrdhvā yac chreṇir na śiśur dan makṣū sthiraṃ śevṛdhaṃ sūta mātā //
analyzed: ūrdhvā yat śreṇiḥ na śiśuḥ makṣū sthiram śevṛdham sūta mātā

original: RV_10,061.21a adhā gāva upamātiṃ kanāyā anu śvāntasya kasya cit pareyuḥ /
analyzed: adhā gāvaḥ upamātim kanāyāḥ anu śvāntasya kasya cit pareyuḥ

original: RV_10,061.21c śrudhi tvaṃ sudraviṇo nas tvaṃ yāḷ āśvaghnasya vāvṛdhe sūnṛtābhiḥ //
analyzed: śrudhi tvam su draviṇaḥ naḥ tvam yāṭ āśvaghnasya vāvṛdhe sūnṛtābhiḥ

original: RV_10,061.22a adha tvam indra viddhy asmān maho rāye nṛpate vajrabāhuḥ /
analyzed: adha tvam indra viddhi asmān mahaḥ rāye nṛpate vajra bāhuḥ

original: RV_10,061.22c rakṣā ca no maghonaḥ pāhi sūrīn anehasas te harivo abhiṣṭau //
analyzed: rakṣā ca naḥ maghonaḥ pāhi sūrīn anehasaḥ te harivas abhiṣṭau

original: RV_10,061.23a adha yad rājānā gaviṣṭau sarat saraṇyuḥ kārave jaraṇyuḥ /
analyzed: adha yat rājānā gaviṣṭau sarat saraṇyuḥ kārave jaraṇyuḥ

original: RV_10,061.23c vipraḥ preṣṭhaḥ sa hy eṣām babhūva parā ca vakṣad uta parṣad enān //
analyzed: vipraḥ preṣṭhaḥ sa hi eṣām babhūva parā ca vakṣat uta parṣat enān

original: RV_10,061.24a adhā nv asya jenyasya puṣṭau vṛthā rebhanta īmahe tad ū nu /
analyzed: adhā nu asya jenyasya puṣṭau vṛthā rebhantaḥ īmahe tat ū nu

original: RV_10,061.24c saraṇyur asya sūnur aśvo vipraś cāsi śravasaś ca sātau //
analyzed: saraṇyuḥ asya sūnuḥ aśvaḥ vipraḥ ca asi śravasaḥ ca sātau

original: RV_10,061.25a yuvor yadi sakhyāyāsme śardhāya stomaṃ jujuṣe namasvān /
analyzed: yuvoḥ yadi sakhyāya asme śardhāya stomam jujuṣe namasvān

original: RV_10,061.25c viśvatra yasminn ā giraḥ samīcīḥ pūrvīva gātur dāśat sūnṛtāyai //
analyzed: viśvatra yasmin ā giraḥ samīcīḥ pūrvī iva gātuḥ dāśat sūnṛtāyai

original: RV_10,061.26a sa gṛṇāno adbhir devavān iti subandhur namasā sūktaiḥ /
analyzed: sa gṛṇānaḥ adbhiḥ devavān iti su bandhuḥ namasā sūktaiḥ

original: RV_10,061.26c vardhad ukthair vacobhir ā hi nūnaṃ vy adhvaiti payasa usriyāyāḥ //
analyzed: vardhat ukthaiḥ vacobhiḥ ā hi nūnam vi adhvā eti payasaḥ usriyāyāḥ

original: RV_10,061.27a ta ū ṣu ṇo maho yajatrā bhūta devāsa ūtaye sajoṣāḥ /
analyzed: te ū su naḥ mahaḥ yajatrāḥ bhūta devāsaḥ ūtaye sajoṣāḥ

original: RV_10,061.27c ye vājāṃ anayatā viyanto ye sthā nicetāro amūrāḥ //
analyzed: ye vājām anayata viyantaḥ ye stha nicetāraḥ amūrāḥ

original: RV_10,062.01a ye yajñena dakṣiṇayā samaktā indrasya sakhyam amṛtatvam ānaśa /
analyzed: ye yajñena dakṣiṇayā samaktāḥ indrasya sakhyam amṛta tvam ānaśa

original: RV_10,062.01c tebhyo bhadram aṅgiraso vo astu prati gṛbhṇīta mānavaṃ sumedhasaḥ //
analyzed: tebhyaḥ bhadram aṅgirasaḥ vaḥ astu prati gṛbhṇīta mānavam sumedhasaḥ

original: RV_10,062.02a ya udājan pitaro gomayaṃ vasv ṛtenābhindan parivatsare valam /
analyzed: ye udājan pitaraḥ go mayam vasu ṛtena abhindan parivatsare valam

original: RV_10,062.02c dīrghāyutvam aṅgiraso vo astu prati gṛbhṇīta mānavaṃ sumedhasaḥ //
analyzed: dīrgha āyu tvam aṅgirasaḥ vaḥ astu prati gṛbhṇīta mānavam sumedhasaḥ

original: RV_10,062.03a ya ṛtena sūryam ārohayan divy aprathayan pṛthivīm mātaraṃ vi /
analyzed: ye ṛtena sūryam ārohayan divi aprathayan pṛthivīm mātaram vi

original: RV_10,062.03c suprajāstvam aṅgiraso vo astu prati gṛbhṇīta mānavaṃ sumedhasaḥ //
analyzed: suprajāstvam aṅgirasaḥ vaḥ astu prati gṛbhṇīta mānavam sumedhasaḥ

original: RV_10,062.04a ayaṃ nābhā vadati valgu vo gṛhe devaputrā ṛṣayas tac chṛṇotana /
analyzed: ayam nābhā vadati valgu vaḥ gṛhe deva putrāḥ ṛṣayaḥ tat śṛṇotana

original: RV_10,062.04c subrahmaṇyam aṅgiraso vo astu prati gṛbhṇīta mānavaṃ sumedhasaḥ //
analyzed: subrahmaṇyam aṅgirasaḥ vaḥ astu prati gṛbhṇīta mānavam sumedhasaḥ

original: RV_10,062.05a virūpāsa id ṛṣayas ta id gambhīravepasaḥ /
analyzed: virūpāsaḥ id ṛṣayaḥ te id gambhīra vepasaḥ

original: RV_10,062.05c te aṅgirasaḥ sūnavas te agneḥ pari jajñire //
analyzed: te aṅgirasaḥ sūnavaḥ te agneḥ pari jajñire

original: RV_10,062.06a ye agneḥ pari jajñire virūpāso divas pari /
analyzed: ye agneḥ pari jajñire virūpāsaḥ divaḥ pari

original: RV_10,062.06c navagvo nu daśagvo aṅgirastamo sacā deveṣu maṃhate //
analyzed: navagvaḥ nu daśagvaḥ aṅgirastamaḥ sacā deveṣu maṃhate

original: RV_10,062.07a indreṇa yujā niḥ sṛjanta vāghato vrajaṃ gomantam aśvinam /
analyzed: indreṇa yujā niḥ sṛjanta vāghataḥ vrajam gomantam aśvinam

original: RV_10,062.07c sahasram me dadato aṣṭakarṇyaḥ śravo deveṣv akrata //
analyzed: sahasram me dadataḥ aṣṭakarṇyaḥ śravaḥ deveṣu akrata

original: RV_10,062.08a pra nūnaṃ jāyatām ayam manus tokmeva rohatu /
analyzed: pra nūnam jāyatām ayam manuḥ tokmā iva rohatu

original: RV_10,062.08c yaḥ sahasraṃ śatāśvaṃ sadyo dānāya maṃhate //
analyzed: yaḥ sahasram śata aśvam sadyas dānāya maṃhate

original: RV_10,062.09a na tam aśnoti kaś cana diva iva sānv ārabham /
analyzed: na tam aśnoti kaḥ cana divaḥ iva sānū ārabham

original: RV_10,062.09c sāvarṇyasya dakṣiṇā vi sindhur iva paprathe //
analyzed: sāvarṇyasya dakṣiṇā vi sindhuḥ iva paprathe

original: RV_10,062.10a uta dāsā pariviṣe smaddiṣṭī goparīṇasā /
analyzed: uta dāsā pariviṣe smaddiṣṭī go parīṇasā

original: RV_10,062.10c yadus turvaś ca māmahe //
analyzed: yaduḥ turvaḥ ca māmahe

original: RV_10,062.11a sahasradā grāmaṇīr mā riṣan manuḥ sūryeṇāsya yatamānaitu dakṣiṇā /
analyzed: sahasra dāḥ grāmaṇīḥ mā riṣat manuḥ sūryeṇa asya yatamānā etu dakṣiṇā

original: RV_10,062.11c sāvarṇer devāḥ pra tirantv āyur yasminn aśrāntā asanāma vājam //
analyzed: sāvarṇeḥ devāḥ pra tirantu āyuḥ yasmin a śrāntāḥ asanāma vājam

original: RV_10,063.01a parāvato ye didhiṣanta āpyam manuprītāso janimā vivasvataḥ /
analyzed: parāvataḥ ye didhiṣante āpyam manu prītāsaḥ janimā vivasvataḥ

original: RV_10,063.01c yayāter ye nahuṣyasya barhiṣi devā āsate te adhi bruvantu naḥ //
analyzed: yayāteḥ ye nahuṣyasya barhiṣi devāḥ āsate te adhi bruvantu naḥ

original: RV_10,063.02a viśvā hi vo namasyāni vandyā nāmāni devā uta yajñiyāni vaḥ /
analyzed: viśvā hi vaḥ namasyāni vandyā nāmāni devāḥ uta yajñiyāni vaḥ

original: RV_10,063.02c ye stha jātā aditer adbhyas pari ye pṛthivyās te ma iha śrutā havam //
analyzed: ye stha jātāḥ aditeḥ adbhyaḥ pari ye pṛthivyāḥ te me iha śrutā havam

original: RV_10,063.03a yebhyo mātā madhumat pinvate payaḥ pīyūṣaṃ dyaur aditir adribarhāḥ /
analyzed: yebhyaḥ mātā madhumat pinvate payaḥ pīyūṣam dyauḥ aditiḥ adri barhāḥ

original: RV_10,063.03c ukthaśuṣmān vṛṣabharān svapnasas tāṃ ādityāṃ anu madā svastaye //
analyzed: uktha śuṣmān vṛṣa bharān svapnasaḥ tām ādityām anu madā svastaye

original: RV_10,063.04a nṛcakṣaso animiṣanto arhaṇā bṛhad devāso amṛtatvam ānaśuḥ /
analyzed: nṛ cakṣasaḥ a nimiṣantaḥ arhaṇā bṛhat devāsaḥ amṛta tvam ānaśuḥ

original: RV_10,063.04c jyotīrathā ahimāyā anāgaso divo varṣmāṇaṃ vasate svastaye //
analyzed: jyotīrathāḥ ahi māyāḥ anāgasaḥ divaḥ varṣmāṇam vasate svastaye

original: RV_10,063.05a samrājo ye suvṛdho yajñam āyayur aparihvṛtā dadhire divi kṣayam /
analyzed: samrājaḥ ye suvṛdhaḥ yajñam āyayuḥ aparihvṛtāḥ dadhire divi kṣayam

original: RV_10,063.05c tāṃ ā vivāsa namasā suvṛktibhir maho ādityāṃ aditiṃ svastaye //
analyzed: tām ā vivāsa namasā suvṛktibhiḥ mahaḥ ādityām aditim svastaye

original: RV_10,063.06a ko va stomaṃ rādhati yaṃ jujoṣatha viśve devāso manuṣo yati ṣṭhana /
analyzed: kaḥ vaḥ stomam rādhati yam jujoṣatha viśve devāsaḥ manuṣaḥ yati ṣṭhana

original: RV_10,063.06c ko vo 'dhvaraṃ tuvijātā araṃ karad yo naḥ parṣad aty aṃhaḥ svastaye //
analyzed: kaḥ vaḥ dhvaram tuvi jātāḥ aram karat yaḥ naḥ parṣat ati aṃhaḥ svastaye

original: RV_10,063.07a yebhyo hotrām prathamām āyeje manuḥ samiddhāgnir manasā sapta hotṛbhiḥ /
analyzed: yebhyaḥ hotrām prathamām āyeje manuḥ samiddha agniḥ manasā sapta hotṛbhiḥ

original: RV_10,063.07c ta ādityā abhayaṃ śarma yacchata sugā naḥ karta supathā svastaye //
analyzed: te ādityāḥ abhayam śarma yacchata sugā naḥ karta su pathā svastaye

original: RV_10,063.08a ya īśire bhuvanasya pracetaso viśvasya sthātur jagataś ca mantavaḥ /
analyzed: ye īśire bhuvanasya pracetasaḥ viśvasya sthātuḥ jagataḥ ca mantavaḥ

original: RV_10,063.08c te naḥ kṛtād akṛtād enasas pary adyā devāsaḥ pipṛtā svastaye //
analyzed: te naḥ kṛtāt a kṛtāt enasaḥ pari adyā devāsaḥ pipṛta svastaye

original: RV_10,063.09a bhareṣv indraṃ suhavaṃ havāmahe 'ṃhomucaṃ sukṛtaṃ daivyaṃ janam /
analyzed: bhareṣu indram su havam havāmahe ṃhaḥ mucam su kṛtam daivyam janam

original: RV_10,063.09c agnim mitraṃ varuṇaṃ sātaye bhagaṃ dyāvāpṛthivī marutaḥ svastaye //
analyzed: agnim mitram varuṇam sātaye bhagam dyāvāpṛthivī marutaḥ svastaye

original: RV_10,063.10a sutrāmāṇam pṛthivīṃ dyām anehasaṃ suśarmāṇam aditiṃ supraṇītim /
analyzed: su trāmāṇam pṛthivīm dyām anehasam su śarmāṇam aditim su praṇītim

original: RV_10,063.10c daivīṃ nāvaṃ svaritrām anāgasam asravantīm ā ruhemā svastaye //
analyzed: daivīm nāvam su aritrām anāgasam a sravantīm ā ruhema svastaye

original: RV_10,063.11a viśve yajatrā adhi vocatotaye trāyadhvaṃ no durevāyā abhihrutaḥ /
analyzed: viśve yajatrāḥ adhi vocata ūtaye trāyadhvam naḥ durevāyāḥ abhihrutaḥ

original: RV_10,063.11c satyayā vo devahūtyā huvema śṛṇvato devā avase svastaye //
analyzed: satyayā vaḥ deva hūtyā huvema śṛṇvataḥ devāḥ avase svastaye

original: RV_10,063.12a apāmīvām apa viśvām anāhutim apārātiṃ durvidatrām aghāyataḥ /
analyzed: apa amīvām apa viśvām an āhutim apa arātim durvidatrām aghāyataḥ

original: RV_10,063.12c āre devā dveṣo asmad yuyotanoru ṇaḥ śarma yacchatā svastaye //
analyzed: āre devāḥ dveṣaḥ asmat yuyotana uru naḥ śarma yacchata svastaye

original: RV_10,063.13a ariṣṭaḥ sa marto viśva edhate pra prajābhir jāyate dharmaṇas pari /
analyzed: ariṣṭaḥ sa martaḥ viśvaḥ edhate pra prajābhiḥ jāyate dharmaṇaḥ pari

original: RV_10,063.13c yam ādityāso nayathā sunītibhir ati viśvāni duritā svastaye //
analyzed: yam ādityāsaḥ nayathā su nītibhiḥ ati viśvāni duritā svastaye

original: RV_10,063.14a yaṃ devāso 'vatha vājasātau yaṃ śūrasātā maruto hite dhane /
analyzed: yam devāsaḥ vatha vājasātau yam śūrasātau marutaḥ hite dhane

original: RV_10,063.14c prātaryāvāṇaṃ ratham indra sānasim ariṣyantam ā ruhemā svastaye //
analyzed: prātaryāvāṇam ratham indra sānasim a riṣyantam ā ruhema svastaye

original: RV_10,063.15a svasti naḥ pathyāsu dhanvasu svasty apsu vṛjane svarvati /
analyzed: svasti naḥ pathyāsu dhanvasu svasti apsu vṛjane svarvati

original: RV_10,063.15c svasti naḥ putrakṛtheṣu yoniṣu svasti rāye maruto dadhātana //
analyzed: svasti naḥ putrakṛtheṣu yoniṣu svasti rāye marutaḥ dadhātana

original: RV_10,063.16a svastir id dhi prapathe śreṣṭhā rekṇasvaty abhi yā vāmam eti /
analyzed: svastiḥ id hi prapathe śreṣṭhā rekṇasvatī abhi yā vāmam eti

original: RV_10,063.16c sā no amā so araṇe ni pātu svāveśā bhavatu devagopā //
analyzed: sā naḥ amā saḥ araṇe ni pātu su āveśā bhavatu deva gopā

original: RV_10,063.17a evā plateḥ sūnur avīvṛdhad vo viśva ādityā adite manīṣī /
analyzed: eva plateḥ sūnuḥ avīvṛdhat vaḥ viśve ādityāḥ adite manīṣī

original: RV_10,063.17c īśānāso naro amartyenāstāvi jano divyo gayena //
analyzed: īśānāsaḥ naraḥ amartyena astāvi janaḥ divyaḥ gayena

original: RV_10,064.01a kathā devānāṃ katamasya yāmani sumantu nāma śṛṇvatām manāmahe /
analyzed: kathā devānām katamasya yāmani sumantu nāma śṛṇvatām manāmahe

original: RV_10,064.01c ko mṛḷāti katamo no mayas karat katama ūtī abhy ā vavartati //
analyzed: kaḥ mṛḷāti katamaḥ naḥ mayaḥ karat katamaḥ ūtī abhī ā vavartati

original: RV_10,064.02a kratūyanti kratavo hṛtsu dhītayo venanti venāḥ patayanty ā diśaḥ /
analyzed: kratūyanti kratavaḥ hṛtsu dhītayaḥ venanti venāḥ patayanti ā diśaḥ

original: RV_10,064.02c na marḍitā vidyate anya ebhyo deveṣu me adhi kāmā ayaṃsata //
analyzed: na marḍitā vidyate anyaḥ ebhyaḥ deveṣu me adhi kāmāḥ ayaṃsata

original: RV_10,064.03a narā vā śaṃsam pūṣaṇam agohyam agniṃ deveddham abhy arcase girā /
analyzed: narā vā śaṃsam pūṣaṇam agohyam agnim deva iddham abhī arcase girā

original: RV_10,064.03c sūryāmāsā candramasā yamaṃ divi tritaṃ vātam uṣasam aktum aśvinā //
analyzed: sūryāmāsā candramasā yamam divi tritam vātam uṣasam aktum aśvinā

original: RV_10,064.04a kathā kavis tuvīravān kayā girā bṛhaspatir vāvṛdhate suvṛktibhiḥ /
analyzed: kathā kaviḥ tuvīravān kayā girā bṛhaspatiḥ vāvṛdhate suvṛktibhiḥ

original: RV_10,064.04c aja ekapāt suhavebhir ṛkvabhir ahiḥ śṛṇotu budhnyo havīmani //
analyzed: ajaḥ ekapād su havebhiḥ ṛkvabhiḥ ahiḥ śṛṇotu budhnyaḥ havīmani

original: RV_10,064.05a dakṣasya vādite janmani vrate rājānā mitrāvaruṇā vivāsasi /
analyzed: dakṣasya vā adite janmani vrate rājānā mitrāvaruṇā vivāsasi

original: RV_10,064.05c atūrtapanthāḥ pururatho aryamā saptahotā viṣurūpeṣu janmasu //
analyzed: a tūrta panthāḥ puru rathaḥ aryamā sapta hotā viṣurūpeṣu janmasu

original: RV_10,064.06a te no arvanto havanaśruto havaṃ viśve śṛṇvantu vājino mitadravaḥ /
analyzed: te naḥ arvantaḥ havana śrutaḥ havam viśve śṛṇvantu vājinaḥ mitadravaḥ

original: RV_10,064.06c sahasrasā medhasātāv iva tmanā maho ye dhanaṃ samitheṣu jabhrire //
analyzed: sahasra sāḥ medha sātau iva tmanā mahaḥ ye dhanam samitheṣu jabhrire

original: RV_10,064.07a pra vo vāyuṃ rathayujam purandhiṃ stomaiḥ kṛṇudhvaṃ sakhyāya pūṣaṇam /
analyzed: pra vaḥ vāyum ratha yujam purandhim stomaiḥ kṛṇudhvam sakhyāya pūṣaṇam

original: RV_10,064.07c te hi devasya savituḥ savīmani kratuṃ sacante sacitaḥ sacetasaḥ //
analyzed: te hi devasya savituḥ savīmani kratum sacante sacitaḥ sacetasaḥ

original: RV_10,064.08a triḥ sapta sasrā nadyo mahīr apo vanaspatīn parvatāṃ agnim ūtaye /
analyzed: tris sapta sasrāḥ nadyaḥ mahīḥ apaḥ vanaspatīn parvatān agnim ūtaye

original: RV_10,064.08c kṛśānum astṝn tiṣyaṃ sadhastha ā rudraṃ rudreṣu rudriyaṃ havāmahe //
analyzed: kṛśānum astṝn tiṣyam sadhasthe ā rudram rudreṣu rudriyam havāmahe

original: RV_10,064.09a sarasvatī sarayuḥ sindhur ūrmibhir maho mahīr avasā yantu vakṣaṇīḥ /
analyzed: sarasvatī sarayuḥ sindhuḥ ūrmibhiḥ mahaḥ mahīḥ avasā yantu vakṣaṇīḥ

original: RV_10,064.09c devīr āpo mātaraḥ sūdayitnvo ghṛtavat payo madhuman no arcata //
analyzed: devīḥ āpaḥ mātaraḥ sūdayitnvaḥ ghṛtavat payaḥ madhumat naḥ arcata

original: RV_10,064.10a uta mātā bṛhaddivā śṛṇotu nas tvaṣṭā devebhir janibhiḥ pitā vacaḥ /
analyzed: uta mātā bṛhat divā śṛṇotu naḥ tvaṣṭā devebhiḥ janibhiḥ pitā vacaḥ

original: RV_10,064.10c ṛbhukṣā vājo rathaspatir bhago raṇvaḥ śaṃsaḥ śaśamānasya pātu naḥ //
analyzed: ṛbhukṣāḥ vājaḥ rathaspatiḥ bhagaḥ raṇvaḥ śaṃsaḥ śaśamānasya pātu naḥ

original: RV_10,064.11a raṇvaḥ saṃdṛṣṭau pitumāṃ iva kṣayo bhadrā rudrāṇām marutām upastutiḥ /
analyzed: raṇvaḥ saṃdṛṣṭau pitumān iva kṣayaḥ bhadrā rudrāṇām marutām upastutiḥ

original: RV_10,064.11c gobhiḥ ṣyāma yaśaso janeṣv ā sadā devāsa iḷayā sacemahi //
analyzed: gobhiḥ syāma yaśasaḥ janeṣu ā sadā devāsaḥ iḷayā sacemahi

original: RV_10,064.12a yām me dhiyam maruta indra devā adadāta varuṇa mitra yūyam /
analyzed: yām me dhiyam marutaḥ indra devāḥ adadāta varuṇa mitra yūyam

original: RV_10,064.12c tām pīpayata payaseva dhenuṃ kuvid giro adhi rathe vahātha //
analyzed: tām pīpayata payasā iva dhenum kuvid giraḥ adhi rathe vahātha

original: RV_10,064.13a kuvid aṅga prati yathā cid asya naḥ sajātyasya maruto bubodhatha /
analyzed: kuvid aṅga prati yathā cit asya naḥ sajātyasya marutaḥ bubodhatha

original: RV_10,064.13c nābhā yatra prathamaṃ saṃnasāmahe tatra jāmitvam aditir dadhātu naḥ //
analyzed: nābhā yatra prathamam saṃnasāmahe tatra jāmi tvam aditiḥ dadhātu naḥ

original: RV_10,064.14a te hi dyāvāpṛthivī mātarā mahī devī devāñ janmanā yajñiye itaḥ /
analyzed: te hi dyāvāpṛthivī mātarā mahī devī devām janmanā yajñiye itaḥ

original: RV_10,064.14c ubhe bibhṛta ubhayam bharīmabhiḥ purū retāṃsi pitṛbhiś ca siñcataḥ //
analyzed: ubhe bibhṛtaḥ ubhayam bharīmabhiḥ purū retāṃsi pitṛbhiḥ ca siñcataḥ

original: RV_10,064.15a vi ṣā hotrā viśvam aśnoti vāryam bṛhaspatir aramatiḥ panīyasī /
analyzed: vi sā hotrā viśvam aśnoti vāryam bṛhaspatiḥ aramatiḥ panīyasī

original: RV_10,064.15c grāvā yatra madhuṣud ucyate bṛhad avīvaśanta matibhir manīṣiṇaḥ //
analyzed: grāvā yatra madhuṣut ucyate bṛhat avīvaśanta matibhiḥ manīṣiṇaḥ

original: RV_10,064.16a evā kavis tuvīravāṃ ṛtajñā draviṇasyur draviṇasaś cakānaḥ /
analyzed: eva kaviḥ tuvīravān ṛta jñāḥ draviṇasyuḥ draviṇasaḥ cakānaḥ

original: RV_10,064.16c ukthebhir atra matibhiś ca vipro 'pīpayad gayo divyāni janma //
analyzed: ukthebhiḥ atra matibhiḥ ca vipraḥ pīpayat gayaḥ divyāni janma

original: RV_10,064.17a evā plateḥ sūnur avīvṛdhad vo viśva ādityā adite manīṣī /
analyzed: eva plateḥ sūnuḥ avīvṛdhat vaḥ viśve ādityāḥ adite manīṣī

original: RV_10,064.17c īśānāso naro amartyenāstāvi jano divyo gayena //
analyzed: īśānāsaḥ naraḥ amartyena astāvi janaḥ divyaḥ gayena

original: RV_10,065.01a agnir indro varuṇo mitro aryamā vāyuḥ pūṣā sarasvatī sajoṣasaḥ /
analyzed: agniḥ indraḥ varuṇaḥ mitraḥ aryamā vāyuḥ pūṣā sarasvatī sajoṣasaḥ

original: RV_10,065.01c ādityā viṣṇur marutaḥ svar bṛhat somo rudro aditir brahmaṇas patiḥ //
analyzed: ādityāḥ viṣṇuḥ marutaḥ svar bṛhat somaḥ rudraḥ aditiḥ brahmaṇaḥ patiḥ

original: RV_10,065.02a indrāgnī vṛtrahatyeṣu satpatī mitho hinvānā tanvā samokasā /
analyzed: indra agnī vṛtra hatyeṣu sat patī mithas hinvānā tanvā samokasā

original: RV_10,065.02c antarikṣam mahy ā paprur ojasā somo ghṛtaśrīr mahimānam īrayan //
analyzed: antarikṣam mahi ā papruḥ ojasā somaḥ ghṛtaśrīḥ mahimānam īrayan

original: RV_10,065.03a teṣāṃ hi mahnā mahatām anarvaṇāṃ stomāṃ iyarmy ṛtajñā ṛtāvṛdhām /
analyzed: teṣām hi mahnā mahatām anarvaṇām stomān iyarmi ṛta jñāḥ ṛtāvṛdhām

original: RV_10,065.03c ye apsavam arṇavaṃ citrarādhasas te no rāsantām mahaye sumitryāḥ //
analyzed: ye apsavam arṇavam citra rādhasaḥ te naḥ rāsantām mahaye sumitryāḥ

original: RV_10,065.04a svarṇaram antarikṣāṇi rocanā dyāvābhūmī pṛthivīṃ skambhur ojasā /
analyzed: svarṇaram antarikṣāṇi rocanā dyāvābhūmī pṛthivīm skambhuḥ ojasā

original: RV_10,065.04c pṛkṣā iva mahayantaḥ surātayo devā stavante manuṣāya sūrayaḥ //
analyzed: pṛkṣāḥ iva mahayantaḥ su rātayaḥ devā stavante manuṣāya sūrayaḥ

original: RV_10,065.05a mitrāya śikṣa varuṇāya dāśuṣe yā samrājā manasā na prayucchataḥ /
analyzed: mitrāya śikṣa varuṇāya dāśuṣe yā samrājā manasā na prayucchataḥ

original: RV_10,065.05c yayor dhāma dharmaṇā rocate bṛhad yayor ubhe rodasī nādhasī vṛtau //
analyzed: yayoḥ dhāma dharmaṇā rocate bṛhat yayoḥ ubhe rodasī nādhasī vṛtau

original: RV_10,065.06a yā gaur vartanim paryeti niṣkṛtam payo duhānā vratanīr avārataḥ /
analyzed: yā gauḥ vartanim paryeti niṣkṛtam payaḥ duhānā vratanīḥ avāratas

original: RV_10,065.06c sā prabruvāṇā varuṇāya dāśuṣe devebhyo dāśad dhaviṣā vivasvate //
analyzed: sā prabruvāṇā varuṇāya dāśuṣe devebhyaḥ dāśat haviṣā vivasvate

original: RV_10,065.07a divakṣaso agnijihvā ṛtāvṛdha ṛtasya yoniṃ vimṛśanta āsate /
analyzed: divakṣasaḥ agni jihvāḥ ṛtāvṛdhaḥ ṛtasya yonim vimṛśantaḥ āsate

original: RV_10,065.07c dyāṃ skabhitvy apa ā cakrur ojasā yajñaṃ janitvī tanvī ni māmṛjuḥ //
analyzed: dyām skabhitvī apaḥ ā cakruḥ ojasā yajñam janitvī tanvī ni māmṛjuḥ

original: RV_10,065.08a parikṣitā pitarā pūrvajāvarī ṛtasya yonā kṣayataḥ samokasā /
analyzed: parikṣitā pitarā pūrvajāvarī ṛtasya yonā kṣayataḥ samokasā

original: RV_10,065.08c dyāvāpṛthivī varuṇāya savrate ghṛtavat payo mahiṣāya pinvataḥ //
analyzed: dyāvāpṛthivī varuṇāya savrate ghṛtavat payaḥ mahiṣāya pinvataḥ

original: RV_10,065.09a parjanyāvātā vṛṣabhā purīṣiṇendravāyū varuṇo mitro aryamā /
analyzed: parjanyāvātā vṛṣabhā purīṣiṇā indra vāyū varuṇaḥ mitraḥ aryamā

original: RV_10,065.09c devāṃ ādityāṃ aditiṃ havāmahe ye pārthivāso divyāso apsu ye //
analyzed: devām ādityām aditim havāmahe ye pārthivāsaḥ divyāsaḥ apsu ye

original: RV_10,065.10a tvaṣṭāraṃ vāyum ṛbhavo ya ohate daivyā hotārā uṣasaṃ svastaye /
analyzed: tvaṣṭāram vāyum ṛbhavaḥ yaḥ ohate daivyā hotārau uṣasam svastaye

original: RV_10,065.10c bṛhaspatiṃ vṛtrakhādaṃ sumedhasam indriyaṃ somaṃ dhanasā u īmahe //
analyzed: bṛhaspatim vṛtra khādam sumedhasam indriyam somam dhana sāḥ u īmahe

original: RV_10,065.11a brahma gām aśvaṃ janayanta oṣadhīr vanaspatīn pṛthivīm parvatāṃ apaḥ /
analyzed: brahma gām aśvam janayantaḥ oṣadhīḥ vanaspatīn pṛthivīm parvatān apaḥ

original: RV_10,065.11c sūryaṃ divi rohayantaḥ sudānava āryā vratā visṛjanto adhi kṣami //
analyzed: sūryam divi rohayantaḥ sudānavaḥ āryā vratā visṛjantaḥ adhi kṣami

original: RV_10,065.12a bhujyum aṃhasaḥ pipṛtho nir aśvinā śyāvam putraṃ vadhrimatyā ajinvatam /
analyzed: bhujyum aṃhasaḥ pipṛthaḥ niḥ aśvinā śyāvam putram vadhrimatyāḥ ajinvatam

original: RV_10,065.12c kamadyuvaṃ vimadāyohathur yuvaṃ viṣṇāpvaṃ viśvakāyāva sṛjathaḥ //
analyzed: kamadyuvam vimadāya ūhathuḥ yuvam viṣṇāpvam viśvakāya ava sṛjathaḥ

original: RV_10,065.13a pāvīravī tanyatur ekapād ajo divo dhartā sindhur āpaḥ samudriyaḥ /
analyzed: pāvīravī tanyatuḥ ekapād ajaḥ divaḥ dhartā sindhuḥ āpaḥ samudriyaḥ

original: RV_10,065.13c viśve devāsaḥ śṛṇavan vacāṃsi me sarasvatī saha dhībhiḥ purandhyā //
analyzed: viśve devāsaḥ śṛṇavan vacāṃsi me sarasvatī saha dhībhiḥ purandhyā

original: RV_10,065.14a viśve devāḥ saha dhībhiḥ purandhyā manor yajatrā amṛtā ṛtajñāḥ /
analyzed: viśve devāḥ saha dhībhiḥ purandhyā manoḥ yajatrāḥ amṛtāḥ ṛta jñāḥ

original: RV_10,065.14c rātiṣāco abhiṣācaḥ svarvidaḥ svar giro brahma sūktaṃ juṣerata //
analyzed: rātiṣācaḥ abhiṣācaḥ svar vidaḥ svar giraḥ brahma sūktam juṣerata

original: RV_10,065.15a devān vasiṣṭho amṛtān vavande ye viśvā bhuvanābhi pratasthuḥ /
analyzed: devān vasiṣṭhaḥ amṛtān vavande ye viśvā bhuvanā abhi pratasthuḥ

original: RV_10,065.15c te no rāsantām urugāyam adya yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: te naḥ rāsantām uru gāyam adya yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_10,066.01a devān huve bṛhacchravasaḥ svastaye jyotiṣkṛto adhvarasya pracetasaḥ /
analyzed: devān huve bṛhat śravasaḥ svastaye jyotiṣkṛtaḥ adhvarasya pracetasaḥ

original: RV_10,066.01c ye vāvṛdhuḥ prataraṃ viśvavedasa indrajyeṣṭhāso amṛtā ṛtāvṛdhaḥ //
analyzed: ye vāvṛdhuḥ prataram viśva vedasaḥ indra jyeṣṭhāsaḥ amṛtāḥ ṛtāvṛdhaḥ

original: RV_10,066.02a indraprasūtā varuṇapraśiṣṭā ye sūryasya jyotiṣo bhāgam ānaśuḥ /
analyzed: indra prasūtāḥ varuṇa praśiṣṭāḥ ye sūryasya jyotiṣaḥ bhāgam ānaśuḥ

original: RV_10,066.02c marudgaṇe vṛjane manma dhīmahi māghone yajñaṃ janayanta sūrayaḥ //
analyzed: marut gaṇe vṛjane manma dhīmahi māghone yajñam janayanta sūrayaḥ

original: RV_10,066.03a indro vasubhiḥ pari pātu no gayam ādityair no aditiḥ śarma yacchatu /
analyzed: indraḥ vasubhiḥ pari pātu naḥ gayam ādityaiḥ naḥ aditiḥ śarma yacchatu

original: RV_10,066.03c rudro rudrebhir devo mṛḷayāti nas tvaṣṭā no gnābhiḥ suvitāya jinvatu //
analyzed: rudraḥ rudrebhiḥ devaḥ mṛḍayāti naḥ tvaṣṭā naḥ gnābhiḥ suvitāya jinvatu

original: RV_10,066.04a aditir dyāvāpṛthivī ṛtam mahad indrāviṣṇū marutaḥ svar bṛhat /
analyzed: aditiḥ dyāvāpṛthivī ṛtam mahat indrā viṣṇū marutaḥ svar bṛhat

original: RV_10,066.04c devāṃ ādityāṃ avase havāmahe vasūn rudrān savitāraṃ sudaṃsasam //
analyzed: devām ādityām avase havāmahe vasūn rudrān savitāram su daṃsasam

original: RV_10,066.05a sarasvān dhībhir varuṇo dhṛtavrataḥ pūṣā viṣṇur mahimā vāyur aśvinā /
analyzed: sarasvān dhībhiḥ varuṇaḥ dhṛta vrataḥ pūṣā viṣṇuḥ mahimā vāyuḥ aśvinā

original: RV_10,066.05c brahmakṛto amṛtā viśvavedasaḥ śarma no yaṃsan trivarūtham aṃhasaḥ //
analyzed: brahma kṛtaḥ amṛtāḥ viśva vedasaḥ śarma naḥ yaṃsan tri varūtham aṃhasaḥ

original: RV_10,066.06a vṛṣā yajño vṛṣaṇaḥ santu yajñiyā vṛṣaṇo devā vṛṣaṇo haviṣkṛtaḥ /
analyzed: vṛṣā yajñaḥ vṛṣaṇaḥ santu yajñiyāḥ vṛṣaṇaḥ devāḥ vṛṣaṇaḥ haviṣkṛtaḥ

original: RV_10,066.06c vṛṣaṇā dyāvāpṛthivī ṛtāvarī vṛṣā parjanyo vṛṣaṇo vṛṣastubhaḥ //
analyzed: vṛṣaṇā dyāvāpṛthivī ṛtāvarī vṛṣā parjanyaḥ vṛṣaṇaḥ vṛṣa stubhaḥ

original: RV_10,066.07a agnīṣomā vṛṣaṇā vājasātaye purupraśastā vṛṣaṇā upa bruve /
analyzed: agnīṣomā vṛṣaṇā vājasātaye puru praśastā vṛṣaṇā upa bruve

original: RV_10,066.07c yāv ījire vṛṣaṇo devayajyayā tā naḥ śarma trivarūthaṃ vi yaṃsataḥ //
analyzed: yau ījire vṛṣaṇaḥ deva yajyayā tā naḥ śarma tri varūtham vi yaṃsataḥ

original: RV_10,066.08a dhṛtavratāḥ kṣatriyā yajñaniṣkṛto bṛhaddivā adhvarāṇām abhiśriyaḥ /
analyzed: dhṛta vratāḥ kṣatriyāḥ yajña niṣkṛtaḥ bṛhat divāḥ adhvarāṇām abhiśriyaḥ

original: RV_10,066.08c agnihotāra ṛtasāpo adruho 'po asṛjann anu vṛtratūrye //
analyzed: agni hotāraḥ ṛtasāpaḥ adruhaḥ asṛjan anu vṛtratūrye

original: RV_10,066.09a dyāvāpṛthivī janayann abhi vratāpa oṣadhīr vanināni yajñiyā /
analyzed: dyāvāpṛthivī janayan abhi vratā apaḥ oṣadhīḥ vanināni yajñiyā

original: RV_10,066.09c antarikṣaṃ svar ā paprur ūtaye vaśaṃ devāsas tanvī ni māmṛjuḥ //
analyzed: antarikṣam svar ā papruḥ ūtaye vaśam devāsaḥ tanvī ni māmṛjuḥ

original: RV_10,066.10a dhartāro diva ṛbhavaḥ suhastā vātāparjanyā mahiṣasya tanyatoḥ /
analyzed: dhartāraḥ divaḥ ṛbhavaḥ su hastāḥ vātāparjanyā mahiṣasya tanyatoḥ

original: RV_10,066.10c āpa oṣadhīḥ pra tirantu no giro bhago rātir vājino yantu me havam //
analyzed: āpaḥ oṣadhīḥ pra tirantu naḥ giraḥ bhagaḥ rātiḥ vājinaḥ yantu me havam

original: RV_10,066.11a samudraḥ sindhū rajo antarikṣam aja ekapāt tanayitnur arṇavaḥ /
analyzed: samudraḥ sindhuḥ rajaḥ antarikṣam ajaḥ ekapād tanayitnuḥ arṇavaḥ

original: RV_10,066.11c ahir budhnyaḥ śṛṇavad vacāṃsi me viśve devāsa uta sūrayo mama //
analyzed: ahiḥ budhnyaḥ śṛṇavat vacāṃsi me viśve devāsaḥ uta sūrayaḥ mama

original: RV_10,066.12a syāma vo manavo devavītaye prāñcaṃ no yajñam pra ṇayata sādhuyā /
analyzed: syāma vaḥ manavaḥ deva vītaye prāñcam naḥ yajñam pra nayata sādhuyā

original: RV_10,066.12c ādityā rudrā vasavaḥ sudānava imā brahma śasyamānāni jinvata //
analyzed: ādityāḥ rudrāḥ vasavaḥ sudānavaḥ imā brahma śasyamānāni jinvata

original: RV_10,066.13a daivyā hotārā prathamā purohita ṛtasya panthām anv emi sādhuyā /
analyzed: daivyā hotārā prathamā purohitaḥ ṛtasya panthām anu emi sādhuyā

original: RV_10,066.13c kṣetrasya patim prativeśam īmahe viśvān devāṃ amṛtāṃ aprayucchataḥ //
analyzed: kṣetrasya patim prativeśam īmahe viśvān devān amṛtām aprayucchataḥ

original: RV_10,066.14a vasiṣṭhāsaḥ pitṛvad vācam akrata devāṃ īḷānā ṛṣivat svastaye /
analyzed: vasiṣṭhāsaḥ pitṛ vat vācam akrata devān īḍānāḥ ṛṣi vat svastaye

original: RV_10,066.14c prītā iva jñātayaḥ kāmam etyāsme devāso 'va dhūnutā vasu //
analyzed: prītāḥ iva jñātayaḥ kāmam etya asme devāsaḥ vaḥ dhūnutā vasu

original: RV_10,066.15a devān vasiṣṭho amṛtān vavande ye viśvā bhuvanābhi pratasthuḥ /
analyzed: devān vasiṣṭhaḥ amṛtān vavande ye viśvā bhuvanā abhi pratasthuḥ

original: RV_10,066.15c te no rāsantām urugāyam adya yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: te naḥ rāsantām uru gāyam adya yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_10,067.01a imāṃ dhiyaṃ saptaśīrṣṇīm pitā na ṛtaprajātām bṛhatīm avindat /
analyzed: imām dhiyam sapta śīrṣṇīm pitā naḥ ṛta prajātām bṛhatīm avindat

original: RV_10,067.01c turīyaṃ svij janayad viśvajanyo 'yāsya uktham indrāya śaṃsan //
analyzed: turīyam svid janayat viśvajanyaḥ yā asyaḥ uktham indrāya śaṃsan

original: RV_10,067.02a ṛtaṃ śaṃsanta ṛju dīdhyānā divas putrāso asurasya vīrāḥ /
analyzed: ṛtam śaṃsantaḥ ṛju dīdhyānāḥ divaḥ putrāsaḥ asurasya vīrāḥ

original: RV_10,067.02c vipram padam aṅgiraso dadhānā yajñasya dhāma prathamam mananta //
analyzed: vipram padam aṅgirasaḥ dadhānāḥ yajñasya dhāma prathamam mananta

original: RV_10,067.03a haṃsair iva sakhibhir vāvadadbhir aśmanmayāni nahanā vyasyan /
analyzed: haṃsaiḥ iva sakhibhiḥ vāvadadbhiḥ aśmanmayāni nahanā vyasyan

original: RV_10,067.03c bṛhaspatir abhikanikradad gā uta prāstaud uc ca vidvāṃ agāyat //
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ abhikanikradat gāḥ uta prāstaut ud ca vidvān agāyat

original: RV_10,067.04a avo dvābhyām para ekayā gā guhā tiṣṭhantīr anṛtasya setau /
analyzed: avas dvābhyām paras ekayā gāḥ guhā tiṣṭhantīḥ anṛtasya setau

original: RV_10,067.04c bṛhaspatis tamasi jyotir icchann ud usrā ākar vi hi tisra āvaḥ //
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ tamasi jyotiḥ icchan ud usrāḥ ākaḥ vi hi tisraḥ āvaḥ

original: RV_10,067.05a vibhidyā puraṃ śayathem apācīṃ nis trīṇi sākam udadher akṛntat /
analyzed: vibhidya puram śayatha īm apācīm niḥ trīṇi sākam udadheḥ akṛntat

original: RV_10,067.05c bṛhaspatir uṣasaṃ sūryaṃ gām arkaṃ viveda stanayann iva dyauḥ //
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ uṣasam sūryam gām arkam viveda stanayan iva dyauḥ

original: RV_10,067.06a indro valaṃ rakṣitāraṃ dughānāṃ kareṇeva vi cakartā raveṇa /
analyzed: indraḥ valam rakṣitāram dughānām kareṇa iva vi cakarta raveṇa

original: RV_10,067.06c svedāñjibhir āśiram icchamāno 'rodayat paṇim ā gā amuṣṇāt //
analyzed: sveda añjibhiḥ āśiram icchamānaḥ rodayat paṇim ā gāḥ amuṣṇāt

original: RV_10,067.07a sa īṃ satyebhiḥ sakhibhiḥ śucadbhir godhāyasaṃ vi dhanasair adardaḥ /
analyzed: saḥ īm satyebhiḥ sakhibhiḥ śucadbhiḥ godhāyasam vi dhanasaiḥ adardar

original: RV_10,067.07c brahmaṇas patir vṛṣabhir varāhair gharmasvedebhir draviṇaṃ vy ānaṭ //
analyzed: brahmaṇaḥ patiḥ vṛṣabhiḥ varāhaiḥ gharma svedebhiḥ draviṇam vi ānaṭ

original: RV_10,067.08a te satyena manasā gopatiṃ gā iyānāsa iṣaṇayanta dhībhiḥ /
analyzed: te satyena manasā gopatim gāḥ iyānāsaḥ iṣaṇayanta dhībhiḥ

original: RV_10,067.08c bṛhaspatir mithoavadyapebhir ud usriyā asṛjata svayugbhiḥ //
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ mithoavadyapebhiḥ ud usriyāḥ asṛjata sva yugbhiḥ

original: RV_10,067.09a taṃ vardhayanto matibhiḥ śivābhiḥ siṃham iva nānadataṃ sadhasthe /
analyzed: tam vardhayantaḥ matibhiḥ śivābhiḥ siṃham iva nānadatam sadhasthe

original: RV_10,067.09c bṛhaspatiṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ śūrasātau bhare-bhare anu madema jiṣṇum //
analyzed: bṛhaspatim vṛṣaṇam śūrasātau bharebhare anu madema jiṣṇum

original: RV_10,067.10a yadā vājam asanad viśvarūpam ā dyām arukṣad uttarāṇi sadma /
analyzed: yadā vājam asanat viśva rūpam ā dyām arukṣat uttarāṇi sadma

original: RV_10,067.10c bṛhaspatiṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ vardhayanto nānā santo bibhrato jyotir āsā //
analyzed: bṛhaspatim vṛṣaṇam vardhayantaḥ nānā santaḥ bibhrataḥ jyotiḥ āsā

original: RV_10,067.11a satyām āśiṣaṃ kṛṇutā vayodhai kīriṃ cid dhy avatha svebhir evaiḥ /
analyzed: satyām āśiṣam kṛṇutā vayodhai kīrim cit hi avatha svebhiḥ evaiḥ

original: RV_10,067.11c paścā mṛdho apa bhavantu viśvās tad rodasī śṛṇutaṃ viśvaminve //
analyzed: paścā mṛdhaḥ apa bhavantu viśvāḥ tat rodasī śṛṇutam viśvaminve

original: RV_10,067.12a indro mahnā mahato arṇavasya vi mūrdhānam abhinad arbudasya /
analyzed: indraḥ mahnā mahataḥ arṇavasya vi mūrdhānam abhinat arbudasya

original: RV_10,067.12c ahann ahim ariṇāt sapta sindhūn devair dyāvāpṛthivī prāvataṃ naḥ //
analyzed: ahan ahim ariṇāt sapta sindhūn devaiḥ dyāvāpṛthivī prāvatam naḥ

original: RV_10,068.01a udapruto na vayo rakṣamāṇā vāvadato abhriyasyeva ghoṣāḥ /
analyzed: uda prutaḥ na vayaḥ rakṣamāṇāḥ vāvadataḥ abhriyasya iva ghoṣāḥ

original: RV_10,068.01c giribhrajo normayo madanto bṛhaspatim abhy arkā anāvan //
analyzed: giri bhrajaḥ nā ūrmayaḥ madantaḥ bṛhaspatim abhi arkāḥ anāvan

original: RV_10,068.02a saṃ gobhir āṅgiraso nakṣamāṇo bhaga ived aryamaṇaṃ nināya /
analyzed: sam gobhiḥ āṅgirasaḥ nakṣamāṇaḥ bhagaḥ iva id aryamaṇam nināya

original: RV_10,068.02c jane mitro na dampatī anakti bṛhaspate vājayāśūṃr ivājau //
analyzed: jane mitraḥ na dampatī anakti bṛhaspate vājaya āśūn iva ājau

original: RV_10,068.03a sādhvaryā atithinīr iṣirā spārhāḥ suvarṇā anavadyarūpāḥ /
analyzed: sādhvaryāḥ atithinīḥ iṣirāḥ spārhāḥ su varṇāḥ anavadya rūpāḥ

original: RV_10,068.03c bṛhaspatiḥ parvatebhyo vitūryā nir gā ūpe yavam iva sthivibhyaḥ //
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ parvatebhyaḥ vitūrya niḥ gāḥ ūpe yavam iva sthivibhyaḥ

original: RV_10,068.04a āpruṣāyan madhuna ṛtasya yonim avakṣipann arka ulkām iva dyoḥ /
analyzed: āpruṣāyan madhunaḥ ṛtasya yonim avakṣipan arkaḥ ulkām iva dyoḥ

original: RV_10,068.04c bṛhaspatir uddharann aśmano gā bhūmyā udneva vi tvacam bibheda //
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ uddharan aśmanaḥ gāḥ bhūmyāḥ udnā iva vi tvacam bibheda

original: RV_10,068.05a apa jyotiṣā tamo antarikṣād udnaḥ śīpālam iva vāta ājat /
analyzed: apa jyotiṣā tamaḥ antarikṣāt udnaḥ śīpālam iva vātaḥ ājat

original: RV_10,068.05c bṛhaspatir anumṛśyā valasyābhram iva vāta ā cakra ā gāḥ //
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ anumṛśya valasya abhram iva vātaḥ ā cakre ā gāḥ

original: RV_10,068.06a yadā valasya pīyato jasum bhed bṛhaspatir agnitapobhir arkaiḥ /
analyzed: yadā valasya pīyataḥ jasum bhet bṛhaspatiḥ agni tapobhiḥ arkaiḥ

original: RV_10,068.06c dadbhir na jihvā pariviṣṭam ādad āvir nidhīṃr akṛṇod usriyāṇām //
analyzed: dadbhiḥ na jihvā pariviṣṭam ādat āvis nidhīṃr akṛṇot usriyāṇām

original: RV_10,068.07a bṛhaspatir amata hi tyad āsāṃ nāma svarīṇāṃ sadane guhā yat /
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ amata hi tyad āsām nāma svarīṇām sadane guhā yat

original: RV_10,068.07c āṇḍeva bhittvā śakunasya garbham ud usriyāḥ parvatasya tmanājat //
analyzed: āṇḍā iva bhittvā śakunasya garbham ud usriyāḥ parvatasya tmanā ajat

original: RV_10,068.08a aśnāpinaddham madhu pary apaśyan matsyaṃ na dīna udani kṣiyantam /
analyzed: aśnā apinaddham madhu pari apaśyat matsyam na dīne udani kṣiyantam

original: RV_10,068.08c niṣ ṭaj jabhāra camasaṃ na vṛkṣād bṛhaspatir viraveṇā vikṛtya //
analyzed: niḥ tat jabhāra camasam na vṛkṣāt bṛhaspatiḥ viraveṇa vikṛtya

original: RV_10,068.09a soṣām avindat sa svaḥ so agniṃ so arkeṇa vi babādhe tamāṃsi /
analyzed: sa uṣām avindat sa svar saḥ agnim saḥ arkeṇa vi babādhe tamāṃsi

original: RV_10,068.09c bṛhaspatir govapuṣo valasya nir majjānaṃ na parvaṇo jabhāra //
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ go vapuṣaḥ valasya niḥ majjānam na parvaṇaḥ jabhāra

original: RV_10,068.10a himeva parṇā muṣitā vanāni bṛhaspatinākṛpayad valo gāḥ /
analyzed: himā iva parṇā muṣitā vanāni bṛhaspatinā akṛpayat valaḥ gāḥ

original: RV_10,068.10c anānukṛtyam apunaś cakāra yāt sūryāmāsā mitha uccarātaḥ //
analyzed: anānukṛtyam apunar cakāra yāt sūryāmāsā mithas uccarātaḥ

original: RV_10,068.11a abhi śyāvaṃ na kṛśanebhir aśvaṃ nakṣatrebhiḥ pitaro dyām apiṃśan /
analyzed: abhi śyāvam na kṛśanebhiḥ aśvam nakṣatrebhiḥ pitaraḥ dyām apiṃśan

original: RV_10,068.11c rātryāṃ tamo adadhur jyotir ahan bṛhaspatir bhinad adriṃ vidad gāḥ //
analyzed: rātryām tamaḥ adadhuḥ jyotiḥ ahan bṛhaspatiḥ bhinat adrim vidat gāḥ

original: RV_10,068.12a idam akarma namo abhriyāya yaḥ pūrvīr anv ānonavīti /
analyzed: idam akarma namaḥ abhriyāya yaḥ pūrvīḥ anu ānonavīti

original: RV_10,068.12c bṛhaspatiḥ sa hi gobhiḥ so aśvaiḥ sa vīrebhiḥ sa nṛbhir no vayo dhāt //
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ sa hi gobhiḥ saḥ aśvaiḥ sa vīrebhiḥ sa nṛbhiḥ naḥ vayaḥ dhāt

original: RV_10,069.01a bhadrā agner vadhryaśvasya saṃdṛśo vāmī praṇītiḥ suraṇā upetayaḥ /
analyzed: bhadrāḥ agneḥ vadhryaśvasya saṃdṛśaḥ vāmī praṇītiḥ suraṇāḥ upetayaḥ

original: RV_10,069.01c yad īṃ sumitrā viśo agra indhate ghṛtenāhuto jarate davidyutat //
analyzed: yat īm sumitrāḥ viśaḥ agre indhate ghṛtena āhutaḥ jarate davidyutat

original: RV_10,069.02a ghṛtam agner vadhryaśvasya vardhanaṃ ghṛtam annaṃ ghṛtam v asya medanam /
analyzed: ghṛtam agneḥ vadhryaśvasya vardhanam ghṛtam annam ghṛtam u asya medanam

original: RV_10,069.02c ghṛtenāhuta urviyā vi paprathe sūrya iva rocate sarpirāsutiḥ //
analyzed: ghṛtena āhutaḥ urviyā vi paprathe sūryaḥ iva rocate sarpiḥ āsutiḥ

original: RV_10,069.03a yat te manur yad anīkaṃ sumitraḥ samīdhe agne tad idaṃ navīyaḥ /
analyzed: yat te manuḥ yat anīkam sumitraḥ samīdhe agne tat idam navīyaḥ

original: RV_10,069.03c sa revac choca sa giro juṣasva sa vājaṃ darṣi sa iha śravo dhāḥ //
analyzed: sa revat śoca sa giraḥ juṣasva sa vājam darṣi saḥ iha śravaḥ dhāḥ

original: RV_10,069.04a yaṃ tvā pūrvam īḷito vadhryaśvaḥ samīdhe agne sa idaṃ juṣasva /
analyzed: yam tvā pūrvam īḍitaḥ vadhryaśvaḥ samīdhe agne saḥ idam juṣasva

original: RV_10,069.04c sa na stipā uta bhavā tanūpā dātraṃ rakṣasva yad idaṃ te asme //
analyzed: sa na stipāḥ uta bhava tanū pāḥ dātram rakṣasva yat idam te asme

original: RV_10,069.05a bhavā dyumnī vādhryaśvota gopā mā tvā tārīd abhimātir janānām /
analyzed: bhava dyumnī vādhryaśva uta gopāḥ mā tvā tārīt abhimātiḥ janānām

original: RV_10,069.05c śūra iva dhṛṣṇuś cyavanaḥ sumitraḥ pra nu vocaṃ vādhryaśvasya nāma //
analyzed: śūraḥ iva dhṛṣṇuḥ cyavanaḥ sumitraḥ pra nu vocam vādhryaśvasya nāma

original: RV_10,069.06a sam ajryā parvatyā vasūni dāsā vṛtrāṇy āryā jigetha /
analyzed: sam ajryā parvatyā vasūni dāsā vṛtrāṇi āryā jigetha

original: RV_10,069.06c śūra iva dhṛṣṇuś cyavano janānāṃ tvam agne pṛtanāyūṃr abhi ṣyāḥ //
analyzed: śūraḥ iva dhṛṣṇuḥ cyavanaḥ janānām tvam agne pṛtanāyūn abhi syāḥ

original: RV_10,069.07a dīrghatantur bṛhadukṣāyam agniḥ sahasrastarīḥ śatanītha ṛbhvā /
analyzed: dīrgha tantuḥ bṛhat ukṣā ayam agniḥ sahasra starīḥ śata nīthaḥ ṛbhvā

original: RV_10,069.07c dyumān dyumatsu nṛbhir mṛjyamānaḥ sumitreṣu dīdayo devayatsu //
analyzed: dyumān dyumatsu nṛbhiḥ mṛjyamānaḥ sumitreṣu dīdayaḥ devayatsu

original: RV_10,069.08a tve dhenuḥ sudughā jātavedo 'saścateva samanā sabardhuk /
analyzed: tve dhenuḥ su dughā jātavedaḥ saścatā iva samanā sabarduh

original: RV_10,069.08c tvaṃ nṛbhir dakṣiṇāvadbhir agne sumitrebhir idhyase devayadbhiḥ //
analyzed: tvam nṛbhiḥ dakṣiṇāvadbhiḥ agne sumitrebhiḥ idhyase devayadbhiḥ

original: RV_10,069.09a devāś cit te amṛtā jātavedo mahimānaṃ vādhryaśva pra vocan /
analyzed: devāḥ cit te amṛtāḥ jātavedaḥ mahimānam vādhryaśva pra vocan

original: RV_10,069.09c yat sampṛccham mānuṣīr viśa āyan tvaṃ nṛbhir ajayas tvāvṛdhebhiḥ //
analyzed: yat sampṛccham mānuṣīḥ viśaḥ āyan tvam nṛbhiḥ ajayaḥ tvāvṛdhebhiḥ

original: RV_10,069.10a piteva putram abibhar upasthe tvām agne vadhryaśvaḥ saparyan /
analyzed: pitā iva putram abibhar upasthe tvām agne vadhryaśvaḥ saparyan

original: RV_10,069.10c juṣāṇo asya samidhaṃ yaviṣṭhota pūrvāṃ avanor vrādhataś cit //
analyzed: juṣāṇaḥ asya samidham yaviṣṭha uta pūrvām avanoḥ vrādhataḥ cit

original: RV_10,069.11a śaśvad agnir vadhryaśvasya śatrūn nṛbhir jigāya sutasomavadbhiḥ /
analyzed: śaśvat agniḥ vadhryaśvasya śatrūn nṛbhiḥ jigāya suta somavadbhiḥ

original: RV_10,069.11c samanaṃ cid adahaś citrabhāno 'va vrādhantam abhinad vṛdhaś cit //
analyzed: samanam cit adahaḥ citrabhāno vaḥ vrādhantam abhinat vṛdhaḥ cit

original: RV_10,069.12a ayam agnir vadhryaśvasya vṛtrahā sanakāt preddho namasopavākyaḥ /
analyzed: ayam agniḥ vadhryaśvasya vṛtra hā sanakāt preddhaḥ namasā upavākyaḥ

original: RV_10,069.12c sa no ajāmīṃr uta vā vijāmīn abhi tiṣṭha śardhato vādhryaśva //
analyzed: sa naḥ ajāmīn uta vā vijāmīn abhi tiṣṭha śardhataḥ vādhryaśva

original: RV_10,070.01a imām me agne samidhaṃ juṣasveḷas pade prati haryā ghṛtācīm /
analyzed: imām me agne samidham juṣasva iḷaḥ pade prati harya ghṛtācīm

original: RV_10,070.01c varṣman pṛthivyāḥ sudinatve ahnām ūrdhvo bhava sukrato devayajyā //
analyzed: varṣman pṛthivyāḥ su dina tve ahnām ūrdhvaḥ bhava su krato deva yajyā

original: RV_10,070.02a ā devānām agrayāveha yātu narāśaṃso viśvarūpebhir aśvaiḥ /
analyzed: ā devānām agra yāvā iha yātu narāśaṃsaḥ viśva rūpebhiḥ aśvaiḥ

original: RV_10,070.02c ṛtasya pathā namasā miyedho devebhyo devatamaḥ suṣūdat //
analyzed: ṛtasya pathā namasā miyedhaḥ devebhyaḥ devatamaḥ suṣūdat

original: RV_10,070.03a śaśvattamam īḷate dūtyāya haviṣmanto manuṣyāso agnim /
analyzed: śaśvattamam īḍate dūtyāya haviṣmantaḥ manuṣyāsaḥ agnim

original: RV_10,070.03c vahiṣṭhair aśvaiḥ suvṛtā rathenā devān vakṣi ni ṣadeha hotā //
analyzed: vahiṣṭhaiḥ aśvaiḥ suvṛtā rathena devān vakṣi ni sada iha hotā

original: RV_10,070.04a vi prathatāṃ devajuṣṭaṃ tiraścā dīrghaṃ drāghmā surabhi bhūtv asme /
analyzed: vi prathatām deva juṣṭam tiraścā dīrgham drāghmā surabhi bhūtu asme

original: RV_10,070.04c aheḷatā manasā deva barhir indrajyeṣṭhāṃ uśato yakṣi devān //
analyzed: a heḍatā manasā deva barhiḥ indra jyeṣṭhām uśataḥ yakṣi devān

original: RV_10,070.05a divo vā sānu spṛśatā varīyaḥ pṛthivyā vā mātrayā vi śrayadhvam /
analyzed: divaḥ vā sānu spṛśata varīyaḥ pṛthivyāḥ vā mātrayā vi śrayadhvam

original: RV_10,070.05c uśatīr dvāro mahinā mahadbhir devaṃ rathaṃ rathayur dhārayadhvam //
analyzed: uśatīḥ dvāraḥ mahinā mahadbhiḥ devam ratham rathayuḥ dhārayadhvam

original: RV_10,070.06a devī divo duhitarā suśilpe uṣāsānaktā sadatāṃ ni yonau /
analyzed: devī divaḥ duhitarā su śilpe uṣāsānaktā sadatām ni yonau

original: RV_10,070.06c ā vāṃ devāsa uśatī uśanta urau sīdantu subhage upasthe //
analyzed: ā vām devāsaḥ uśatī uśantaḥ urau sīdantu subhage upasthe

original: RV_10,070.07a ūrdhvo grāvā bṛhad agniḥ samiddhaḥ priyā dhāmāny aditer upasthe /
analyzed: ūrdhvaḥ grāvā bṛhat agniḥ samiddhaḥ priyā dhāmāni aditeḥ upasthe

original: RV_10,070.07c purohitāv ṛtvijā yajñe asmin viduṣṭarā draviṇam ā yajethām //
analyzed: purohitau ṛtvijā yajñe asmin viduṣṭarā draviṇam ā yajethām

original: RV_10,070.08a tisro devīr barhir idaṃ varīya ā sīdata cakṛmā vaḥ syonam /
analyzed: tisraḥ devīḥ barhiḥ idam varīyaḥ ā sīdata cakṛma vaḥ syonam

original: RV_10,070.08c manuṣvad yajñaṃ sudhitā havīṃṣīḷā devī ghṛtapadī juṣanta //
analyzed: manuṣvat yajñam sudhitā havīṃṣi iḷā devī ghṛtapadī juṣanta

original: RV_10,070.09a deva tvaṣṭar yad dha cārutvam ānaḍ yad aṅgirasām abhavaḥ sacābhūḥ /
analyzed: deva tvaṣṭar yat ha cāru tvam ānaṭ yat aṅgirasām abhavaḥ sacābhūḥ

original: RV_10,070.09c sa devānām pātha upa pra vidvāṃ uśan yakṣi draviṇodaḥ suratnaḥ //
analyzed: sa devānām pāthaḥ upa pra vidvān uśan yakṣi draviṇaḥ daḥ su ratnaḥ

original: RV_10,070.10a vanaspate raśanayā niyūyā devānām pātha upa vakṣi vidvān /
analyzed: vanaspate raśanayā niyūyā devānām pāthaḥ upa vakṣi vidvān

original: RV_10,070.10c svadāti devaḥ kṛṇavad dhavīṃṣy avatāṃ dyāvāpṛthivī havam me //
analyzed: svadāti devaḥ kṛṇavat havīṃṣi avatām dyāvāpṛthivī havam me

original: RV_10,070.11a āgne vaha varuṇam iṣṭaye na indraṃ divo maruto antarikṣāt /
analyzed: ā agne vaha varuṇam iṣṭaye naḥ indram divaḥ marutaḥ antarikṣāt

original: RV_10,070.11c sīdantu barhir viśva ā yajatrāḥ svāhā devā amṛtā mādayantām //
analyzed: sīdantu barhiḥ viśve ā yajatrāḥ svāhā devāḥ amṛtāḥ mādayantām

original: RV_10,071.01a bṛhaspate prathamaṃ vāco agraṃ yat prairata nāmadheyaṃ dadhānāḥ /
analyzed: bṛhaspate prathamam vācaḥ agram yat prairata nāmadheyam dadhānāḥ

original: RV_10,071.01c yad eṣāṃ śreṣṭhaṃ yad aripram āsīt preṇā tad eṣāṃ nihitaṃ guhāviḥ //
analyzed: yat eṣām śreṣṭham yat aripram āsīt preṇā tat eṣām nihitam guhā āvis

original: RV_10,071.02a saktum iva titaunā punanto yatra dhīrā manasā vācam akrata /
analyzed: saktum iva titaunā punantaḥ yatra dhīrāḥ manasā vācam akrata

original: RV_10,071.02c atrā sakhāyaḥ sakhyāni jānate bhadraiṣāṃ lakṣmīr nihitādhi vāci //
analyzed: atrā sakhāyaḥ sakhyāni jānate bhadrā eṣām lakṣmīḥ nihitā adhi vāci

original: RV_10,071.03a yajñena vācaḥ padavīyam āyan tām anv avindann ṛṣiṣu praviṣṭām /
analyzed: yajñena vācaḥ padavīyam āyan tām anu avindan ṛṣiṣu praviṣṭām

original: RV_10,071.03c tām ābhṛtyā vy adadhuḥ purutrā tāṃ sapta rebhā abhi saṃ navante //
analyzed: tām ābhṛtyāḥ vi adadhuḥ purutrā tām sapta rebhāḥ abhi sam navante

original: RV_10,071.04a uta tvaḥ paśyan na dadarśa vācam uta tvaḥ śṛṇvan na śṛṇoty enām /
analyzed: uta tvaḥ paśyan na dadarśa vācam uta tvaḥ śṛṇvan na śṛṇoti enām

original: RV_10,071.04c uto tvasmai tanvaṃ vi sasre jāyeva patya uśatī suvāsāḥ //
analyzed: uta u tvasmai tanvam vi sasre jāyā iva patye uśatī su vāsāḥ

original: RV_10,071.05a uta tvaṃ sakhye sthirapītam āhur nainaṃ hinvanty api vājineṣu /
analyzed: uta tvam sakhye sthira pītam āhuḥ na enam hinvanti api vājineṣu

original: RV_10,071.05c adhenvā carati māyayaiṣa vācaṃ śuśruvāṃ aphalām apuṣpām //
analyzed: a dhenvā carati māyayā eṣa vācam śuśruvām aphalām apuṣpām

original: RV_10,071.06a yas tityāja sacividaṃ sakhāyaṃ na tasya vācy api bhāgo asti /
analyzed: yaḥ tityāja sacividam sakhāyam na tasya vāci api bhāgaḥ asti

original: RV_10,071.06c yad īṃ śṛṇoty alakaṃ śṛṇoti nahi praveda sukṛtasya panthām //
analyzed: yat īm śṛṇoti alakam śṛṇoti nahi praveda sukṛtasya panthām

original: RV_10,071.07a akṣaṇvantaḥ karṇavantaḥ sakhāyo manojaveṣv asamā babhūvuḥ /
analyzed: akṣaṇvantaḥ karṇavantaḥ sakhāyaḥ manaḥ javeṣu asamāḥ babhūvuḥ

original: RV_10,071.07c ādaghnāsa upakakṣāsa u tve hradā iva snātvā u tve dadṛśre //
analyzed: ādaghnāsaḥ upakakṣāsaḥ u tve hradāḥ iva snātvā u tve dadṛśre

original: RV_10,071.08a hṛdā taṣṭeṣu manaso javeṣu yad brāhmaṇāḥ saṃyajante sakhāyaḥ /
analyzed: hṛdā taṣṭeṣu manasaḥ javeṣu yat brāhmaṇāḥ saṃyajante sakhāyaḥ

original: RV_10,071.08c atrāha tvaṃ vi jahur vedyābhir ohabrahmāṇo vi caranty u tve //
analyzed: atra aha tvam vi jahuḥ vedyābhiḥ oha brahmāṇaḥ vi caranti u tve

original: RV_10,071.09a ime ye nārvāṅ na paraś caranti na brāhmaṇāso na sutekarāsaḥ /
analyzed: ime ye na arvāk na paras caranti na brāhmaṇāsaḥ na sutekarāsaḥ

original: RV_10,071.09c ta ete vācam abhipadya pāpayā sirīs tantraṃ tanvate aprajajñayaḥ //
analyzed: te ete vācam abhipadya pāpayā sirīḥ tantram tanvate aprajajñayaḥ

original: RV_10,071.10a sarve nandanti yaśasāgatena sabhāsāhena sakhyā sakhāyaḥ /
analyzed: sarve nandanti yaśasā āgatena sabhāsāhena sakhyā sakhāyaḥ

original: RV_10,071.10c kilbiṣaspṛt pituṣaṇir hy eṣām araṃ hito bhavati vājināya //
analyzed: kilbiṣa spṛt pituṣaṇiḥ hi eṣām aram hitaḥ bhavati vājināya

original: RV_10,071.11a ṛcāṃ tvaḥ poṣam āste pupuṣvān gāyatraṃ tvo gāyati śakvarīṣu /
analyzed: ṛcām tvaḥ poṣam āste pupuṣvān gāyatram tvaḥ gāyati śakvarīṣu

original: RV_10,071.11c brahmā tvo vadati jātavidyāṃ yajñasya mātrāṃ vi mimīta u tvaḥ //
analyzed: brahmā tvaḥ vadati jāta vidyām yajñasya mātrām vi mimīte u tvaḥ

original: RV_10,072.01a devānāṃ nu vayaṃ jānā pra vocāma vipanyayā /
analyzed: devānām nu vayam jānā pra vocāma vipanyayā

original: RV_10,072.01c uktheṣu śasyamāneṣu yaḥ paśyād uttare yuge //
analyzed: uktheṣu śasyamāneṣu yaḥ paśyāt uttare yuge

original: RV_10,072.02a brahmaṇas patir etā saṃ karmāra ivādhamat /
analyzed: brahmaṇaḥ patiḥ etā sam karmāraḥ iva adhamat

original: RV_10,072.02c devānām pūrvye yuge 'sataḥ sad ajāyata //
analyzed: devānām pūrvye yuge sataḥ sat ajāyata

original: RV_10,072.03a devānāṃ yuge prathame 'sataḥ sad ajāyata /
analyzed: devānām yuge prathame sataḥ sat ajāyata

original: RV_10,072.03c tad āśā anv ajāyanta tad uttānapadas pari //
analyzed: tat āśāḥ anu ajāyanta tat uttāna padaḥ pari

original: RV_10,072.04a bhūr jajña uttānapado bhuva āśā ajāyanta /
