original: RV_10,092.01c śocañ chuṣkāsu hariṇīṣu jarbhurad vṛṣā ketur yajato dyām aśāyata //
analyzed: śocam śuṣkāsu hariṇīṣu jarbhurat vṛṣā ketuḥ yajataḥ dyām aśāyata

original: RV_10,092.02a imam añjaspām ubhaye akṛṇvata dharmāṇam agniṃ vidathasya sādhanam /
analyzed: imam añjaspām ubhaye akṛṇvata dharmāṇam agnim vidathasya sādhanam

original: RV_10,092.02c aktuṃ na yahvam uṣasaḥ purohitaṃ tanūnapātam aruṣasya niṃsate //
analyzed: aktum na yahvam uṣasaḥ purohitam tanū napātam aruṣasya niṃsate

original: RV_10,092.03a baḷ asya nīthā vi paṇeś ca manmahe vayā asya prahutā āsur attave /
analyzed: baṭ asya nīthā vi paṇeḥ ca manmahe vayāḥ asya prahutāḥ āsuḥ attave

original: RV_10,092.03c yadā ghorāso amṛtatvam āśatād ij janasya daivyasya carkiran //
analyzed: yadā ghorāsaḥ amṛta tvam āśata āt id janasya daivyasya carkiran

original: RV_10,092.04a ṛtasya hi prasitir dyaur uru vyaco namo mahy aramatiḥ panīyasī /
analyzed: ṛtasya hi prasitiḥ dyauḥ uru vyacaḥ namaḥ mahī aramatiḥ panīyasī

original: RV_10,092.04c indro mitro varuṇaḥ saṃ cikitrire 'tho bhagaḥ savitā pūtadakṣasaḥ //
analyzed: indraḥ mitraḥ varuṇaḥ sam cikitrire thaḥ bhagaḥ savitā pūta dakṣasaḥ

original: RV_10,092.05a pra rudreṇa yayinā yanti sindhavas tiro mahīm aramatiṃ dadhanvire /
analyzed: pra rudreṇa yayinā yanti sindhavaḥ tiras mahīm aramatim dadhanvire

original: RV_10,092.05c yebhiḥ parijmā pariyann uru jrayo vi roruvaj jaṭhare viśvam ukṣate //
analyzed: yebhiḥ parijmā pariyan uru jrayaḥ vi roruvat jaṭhare viśvam ukṣate

original: RV_10,092.06a krāṇā rudrā maruto viśvakṛṣṭayo divaḥ śyenāso asurasya nīḷayaḥ /
analyzed: krāṇāḥ rudrāḥ marutaḥ viśvakṛṣṭayaḥ divaḥ śyenāsaḥ asurasya nīḷayaḥ

original: RV_10,092.06c tebhiś caṣṭe varuṇo mitro aryamendro devebhir arvaśebhir arvaśaḥ //
analyzed: tebhiḥ caṣṭe varuṇaḥ mitraḥ aryamā indraḥ devebhiḥ arvaśebhiḥ arvaśaḥ

original: RV_10,092.07a indre bhujaṃ śaśamānāsa āśata sūro dṛśīke vṛṣaṇaś ca pauṃsye /
analyzed: indre bhujam śaśamānāsaḥ āśata sūraḥ dṛśīke vṛṣaṇaḥ ca pauṃsye

original: RV_10,092.07c pra ye nv asyārhaṇā tatakṣire yujaṃ vajraṃ nṛṣadaneṣu kāravaḥ //
analyzed: pra ye nu asya arhaṇā tatakṣire yujam vajram nṛṣadaneṣu kāravaḥ

original: RV_10,092.08a sūraś cid ā harito asya rīramad indrād ā kaś cid bhayate tavīyasaḥ /
analyzed: sūraḥ cit ā haritaḥ asya rīramat indrāt ā kaḥ cit bhayate tavīyasaḥ

original: RV_10,092.08c bhīmasya vṛṣṇo jaṭharād abhiśvaso dive-dive sahuri stann abādhitaḥ //
analyzed: bhīmasya vṛṣṇaḥ jaṭharāt dive dive sahuri stan a bādhitaḥ

original: RV_10,092.09a stomaṃ vo adya rudrāya śikvase kṣayadvīrāya namasā didiṣṭana /
analyzed: stomam vaḥ adya rudrāya śikvase kṣayadvīrāya namasā didiṣṭana

original: RV_10,092.09c yebhiḥ śivaḥ svavāṃ evayāvabhir divaḥ siṣakti svayaśā nikāmabhiḥ //
analyzed: yebhiḥ śivaḥ svavān eva yāvabhiḥ divaḥ siṣakti sva yaśāḥ nikāmabhiḥ

original: RV_10,092.10a te hi prajāyā abharanta vi śravo bṛhaspatir vṛṣabhaḥ somajāmayaḥ /
analyzed: te hi prajāyai abharanta vi śravaḥ bṛhaspatiḥ vṛṣabhaḥ soma jāmayaḥ

original: RV_10,092.10c yajñair atharvā prathamo vi dhārayad devā dakṣair bhṛgavaḥ saṃ cikitrire //
analyzed: yajñaiḥ atharvā prathamaḥ vi dhārayat devāḥ dakṣaiḥ bhṛgavaḥ sam cikitrire

original: RV_10,092.11a te hi dyāvāpṛthivī bhūriretasā narāśaṃsaś caturaṅgo yamo 'ditiḥ /
analyzed: te hi dyāvāpṛthivī bhūri retasā narāśaṃsaḥ catur aṅgaḥ yamaḥ ditiḥ

original: RV_10,092.11c devas tvaṣṭā draviṇodā ṛbhukṣaṇaḥ pra rodasī maruto viṣṇur arhire //
analyzed: devaḥ tvaṣṭā draviṇaḥ dāḥ ṛbhukṣaṇaḥ pra rodasī marutaḥ viṣṇuḥ arhire

original: RV_10,092.12a uta sya na uśijām urviyā kavir ahiḥ śṛṇotu budhnyo havīmani /
analyzed: uta sya naḥ uśijām urviyā kaviḥ ahiḥ śṛṇotu budhnyaḥ havīmani

original: RV_10,092.12c sūryāmāsā vicarantā divikṣitā dhiyā śamīnahuṣī asya bodhatam //
analyzed: sūryāmāsā vicarantā divikṣitā dhiyā śamī nahuṣī asya bodhatam

original: RV_10,092.13a pra naḥ pūṣā carathaṃ viśvadevyo 'pāṃ napād avatu vāyur iṣṭaye /
analyzed: pra naḥ pūṣā caratham viśvadevyā u pām napāt avatu vāyuḥ iṣṭaye

original: RV_10,092.13c ātmānaṃ vasyo abhi vātam arcata tad aśvinā suhavā yāmani śrutam //
analyzed: ātmānam vasyaḥ abhi vātam arcata tat aśvinā su havā yāmani śrutam

original: RV_10,092.14a viśām āsām abhayānām adhikṣitaṃ gīrbhir u svayaśasaṃ gṛṇīmasi /
analyzed: viśām āsām abhayānām adhikṣitam gīrbhiḥ u sva yaśasam gṛṇīmasi

original: RV_10,092.14c gnābhir viśvābhir aditim anarvaṇam aktor yuvānaṃ nṛmaṇā adhā patim //
analyzed: gnābhiḥ viśvābhiḥ aditim anarvaṇam aktoḥ yuvānam nṛmaṇāḥ adhā patim

original: RV_10,092.15a rebhad atra januṣā pūrvo aṅgirā grāvāṇa ūrdhvā abhi cakṣur adhvaram /
analyzed: rebhat atra januṣā pūrvaḥ aṅgirāḥ grāvāṇaḥ ūrdhvāḥ abhi cakṣuḥ adhvaram

original: RV_10,092.15c yebhir vihāyā abhavad vicakṣaṇaḥ pāthaḥ sumekaṃ svadhitir vananvati //
analyzed: yebhiḥ vihāyāḥ abhavat vicakṣaṇaḥ pāthaḥ sumekam svadhitiḥ vananvati

original: RV_10,093.01a mahi dyāvāpṛthivī bhūtam urvī nārī yahvī na rodasī sadaṃ naḥ /
analyzed: mahi dyāvāpṛthivī bhūtam urvī nārī yahvī na rodasī sadam naḥ

original: RV_10,093.01c tebhir naḥ pātaṃ sahyasa ebhir naḥ pātaṃ śūṣaṇi //
analyzed: tebhiḥ naḥ pātam sahyasaḥ ebhiḥ naḥ pātam śūṣaṇi

original: RV_10,093.02a yajñe-yajñe sa martyo devān saparyati /
analyzed: yajñeyajñe sa martyaḥ devān saparyati

original: RV_10,093.02c yaḥ sumnair dīrghaśruttama āvivāsaty enān //
analyzed: yaḥ sumnaiḥ dīrghaśruttamaḥ āvivāsati enān

original: RV_10,093.03a viśveṣām irajyavo devānāṃ vār mahaḥ /
analyzed: viśveṣām irajyavaḥ devānām vār mahaḥ

original: RV_10,093.03c viśve hi viśvamahaso viśve yajñeṣu yajñiyāḥ //
analyzed: viśve hi viśva mahasaḥ viśve yajñeṣu yajñiyāḥ

original: RV_10,093.04a te ghā rājāno amṛtasya mandrā aryamā mitro varuṇaḥ parijmā /
analyzed: te gha rājānaḥ amṛtasya mandrāḥ aryamā mitraḥ varuṇaḥ parijmā

original: RV_10,093.04c kad rudro nṛṇāṃ stuto marutaḥ pūṣaṇo bhagaḥ //
analyzed: kad rudraḥ nṛṇām stutaḥ marutaḥ pūṣaṇaḥ bhagaḥ

original: RV_10,093.05a uta no naktam apāṃ vṛṣaṇvasū sūryāmāsā sadanāya sadhanyā /
analyzed: uta naḥ naktam apām vṛṣaṇvasū sūryāmāsā sadanāya sa dhanyā

original: RV_10,093.05c sacā yat sādy eṣām ahir budhneṣu budhnyaḥ //
analyzed: sacā yat sādi eṣām ahiḥ budhneṣu budhnyaḥ

original: RV_10,093.06a uta no devāv aśvinā śubhas patī dhāmabhir mitrāvaruṇā uruṣyatām /
analyzed: uta naḥ devau aśvinā śubhaḥ patī dhāmabhiḥ mitrāvaruṇau uruṣyatām

original: RV_10,093.06c mahaḥ sa rāya eṣate 'ti dhanveva duritā //
analyzed: mahaḥ sa rāyaḥ eṣate ti dhanva iva duritā

original: RV_10,093.07a uta no rudrā cin mṛḷatām aśvinā viśve devāso rathaspatir bhagaḥ /
analyzed: uta naḥ rudrā cit mṛḍatām aśvinā viśve devāsaḥ rathaspatiḥ bhagaḥ

original: RV_10,093.07c ṛbhur vāja ṛbhukṣaṇaḥ parijmā viśvavedasaḥ //
analyzed: ṛbhuḥ vājaḥ ṛbhukṣaṇaḥ parijmā viśva vedasaḥ

original: RV_10,093.08a ṛbhur ṛbhukṣā ṛbhur vidhato mada ā te harī jūjuvānasya vājinā /
analyzed: ṛbhuḥ ṛbhukṣāḥ ṛbhuḥ vidhataḥ madaḥ ā te harī jūjuvānasya vājinā

original: RV_10,093.08c duṣṭaraṃ yasya sāma cid ṛdhag yajño na mānuṣaḥ //
analyzed: duṣṭaram yasya sāma cit ṛdhak yajñaḥ na mānuṣaḥ

original: RV_10,093.09a kṛdhī no ahrayo deva savitaḥ sa ca stuṣe maghonām /
analyzed: kṛdhī naḥ ahrayaḥ deva savitar sa ca stuṣe maghonām

original: RV_10,093.09c saho na indro vahnibhir ny eṣāṃ carṣaṇīnāṃ cakraṃ raśmiṃ na yoyuve //
analyzed: saha u naḥ indraḥ vahnibhiḥ ni eṣām carṣaṇīnām cakram raśmim na yoyuve

original: RV_10,093.10a aiṣu dyāvāpṛthivī dhātam mahad asme vīreṣu viśvacarṣaṇi śravaḥ /
analyzed: ā eṣu dyāvāpṛthivī dhātam mahat asme vīreṣu viśvacarṣaṇi śravaḥ

original: RV_10,093.10c pṛkṣaṃ vājasya sātaye pṛkṣaṃ rāyota turvaṇe //
analyzed: pṛkṣam vājasya sātaye pṛkṣam rāyā uta turvaṇe

original: RV_10,093.11a etaṃ śaṃsam indrāsmayuṣ ṭvaṃ kūcit santaṃ sahasāvann abhiṣṭaye /
analyzed: etam śaṃsam indra asmayuḥ tvam kūcid santam sahasāvan abhiṣṭaye

original: RV_10,093.11c sadā pāhy abhiṣṭaye medatāṃ vedatā vaso //
analyzed: sadā pāhi abhiṣṭaye medatām vedatā vaso

original: RV_10,093.12a etam me stomaṃ tanā na sūrye dyutadyāmānaṃ vāvṛdhanta nṛṇām /
analyzed: etam me stomam tanā na sūrye dyutat yāmānam vāvṛdhanta nṛṇām

original: RV_10,093.12c saṃvananaṃ nāśvyaṃ taṣṭevānapacyutam //
analyzed: saṃvananam na aśvyam taṣṭā iva an apacyutam

original: RV_10,093.13a vāvarta yeṣāṃ rāyā yuktaiṣāṃ hiraṇyayī /
analyzed: vāvarta yeṣām rāyā yuktā eṣām hiraṇyayī

original: RV_10,093.13c nemadhitā na pauṃsyā vṛtheva viṣṭāntā //
analyzed: nemadhitā na pauṃsyā vṛthā iva viṣṭa antā

original: RV_10,093.14a pra tad duḥśīme pṛthavāne vene pra rāme vocam asure maghavatsu /
analyzed: pra tat duḥśīme pṛthavāne vene pra rāme vocam asure maghavatsu

original: RV_10,093.14c ye yuktvāya pañca śatāsmayu pathā viśrāvy eṣām //
analyzed: ye yuktvāya pañca śatā asmayu pathā viśrāvi eṣām

original: RV_10,093.15a adhīn nv atra saptatiṃ ca sapta ca /
analyzed: adhi id nu atra saptatim ca sapta ca

original: RV_10,093.15b sadyo didiṣṭa tānvaḥ sadyo didiṣṭa pārthyaḥ sadyo didiṣṭa māyavaḥ //
analyzed: sadyas didiṣṭa tānvaḥ sadyas didiṣṭa pārthyaḥ sadyas didiṣṭa māyavaḥ

original: RV_10,094.01a praite vadantu pra vayaṃ vadāma grāvabhyo vācaṃ vadatā vadadbhyaḥ /
analyzed: pra ete vadantu pra vayam vadāma grāvabhyaḥ vācam vadata vadadbhyaḥ

original: RV_10,094.01c yad adrayaḥ parvatāḥ sākam āśavaḥ ślokaṃ ghoṣam bharathendrāya sominaḥ //
analyzed: yat adrayaḥ parvatāḥ sākam āśavaḥ ślokam ghoṣam bharatha indrāya sominaḥ

original: RV_10,094.02a ete vadanti śatavat sahasravad abhi krandanti haritebhir āsabhiḥ /
analyzed: ete vadanti śatavat sahasravat abhi krandanti haritebhiḥ āsabhiḥ

original: RV_10,094.02c viṣṭvī grāvāṇaḥ sukṛtaḥ sukṛtyayā hotuś cit pūrve haviradyam āśata //
analyzed: viṣṭvī grāvāṇaḥ su kṛtaḥ su kṛtyayā hotuḥ cit pūrve haviḥ adyam āśata

original: RV_10,094.03a ete vadanty avidann anā madhu ny ūṅkhayante adhi pakva āmiṣi /
analyzed: ete vadanti avidan anā madhu ni ūṅkhayante adhi pakve āmiṣi

original: RV_10,094.03c vṛkṣasya śākhām aruṇasya bapsatas te sūbharvā vṛṣabhāḥ prem arāviṣuḥ //
analyzed: vṛkṣasya śākhām aruṇasya bapsataḥ te sūbharvāḥ vṛṣabhāḥ pra īm arāviṣuḥ

original: RV_10,094.04a bṛhad vadanti madireṇa mandinendraṃ krośanto 'vidann anā madhu /
analyzed: bṛhat vadanti madireṇa mandinā indram krośantaḥ vidan anā madhu

original: RV_10,094.04c saṃrabhyā dhīrāḥ svasṛbhir anartiṣur āghoṣayantaḥ pṛthivīm upabdibhiḥ //
analyzed: saṃrabhyā dhīrāḥ svasṛbhiḥ anartiṣuḥ āghoṣayantaḥ pṛthivīm upabdibhiḥ

original: RV_10,094.05a suparṇā vācam akratopa dyavy ākhare kṛṣṇā iṣirā anartiṣuḥ /
analyzed: suparṇāḥ vācam akrata upa dyavi ākhare kṛṣṇāḥ iṣirāḥ anartiṣuḥ

original: RV_10,094.05c nyaṅ ni yanty uparasya niṣkṛtam purū reto dadhire sūryaśvitaḥ //
analyzed: nyak ni yanti uparasya niṣkṛtam purū retaḥ dadhire sūryaśvitaḥ

original: RV_10,094.06a ugrā iva pravahantaḥ samāyamuḥ sākaṃ yuktā vṛṣaṇo bibhrato dhuraḥ /
analyzed: ugrāḥ iva pravahantaḥ samāyamuḥ sākam yuktāḥ vṛṣaṇaḥ bibhrataḥ dhuraḥ

original: RV_10,094.06c yac chvasanto jagrasānā arāviṣuḥ śṛṇva eṣām prothatho arvatām iva //
analyzed: yat śvasantaḥ jagrasānāḥ arāviṣuḥ śṛṇve eṣām prothathaḥ arvatām iva

original: RV_10,094.07a daśāvanibhyo daśakakṣyebhyo daśayoktrebhyo daśayojanebhyaḥ /
analyzed: daśa avanibhyaḥ daśa kakṣyebhyaḥ daśa yoktrebhyaḥ daśa yojanebhyaḥ

original: RV_10,094.07c daśābhīśubhyo arcatājarebhyo daśa dhuro daśa yuktā vahadbhyaḥ //
analyzed: daśa abhīśubhyaḥ arcata ajarebhyaḥ daśa dhuraḥ daśa yuktāḥ vahadbhyaḥ

original: RV_10,094.08a te adrayo daśayantrāsa āśavas teṣām ādhānam pary eti haryatam /
analyzed: te adrayaḥ daśa yantrāsaḥ āśavaḥ teṣām ādhānam pari eti haryatam

original: RV_10,094.08c ta ū sutasya somyasyāndhaso 'ṃśoḥ pīyūṣam prathamasya bhejire //
analyzed: te ū sutasya somyasya andhasaḥ oṃśoḥ pīyūṣam prathamasya bhejire

original: RV_10,094.09a te somādo harī indrasya niṃsate 'ṃśuṃ duhanto adhy āsate gavi /
analyzed: te somādaḥ harī indrasya niṃsate ṃśum duhantaḥ adhi āsate gavi

original: RV_10,094.09c tebhir dugdham papivān somyam madhv indro vardhate prathate vṛṣāyate //
analyzed: tebhiḥ dugdham papivān somyam madhu indraḥ vardhate prathate vṛṣāyate

original: RV_10,094.10a vṛṣā vo aṃśur na kilā riṣāthaneḷāvantaḥ sadam it sthanāśitāḥ /
analyzed: vṛṣā vaḥ aṃśuḥ na kilā riṣāthana iḷāvantaḥ sadam id sthana āśitāḥ

original: RV_10,094.10c raivatyeva mahasā cārava sthana yasya grāvāṇo ajuṣadhvam adhvaram //
analyzed: raivatyā iva mahasā cāravaḥ sthana yasya grāvāṇaḥ ajuṣadhvam adhvaram

original: RV_10,094.11a tṛdilā atṛdilāso adrayo 'śramaṇā aśṛthitā amṛtyavaḥ /
analyzed: tṛdilāḥ atṛdilāsaḥ adrayaḥ śramaṇāḥ aśṛthitāḥ amṛtyavaḥ

original: RV_10,094.11c anāturā ajarā sthāmaviṣṇavaḥ supīvaso atṛṣitā atṛṣṇajaḥ //
analyzed: anāturāḥ ajarāḥ stha a maviṣṇavaḥ su pīvasaḥ atṛṣitāḥ atṛṣṇajaḥ

original: RV_10,094.12a dhruvā eva vaḥ pitaro yuge-yuge kṣemakāmāsaḥ sadaso na yuñjate /
analyzed: dhruvāḥ eva vaḥ pitaraḥ yuge yuge kṣema kāmāsaḥ sadasaḥ na yuñjate

original: RV_10,094.12c ajuryāso hariṣāco haridrava ā dyāṃ raveṇa pṛthivīm aśuśravuḥ //
analyzed: ajuryāsaḥ haridravaḥ ā dyām raveṇa pṛthivīm aśuśravuḥ

original: RV_10,094.13a tad id vadanty adrayo vimocane yāmann añjaspā iva ghed upabdibhiḥ /
analyzed: tat id vadanti adrayaḥ vimocane yāman añjaspāḥ iva gha id upabdibhiḥ

original: RV_10,094.13c vapanto bījam iva dhānyākṛtaḥ pṛñcanti somaṃ na minanti bapsataḥ //
analyzed: vapantaḥ bījam iva dhānyākṛtaḥ pṛñcanti somam na minanti bapsataḥ

original: RV_10,094.14a sute adhvare adhi vācam akratā krīḷayo na mātaraṃ tudantaḥ /
analyzed: sute adhvare adhi vācam akratā krīḍayaḥ na mātaram tudantaḥ

original: RV_10,094.14c vi ṣū muñcā suṣuvuṣo manīṣāṃ vi vartantām adrayaś cāyamānāḥ //
analyzed: vi su muñca suṣuvuṣaḥ manīṣām vi vartantām adrayaḥ cāyamānāḥ

original: RV_10,095.01a haye jāye manasā tiṣṭha ghore vacāṃsi miśrā kṛṇavāvahai nu /
analyzed: haye jāye manasā tiṣṭha ghore vacāṃsi miśrā kṛṇavāvahai nu

original: RV_10,095.01c na nau mantrā anuditāsa ete mayas karan paratare canāhan //
analyzed: na nau mantrāḥ anuditāsaḥ ete mayaḥ karan paratare ca na ahan

original: RV_10,095.02a kim etā vācā kṛṇavā tavāham prākramiṣam uṣasām agriyeva /
analyzed: kim etā vācā kṛṇavā tava aham prākramiṣam uṣasām agriyā iva

original: RV_10,095.02c purūravaḥ punar astam parehi durāpanā vāta ivāham asmi //
analyzed: purūravaḥ punar astam parehi durāpanā vātaḥ iva aham asmi

original: RV_10,095.03a iṣur na śriya iṣudher asanā goṣāḥ śatasā na raṃhiḥ /
analyzed: iṣuḥ na śriyaḥ iṣudheḥ asanā goṣāḥ śata sāḥ na raṃhiḥ

original: RV_10,095.03c avīre kratau vi davidyutan norā na māyuṃ citayanta dhunayaḥ //
analyzed: avīre kratau vi davidyutan na urāḥ na māyum citayanta dhunayaḥ

original: RV_10,095.04a sā vasu dadhatī śvaśurāya vaya uṣo yadi vaṣṭy antigṛhāt /
analyzed: sā vasu dadhatī śvaśurāya vayaḥ uṣaḥ yadi vaṣṭi antigṛhāt

original: RV_10,095.04c astaṃ nanakṣe yasmiñ cākan divā naktaṃ śnathitā vaitasena //
analyzed: astam nanakṣe yasmin cākan divā naktam śnathitā vaitasena

original: RV_10,095.05a triḥ sma māhnaḥ śnathayo vaitasenota sma me 'vyatyai pṛṇāsi /
analyzed: tris sma mā ahnaḥ śnathayaḥ vaitasena uta sma me vyatyai pṛṇāsi

original: RV_10,095.05c purūravo 'nu te ketam āyaṃ rājā me vīra tanvas tad āsīḥ //
analyzed: purūravaḥ nu te ketam āyam rājā me vīra tanvaḥ tat āsīḥ

original: RV_10,095.06a yā sujūrṇiḥ śreṇiḥ sumnaāpir hradecakṣur na granthinī caraṇyuḥ /
analyzed: yā sujūrṇiḥ śreṇiḥ sumnaāpiḥ hradecakṣuḥ na granthinī caraṇyuḥ

original: RV_10,095.06c tā añjayo 'ruṇayo na sasruḥ śriye gāvo na dhenavo 'navanta //
analyzed: tāḥ añjayaḥ ruṇayaḥ na sasruḥ śriye gāvaḥ na dhenavaḥ navanta

original: RV_10,095.07a sam asmiñ jāyamāna āsata gnā utem avardhan nadyaḥ svagūrtāḥ /
analyzed: sam asmin jāyamāne āsata gnāḥ uta īm avardhan nadyaḥ sva gūrtāḥ

original: RV_10,095.07c mahe yat tvā purūravo raṇāyāvardhayan dasyuhatyāya devāḥ //
analyzed: mahe yat tvā purūravaḥ raṇāya avardhayan dasyu hatyāya devāḥ

original: RV_10,095.08a sacā yad āsu jahatīṣv atkam amānuṣīṣu mānuṣo niṣeve /
analyzed: sacā yat āsu jahatīṣu atkam amānuṣīṣu mānuṣaḥ niṣeve

original: RV_10,095.08c apa sma mat tarasantī na bhujyus tā atrasan rathaspṛśo nāśvāḥ //
analyzed: apa sma mat tarasantī na bhujyuḥ tāḥ atrasan ratha spṛśaḥ na aśvāḥ

original: RV_10,095.09a yad āsu marto amṛtāsu nispṛk saṃ kṣoṇībhiḥ kratubhir na pṛṅkte /
analyzed: yat āsu martaḥ amṛtāsu nispṛś sam kṣoṇībhiḥ kratubhiḥ na pṛṅkte

original: RV_10,095.09c tā ātayo na tanvaḥ śumbhata svā aśvāso na krīḷayo dandaśānāḥ //
analyzed: tāḥ ātayaḥ na tanvaḥ śumbhata svāḥ aśvāsaḥ na krīḍayaḥ dandaśānāḥ

original: RV_10,095.10a vidyun na yā patantī davidyod bharantī me apyā kāmyāni /
analyzed: vidyut na yā patantī davidyot bharantī me apyā kāmyāni

original: RV_10,095.10c janiṣṭo apo naryaḥ sujātaḥ prorvaśī tirata dīrgham āyuḥ //
analyzed: janiṣṭa u apaḥ naryaḥ su jātaḥ pra urvaśī tirata dīrgham āyuḥ

original: RV_10,095.11a jajñiṣa itthā gopīthyāya hi dadhātha tat purūravo ma ojaḥ /
analyzed: jajñiṣe itthā gopīthyāya hi tat purūravaḥ me ojaḥ

original: RV_10,095.11c aśāsaṃ tvā viduṣī sasminn ahan na ma āśṛṇoḥ kim abhug vadāsi //
analyzed: aśāsam tvā viduṣī ahan na me āśṛṇoḥ kim abhuj vadāsi

original: RV_10,095.12a kadā sūnuḥ pitaraṃ jāta icchāc cakran nāśru vartayad vijānan /
analyzed: kadā sūnuḥ pitaram jātaḥ icchāt na aśru vartayat vijānan

original: RV_10,095.12c ko dampatī samanasā vi yūyod adha yad agniḥ śvaśureṣu dīdayat //
analyzed: kaḥ dampatī samanasā vi adha yat agniḥ śvaśureṣu dīdayat

original: RV_10,095.13a prati bravāṇi vartayate aśru cakran na krandad ādhye śivāyai /
analyzed: prati bravāṇi vartayate aśru na krandat śivāyai

original: RV_10,095.13c pra tat te hinavā yat te asme parehy astaṃ nahi mūra māpaḥ //
analyzed: pra tat te hinavā yat te asme parehi astam nahi mūra mā āpaḥ

original: RV_10,095.14a sudevo adya prapated anāvṛt parāvatam paramāṃ gantavā u /
analyzed: sudevaḥ adya prapatet anāvṛt parāvatam paramām gantavai u

original: RV_10,095.14c adhā śayīta nirṛter upasthe 'dhainaṃ vṛkā rabhasāso adyuḥ //
analyzed: adhā śayīta nirṛteḥ upasthe dhā enam vṛkāḥ rabhasāsaḥ adyuḥ

original: RV_10,095.15a purūravo mā mṛthā mā pra papto mā tvā vṛkāso aśivāsa u kṣan /
analyzed: purūravaḥ mā mṛthāḥ mā pra paptaḥ mā tvā vṛkāsaḥ aśivāsaḥ u kṣan

original: RV_10,095.15c na vai straiṇāni sakhyāni santi sālāvṛkāṇāṃ hṛdayāny etā //
analyzed: na vai straiṇāni sakhyāni santi sālāvṛkāṇām hṛdayāni etā

original: RV_10,095.16a yad virūpācaram martyeṣv avasaṃ rātrīḥ śaradaś catasraḥ /
analyzed: yat virūpā acaram martyeṣu avasam rātrīḥ śaradaḥ catasraḥ

original: RV_10,095.16c ghṛtasya stokaṃ sakṛd ahna āśnāṃ tād evedaṃ tātṛpāṇā carāmi //
analyzed: ghṛtasya stokam sakṛt ahnaḥ āśnām eva idam tātṛpāṇā carāmi

original: RV_10,095.17a antarikṣaprāṃ rajaso vimānīm upa śikṣāmy urvaśīṃ vasiṣṭhaḥ /
analyzed: antarikṣa prām rajasaḥ vimānīm upa śikṣāmi urvaśīm vasiṣṭhaḥ

original: RV_10,095.17c upa tvā rātiḥ sukṛtasya tiṣṭhān ni vartasva hṛdayaṃ tapyate me //
analyzed: upa tvā rātiḥ sukṛtasya tiṣṭhāt ni vartasva hṛdayam tapyate me

original: RV_10,095.18a iti tvā devā ima āhur aiḷa yathem etad bhavasi mṛtyubandhuḥ /
analyzed: iti tvā devāḥ ime āhuḥ aiḷa yathā īm etat bhavasi mṛtyu bandhuḥ

original: RV_10,095.18c prajā te devān haviṣā yajāti svarga u tvam api mādayāse //
analyzed: prajā te devān haviṣā yajāti svarge u tvam api mādayāse

original: RV_10,096.01a pra te mahe vidathe śaṃsiṣaṃ harī pra te vanve vanuṣo haryatam madam /
analyzed: pra te mahe vidathe śaṃsiṣam harī pra te vanve vanuṣaḥ haryatam madam

original: RV_10,096.01c ghṛtaṃ na yo haribhiś cāru secata ā tvā viśantu harivarpasaṃ giraḥ //
analyzed: ghṛtam na yaḥ haribhiḥ cāru secate ā tvā viśantu hari varpasam giraḥ

original: RV_10,096.02a hariṃ hi yonim abhi ye samasvaran hinvanto harī divyaṃ yathā sadaḥ /
analyzed: harim hi yonim abhi ye samasvaran hinvantaḥ harī divyam yathā sadaḥ

original: RV_10,096.02c ā yam pṛṇanti haribhir na dhenava indrāya śūṣaṃ harivantam arcata //
analyzed: ā yam pṛṇanti haribhiḥ na dhenavaḥ indrāya śūṣam harivantam arcata

original: RV_10,096.03a so asya vajro harito ya āyaso harir nikāmo harir ā gabhastyoḥ /
analyzed: saḥ asya vajraḥ haritaḥ yaḥ āyasaḥ hariḥ nikāmaḥ hariḥ ā gabhastyoḥ

original: RV_10,096.03c dyumnī suśipro harimanyusāyaka indre ni rūpā haritā mimikṣire //
analyzed: dyumnī su śipraḥ harimanyusāyakaḥ indre ni rūpā haritā mimikṣire

original: RV_10,096.04a divi na ketur adhi dhāyi haryato vivyacad vajro harito na raṃhyā /
analyzed: divi na ketuḥ adhi dhāyi haryataḥ vivyacat vajraḥ haritaḥ na raṃhyā

original: RV_10,096.04c tudad ahiṃ hariśipro ya āyasaḥ sahasraśokā abhavad dharimbharaḥ //
analyzed: tudat ahim hari śipraḥ yaḥ āyasaḥ sahasraśokāḥ abhavat harimbharaḥ

original: RV_10,096.05a tvaṃ-tvam aharyathā upastutaḥ pūrvebhir indra harikeśa yajvabhiḥ /
analyzed: tvam tvam aharyathāḥ upastutaḥ pūrvebhiḥ indra hari keśa yajvabhiḥ

original: RV_10,096.05c tvaṃ haryasi tava viśvam ukthyam asāmi rādho harijāta haryatam //
analyzed: tvam haryasi tava viśvam ukthyam asāmi rādhaḥ hari jāta haryatam

original: RV_10,096.06a tā vajriṇam mandinaṃ stomyam mada indraṃ rathe vahato haryatā harī /
analyzed: tā vajriṇam mandinam stomyam made indram rathe vahataḥ haryatā harī

original: RV_10,096.06c purūṇy asmai savanāni haryata indrāya somā harayo dadhanvire //
analyzed: purūṇi asmai savanāni haryate indrāya somāḥ harayaḥ dadhanvire

original: RV_10,096.07a araṃ kāmāya harayo dadhanvire sthirāya hinvan harayo harī turā /
analyzed: aram kāmāya harayaḥ dadhanvire sthirāya hinvan harayaḥ harī turā

original: RV_10,096.07c arvadbhir yo haribhir joṣam īyate so asya kāmaṃ harivantam ānaśe //
analyzed: arvadbhiḥ yaḥ haribhiḥ joṣam īyate saḥ asya kāmam harivantam ānaśe

original: RV_10,096.08a hariśmaśārur harikeśa āyasas turaspeye yo haripā avardhata /
analyzed: hari śmaśāruḥ hari keśaḥ āyasaḥ turaspeye yaḥ hari pāḥ avardhata

original: RV_10,096.08c arvadbhir yo haribhir vājinīvasur ati viśvā duritā pāriṣad dharī //
analyzed: arvadbhiḥ yaḥ haribhiḥ vājinīvasuḥ ati viśvā duritā pāriṣat harī

original: RV_10,096.09a sruveva yasya hariṇī vipetatuḥ śipre vājāya hariṇī davidhvataḥ /
analyzed: sruvā iva yasya hariṇī vipetatuḥ śipre vājāya hariṇī davidhvataḥ

original: RV_10,096.09c pra yat kṛte camase marmṛjad dharī pītvā madasya haryatasyāndhasaḥ //
analyzed: pra yat kṛte camase marmṛjat harī pītvā madasya haryatasya andhasaḥ

original: RV_10,096.10a uta sma sadma haryatasya pastyor atyo na vājaṃ harivāṃ acikradat /
analyzed: uta sma sadma haryatasya pastyoḥ atyaḥ na vājam harivān acikradat

original: RV_10,096.10c mahī cid dhi dhiṣaṇāharyad ojasā bṛhad vayo dadhiṣe haryataś cid ā //
analyzed: mahī cit hi dhiṣaṇā a haryat ojasā bṛhat vayaḥ dadhiṣe haryataḥ cit ā

original: RV_10,096.11a ā rodasī haryamāṇo mahitvā navyaṃ-navyaṃ haryasi manma nu priyam /
analyzed: ā rodasī haryamāṇaḥ mahitvā navyam navyam haryasi manma nu priyam

original: RV_10,096.11c pra pastyam asura haryataṃ gor āviṣ kṛdhi haraye sūryāya //
analyzed: pra pastyam asura haryatam goḥ āvis kṛdhi haraye sūryāya

original: RV_10,096.12a ā tvā haryantam prayujo janānāṃ rathe vahantu hariśipram indra /
analyzed: ā tvā haryantam prayujaḥ janānām rathe vahantu hari śipram indra

original: RV_10,096.12c pibā yathā pratibhṛtasya madhvo haryan yajñaṃ sadhamāde daśoṇim //
analyzed: pibāḥ yathā pratibhṛtasya madhvaḥ haryan yajñam sadhamāde daśa ūṇim

original: RV_10,096.13a apāḥ pūrveṣāṃ harivaḥ sutānām atho idaṃ savanaṃ kevalaṃ te /
analyzed: apāḥ pūrveṣām harivas sutānām atha u idam savanam kevalam te

original: RV_10,096.13c mamaddhi somam madhumantam indra satrā vṛṣañ jaṭhara ā vṛṣasva //
analyzed: mamaddhi somam madhumantam indra satrā vṛṣam jaṭhare ā vṛṣasva

original: RV_10,097.01a yā oṣadhīḥ pūrvā jātā devebhyas triyugam purā /
analyzed: yāḥ oṣadhīḥ pūrvāḥ jātāḥ devebhyaḥ tri yugam purā

original: RV_10,097.01c manai nu babhrūṇām ahaṃ śataṃ dhāmāni sapta ca //
analyzed: nu babhrūṇām aham śatam dhāmāni sapta ca

original: RV_10,097.02a śataṃ vo amba dhāmāni sahasram uta vo ruhaḥ /
analyzed: śatam vaḥ amba dhāmāni sahasram uta vaḥ ruhaḥ

original: RV_10,097.02c adhā śatakratvo yūyam imam me agadaṃ kṛta //
analyzed: adha śata kratvaḥ yūyam imam me agadam kṛta

original: RV_10,097.03a oṣadhīḥ prati modadhvam puṣpavatīḥ prasūvarīḥ /
analyzed: oṣadhīḥ prati modadhvam puṣpavatīḥ prasūvarīḥ

original: RV_10,097.03c aśvā iva sajitvarīr vīrudhaḥ pārayiṣṇvaḥ //
analyzed: aśvāḥ iva sa jitvarīḥ vīrudhaḥ pārayiṣṇvaḥ

original: RV_10,097.04a oṣadhīr iti mātaras tad vo devīr upa bruve /
analyzed: oṣadhīḥ iti mātaraḥ tat vaḥ devīḥ upa bruve

original: RV_10,097.04c saneyam aśvaṃ gāṃ vāsa ātmānaṃ tava pūruṣa //
analyzed: saneyam aśvam gām vāsaḥ ātmānam tava pūruṣa

original: RV_10,097.05a aśvatthe vo niṣadanam parṇe vo vasatiṣ kṛtā /
analyzed: aśvatthe vaḥ niṣadanam parṇe vaḥ vasatiḥ kṛtā

original: RV_10,097.05c gobhāja it kilāsatha yat sanavatha pūruṣam //
analyzed: go bhājaḥ id kila asatha yat sanavatha pūruṣam

original: RV_10,097.06a yatrauṣadhīḥ samagmata rājānaḥ samitāv iva /
analyzed: yatra oṣadhīḥ samagmata rājānaḥ samitau iva

original: RV_10,097.06c vipraḥ sa ucyate bhiṣag rakṣohāmīvacātanaḥ //
analyzed: vipraḥ saḥ ucyate bhiṣaj rakṣaḥ hā amīva cātanaḥ

original: RV_10,097.07a aśvāvatīṃ somāvatīm ūrjayantīm udojasam /
analyzed: aśvāvatīm somāvatīm ūrjayantīm udojasam

original: RV_10,097.07c āvitsi sarvā oṣadhīr asmā ariṣṭatātaye //
analyzed: āvitsi sarvāḥ oṣadhīḥ asmai ariṣṭatātaye

original: RV_10,097.08a uc chuṣmā oṣadhīnāṃ gāvo goṣṭhād iverate /
analyzed: ud śuṣmāḥ oṣadhīnām gāvaḥ goṣṭhāt iva īrate

original: RV_10,097.08c dhanaṃ saniṣyantīnām ātmānaṃ tava pūruṣa //
analyzed: dhanam saniṣyantīnām ātmānam tava pūruṣa

original: RV_10,097.09a iṣkṛtir nāma vo mātātho yūyaṃ stha niṣkṛtīḥ /
analyzed: iṣkṛtiḥ nāma vaḥ mātā atha u yūyam stha niṣkṛtīḥ

original: RV_10,097.09c sīrāḥ patatriṇī sthana yad āmayati niṣ kṛtha //
analyzed: sīrāḥ patatriṇīḥ sthana yat āmayati niḥ kṛtha

original: RV_10,097.10a ati viśvāḥ pariṣṭhā stena iva vrajam akramuḥ /
analyzed: ati viśvāḥ pariṣṭhāḥ stenaḥ iva vrajam akramuḥ

original: RV_10,097.10c oṣadhīḥ prācucyavur yat kiṃ ca tanvo rapaḥ //
analyzed: oṣadhīḥ prācucyavuḥ yat kim ca tanvaḥ rapaḥ

original: RV_10,097.11a yad imā vājayann aham oṣadhīr hasta ādadhe /
analyzed: yat imāḥ vājayan aham oṣadhīḥ haste ādadhe

original: RV_10,097.11c ātmā yakṣmasya naśyati purā jīvagṛbho yathā //
analyzed: ātmā yakṣmasya naśyati purā jīva gṛbhaḥ yathā

original: RV_10,097.12a yasyauṣadhīḥ prasarpathāṅgam-aṅgam paruṣ-paruḥ /
analyzed: yasya oṣadhīḥ prasarpatha aṅgam aṅgam paruḥ paruḥ

original: RV_10,097.12c tato yakṣmaṃ vi bādhadhva ugro madhyamaśīr iva //
analyzed: tatas yakṣmam vi bādhadhve ugraḥ madhyamaśīḥ iva

original: RV_10,097.13a sākaṃ yakṣma pra pata cāṣeṇa kikidīvinā /
analyzed: sākam yakṣma pra pata cāṣeṇa kikidīvinā

original: RV_10,097.13c sākaṃ vātasya dhrājyā sākaṃ naśya nihākayā //
analyzed: sākam vātasya dhrājyā sākam naśya nihākayā

original: RV_10,097.14a anyā vo anyām avatv anyānyasyā upāvata /
analyzed: anyā vaḥ anyām avatu anyā anyasyai upāvata

original: RV_10,097.14c tāḥ sarvāḥ saṃvidānā idam me prāvatā vacaḥ //
analyzed: tāḥ sarvāḥ saṃvidānāḥ idam me prāvata vacaḥ

original: RV_10,097.15a yāḥ phalinīr yā aphalā apuṣpā yāś ca puṣpiṇīḥ /
analyzed: yāḥ phalinīḥ yāḥ aphalāḥ apuṣpāḥ yāḥ ca puṣpiṇīḥ

original: RV_10,097.15c bṛhaspatiprasūtās tā no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ //
analyzed: bṛhaspati prasūtāḥ tāḥ naḥ muñcantu aṃhasaḥ

original: RV_10,097.16a muñcantu mā śapathyād atho varuṇyād uta /
analyzed: muñcantu mā śapathyāt atha u varuṇyāt uta

original: RV_10,097.16c atho yamasya paḍbīśāt sarvasmād devakilbiṣāt //
analyzed: atha u yamasya paḍbīśāt sarvasmāt deva kilbiṣāt

original: RV_10,097.17a avapatantīr avadan diva oṣadhayas pari /
analyzed: avapatantīḥ avadan divaḥ oṣadhayaḥ pari

original: RV_10,097.17c yaṃ jīvam aśnavāmahai na sa riṣyāti pūruṣaḥ //
analyzed: yam jīvam aśnavāmahai na sa riṣyāti pūruṣaḥ

original: RV_10,097.18a yā oṣadhīḥ somarājñīr bahvīḥ śatavicakṣaṇāḥ /
analyzed: yāḥ oṣadhīḥ soma rājñīḥ bahvīḥ śata vicakṣaṇāḥ

original: RV_10,097.18c tāsāṃ tvam asy uttamāraṃ kāmāya śaṃ hṛde //
analyzed: tāsām tvam asi uttamā aram kāmāya śam hṛde

original: RV_10,097.19a yā oṣadhīḥ somarājñīr viṣṭhitāḥ pṛthivīm anu /
analyzed: yāḥ oṣadhīḥ soma rājñīḥ viṣṭhitāḥ pṛthivīm anu

original: RV_10,097.19c bṛhaspatiprasūtā asyai saṃ datta vīryam //
analyzed: bṛhaspati prasūtāḥ asyai sam datta vīryam

original: RV_10,097.20a mā vo riṣat khanitā yasmai cāhaṃ khanāmi vaḥ /
analyzed: mā vaḥ riṣat khanitā yasmai ca aham khanāmi vaḥ

original: RV_10,097.20c dvipac catuṣpad asmākaṃ sarvam astv anāturam //
analyzed: dvipad catuṣpad asmākam sarvam astu anāturam

original: RV_10,097.21a yāś cedam upaśṛṇvanti yāś ca dūram parāgatāḥ /
analyzed: yāḥ ca idam upaśṛṇvanti yāḥ ca dūram parāgatāḥ

original: RV_10,097.21c sarvāḥ saṃgatya vīrudho 'syai saṃ datta vīryam //
analyzed: sarvāḥ saṃgatya vīrudhaḥ syai sam datta vīryam

original: RV_10,097.22a oṣadhayaḥ saṃ vadante somena saha rājñā /
analyzed: oṣadhayaḥ sam vadante somena saha rājñā

original: RV_10,097.22c yasmai kṛṇoti brāhmaṇas taṃ rājan pārayāmasi //
analyzed: yasmai kṛṇoti brāhmaṇaḥ tam rājan pārayāmasi

original: RV_10,097.23a tvam uttamāsy oṣadhe tava vṛkṣā upastayaḥ /
analyzed: tvam uttamā asi oṣadhe tava vṛkṣāḥ upastayaḥ

original: RV_10,097.23c upastir astu so 'smākaṃ yo asmāṃ abhidāsati //
analyzed: upastiḥ astu saḥ smākam yaḥ asmām abhidāsati

original: RV_10,098.01a bṛhaspate prati me devatām ihi mitro vā yad varuṇo vāsi pūṣā /
analyzed: bṛhaspate prati me devatām ihi mitraḥ vā yat varuṇaḥ vā asi pūṣā

original: RV_10,098.01c ādityair vā yad vasubhir marutvān sa parjanyaṃ śantanave vṛṣāya //
analyzed: ādityaiḥ vā yat vasubhiḥ marutvān sa parjanyam śantanave vṛṣāya

original: RV_10,098.02a ā devo dūto ajiraś cikitvān tvad devāpe abhi mām agacchat /
analyzed: ā devaḥ dūtaḥ ajiraḥ cikitvān tvat devāpe abhi mām agacchat

original: RV_10,098.02c pratīcīnaḥ prati mām ā vavṛtsva dadhāmi te dyumatīṃ vācam āsan //
analyzed: pratīcīnaḥ prati mām ā vavṛtsva dadhāmi te dyumatīm vācam āsan

original: RV_10,098.03a asme dhehi dyumatīṃ vācam āsan bṛhaspate anamīvām iṣirām /
analyzed: asme dhehi dyumatīm vācam āsan bṛhaspate anamīvām iṣirām

original: RV_10,098.03c yayā vṛṣṭiṃ śantanave vanāva divo drapso madhumāṃ ā viveśa //
analyzed: yayā vṛṣṭim śantanave vanāva divaḥ drapsaḥ madhumān ā viveśa

original: RV_10,098.04a ā no drapsā madhumanto viśantv indra dehy adhirathaṃ sahasram /
analyzed: ā naḥ drapsāḥ madhumantaḥ viśantu indra dehi adhiratham sahasram

original: RV_10,098.04c ni ṣīda hotram ṛtuthā yajasva devān devāpe haviṣā saparya //
analyzed: ni sīda hotram ṛtuthā yajasva devān devāpe haviṣā saparya

original: RV_10,098.05a ārṣṭiṣeṇo hotram ṛṣir niṣīdan devāpir devasumatiṃ cikitvān /
analyzed: ārṣṭiṣeṇaḥ hotram ṛṣiḥ niṣīdan devāpiḥ deva sumatim cikitvān

original: RV_10,098.05c sa uttarasmād adharaṃ samudram apo divyā asṛjad varṣyā abhi //
analyzed: saḥ uttarasmāt adharam samudram apaḥ divyāḥ asṛjat varṣyāḥ abhi

original: RV_10,098.06a asmin samudre adhy uttarasminn āpo devebhir nivṛtā atiṣṭhan /
analyzed: asmin samudre adhi uttarasmin āpaḥ devebhiḥ nivṛtāḥ atiṣṭhan

original: RV_10,098.06c tā adravann ārṣṭiṣeṇena sṛṣṭā devāpinā preṣitā mṛkṣiṇīṣu //
analyzed: tāḥ adravan ārṣṭiṣeṇena sṛṣṭāḥ devāpinā preṣitāḥ mṛkṣiṇīṣu

original: RV_10,098.07a yad devāpiḥ śantanave purohito hotrāya vṛtaḥ kṛpayann adīdhet /
analyzed: yat devāpiḥ śantanave purohitaḥ hotrāya vṛtaḥ kṛpayan adīdhet

original: RV_10,098.07c devaśrutaṃ vṛṣṭivaniṃ rarāṇo bṛhaspatir vācam asmā ayacchat //
analyzed: deva śrutam vṛṣṭi vanim rarāṇaḥ bṛhaspatiḥ vācam asmai ayacchat

original: RV_10,098.08a yaṃ tvā devāpiḥ śuśucāno agna ārṣṭiṣeṇo manuṣyaḥ samīdhe /
analyzed: yam tvā devāpiḥ śuśucānaḥ agne ārṣṭiṣeṇaḥ manuṣyaḥ samīdhe

original: RV_10,098.08c viśvebhir devair anumadyamānaḥ pra parjanyam īrayā vṛṣṭimantam //
analyzed: viśvebhiḥ devaiḥ anumadyamānaḥ pra parjanyam īraya vṛṣṭimantam

original: RV_10,098.09a tvām pūrva ṛṣayo gīrbhir āyan tvām adhvareṣu puruhūta viśve /
analyzed: tvām pūrve ṛṣayaḥ gīrbhiḥ āyan tvām adhvareṣu puruhūta viśve

original: RV_10,098.09c sahasrāṇy adhirathāny asme ā no yajñaṃ rohidaśvopa yāhi //
analyzed: sahasrāṇi adhirathāni asme ā naḥ yajñam rohit aśva upa yāhi

original: RV_10,098.10a etāny agne navatir nava tve āhutāny adhirathā sahasrā /
analyzed: etāni agne navatiḥ nava tve āhutāni adhirathā sahasrā

original: RV_10,098.10c tebhir vardhasva tanvaḥ śūra pūrvīr divo no vṛṣṭim iṣito rirīhi //
analyzed: tebhiḥ vardhasva tanvaḥ śūra pūrvīḥ divaḥ naḥ vṛṣṭim iṣitaḥ rirīhi

original: RV_10,098.11a etāny agne navatiṃ sahasrā sam pra yaccha vṛṣṇa indrāya bhāgam /
analyzed: etāni agne navatim sahasrā sam pra yaccha vṛṣṇe indrāya bhāgam

original: RV_10,098.11c vidvān patha ṛtuśo devayānān apy aulānaṃ divi deveṣu dhehi //
analyzed: vidvān pathaḥ ṛtuśas deva yānān api aulānam divi deveṣu dhehi

original: RV_10,098.12a agne bādhasva vi mṛdho vi durgahāpāmīvām apa rakṣāṃsi sedha /
analyzed: agne bādhasva vi mṛdhaḥ vi durgahā apa amīvām apa rakṣāṃsi sedha

original: RV_10,098.12c asmāt samudrād bṛhato divo no 'pām bhūmānam upa naḥ sṛjeha //
analyzed: asmāt samudrāt bṛhataḥ divaḥ naḥ pām bhūmānam upa naḥ sṛja iha

original: RV_10,099.01a kaṃ naś citram iṣaṇyasi cikitvān pṛthugmānaṃ vāśraṃ vāvṛdhadhyai /
analyzed: kam naḥ citram iṣaṇyasi cikitvān pṛthugmānam vāśram vāvṛdhadhyai

original: RV_10,099.01c kat tasya dātu śavaso vyuṣṭau takṣad vajraṃ vṛtraturam apinvat //
analyzed: kad tasya dātu śavasaḥ vyuṣṭau takṣat vajram vṛtra turam apinvat

original: RV_10,099.02a sa hi dyutā vidyutā veti sāma pṛthuṃ yonim asuratvā sasāda /
analyzed: sa hi dyutā vidyutā veti sāma pṛthum yonim asura tvā sasāda

original: RV_10,099.02c sa sanīḷebhiḥ prasahāno asya bhrātur na ṛte saptathasya māyāḥ //
analyzed: sa sanīḍebhiḥ prasahānaḥ asya bhrātuḥ na ṛte saptathasya māyāḥ

original: RV_10,099.03a sa vājaṃ yātāpaduṣpadā yan svarṣātā pari ṣadat saniṣyan /
analyzed: sa vājam yātā apaduṣpadā yan svarṣātā pari sadat saniṣyan

original: RV_10,099.03c anarvā yac chatadurasya vedo ghnañ chiśnadevāṃ abhi varpasā bhūt //
analyzed: anarvā yat śatadurasya vedaḥ ghnam śiśna devān abhi varpasā bhūt

original: RV_10,099.04a sa yahvyo 'vanīr goṣv arvā juhoti pradhanyāsu sasriḥ /
analyzed: sa yahvyaḥ vanīḥ goṣu arvā juhoti pradhanyāsu sasriḥ

original: RV_10,099.04c apādo yatra yujyāso 'rathā droṇyaśvāsa īrate ghṛtaṃ vāḥ //
analyzed: a pādaḥ yatra yujyāsaḥ rathāḥ droṇī aśvāsaḥ īrate ghṛtam vār

original: RV_10,099.05a sa rudrebhir aśastavāra ṛbhvā hitvī gayam āreavadya āgāt /
analyzed: sa rudrebhiḥ a śasta vāraḥ ṛbhvā hitvī gayam āreavadyaḥ āgāt

original: RV_10,099.05c vamrasya manye mithunā vivavrī annam abhītyārodayan muṣāyan //
analyzed: vamrasya manye mithunā vivavrī annam abhītya arodayat muṣāyan

original: RV_10,099.06a sa id dāsaṃ tuvīravam patir dan ṣaḷakṣaṃ triśīrṣāṇaṃ damanyat /
analyzed: saḥ id dāsam tuvīravam patiḥ dan ṣaṣ akṣam tri śīrṣāṇam damanyat

original: RV_10,099.06c asya trito nv ojasā vṛdhāno vipā varāham ayoagrayā han //
analyzed: asya tritaḥ nu ojasā vṛdhānaḥ vipā varāham ayoagrayā han

original: RV_10,099.07a sa druhvaṇe manuṣa ūrdhvasāna ā sāviṣad arśasānāya śarum /
analyzed: sa druhvaṇe manuṣe ūrdhvasānaḥ ā sāviṣat arśasānāya śarum

original: RV_10,099.07c sa nṛtamo nahuṣo 'smat sujātaḥ puro 'bhinad arhan dasyuhatye //
analyzed: sa nṛtamaḥ nahuṣaḥ smat su jātaḥ puraḥ bhinat arhan dasyu hatye

original: RV_10,099.08a so abhriyo na yavasa udanyan kṣayāya gātuṃ vidan no asme /
analyzed: saḥ abhriyaḥ na yavasaḥ udanyan kṣayāya gātum vidat naḥ asme

original: RV_10,099.08c upa yat sīdad induṃ śarīraiḥ śyeno 'yopāṣṭir hanti dasyūn //
analyzed: upa yat sīdat indum śarīraiḥ śyenaḥ yopāṣṭiḥ hanti dasyūn

original: RV_10,099.09a sa vrādhataḥ śavasānebhir asya kutsāya śuṣṇaṃ kṛpaṇe parādāt /
analyzed: sa vrādhataḥ śavasānebhiḥ asya kutsāya śuṣṇam kṛpaṇe parādāt

original: RV_10,099.09c ayaṃ kavim anayac chasyamānam atkaṃ yo asya sanitota nṛṇām //
analyzed: ayam kavim anayat śasyamānam atkam yaḥ asya sanitā uta nṛṇām

original: RV_10,099.10a ayaṃ daśasyan naryebhir asya dasmo devebhir varuṇo na māyī /
analyzed: ayam daśasyan naryebhiḥ asya dasmaḥ devebhiḥ varuṇaḥ na māyī

original: RV_10,099.10c ayaṃ kanīna ṛtupā avedy amimītāraruṃ yaś catuṣpāt //
analyzed: ayam kanīnaḥ ṛtu pāḥ avedi amimīta ararum yaḥ catuṣpād

original: RV_10,099.11a asya stomebhir auśija ṛjiśvā vrajaṃ darayad vṛṣabheṇa piproḥ /
analyzed: asya stomebhiḥ auśijaḥ ṛjiśvā vrajam darayat vṛṣabheṇa piproḥ

original: RV_10,099.11c sutvā yad yajato dīdayad gīḥ pura iyāno abhi varpasā bhūt //
analyzed: sutvā yat yajataḥ dīdayat gīḥ puraḥ iyānaḥ abhi varpasā bhūt

original: RV_10,099.12a evā maho asura vakṣathāya vamrakaḥ paḍbhir upa sarpad indram /
analyzed: eva mahaḥ asura vakṣathāya vamrakaḥ paḍbhiḥ upa sarpat indram

original: RV_10,099.12c sa iyānaḥ karati svastim asmā iṣam ūrjaṃ sukṣitiṃ viśvam ābhāḥ //
analyzed: saḥ iyānaḥ karati svastim asmai iṣam ūrjam su kṣitim viśvam ābhāḥ

original: RV_10,100.01a indra dṛhya maghavan tvāvad id bhuja iha stutaḥ sutapā bodhi no vṛdhe /
analyzed: indra dṛhya maghavan tvāvat id bhuja iha stutaḥ suta pāḥ bodhi naḥ vṛdhe

original: RV_10,100.01c devebhir naḥ savitā prāvatu śrutam ā sarvatātim aditiṃ vṛṇīmahe //
analyzed: devebhiḥ naḥ savitā prāvatu śrutam ā sarvatātim aditim vṛṇīmahe

original: RV_10,100.02a bharāya su bharata bhāgam ṛtviyam pra vāyave śucipe krandadiṣṭaye /
analyzed: bharāya su bharata bhāgam ṛtviyam pra vāyave śuci pe krandat iṣṭaye

original: RV_10,100.02c gaurasya yaḥ payasaḥ pītim ānaśa ā sarvatātim aditiṃ vṛṇīmahe //
analyzed: gaurasya yaḥ payasaḥ pītim ānaśe ā sarvatātim aditim vṛṇīmahe

original: RV_10,100.03a ā no devaḥ savitā sāviṣad vaya ṛjūyate yajamānāya sunvate /
analyzed: ā naḥ devaḥ savitā sāviṣat vayaḥ ṛjūyate yajamānāya sunvate

original: RV_10,100.03c yathā devān pratibhūṣema pākavad ā sarvatātim aditiṃ vṛṇīmahe //
analyzed: yathā devān pratibhūṣema pākavat ā sarvatātim aditim vṛṇīmahe

original: RV_10,100.04a indro asme sumanā astu viśvahā rājā somaḥ suvitasyādhy etu naḥ /
analyzed: indraḥ asme sumanāḥ astu viśvahā rājā somaḥ suvitasya adhi etu naḥ

original: RV_10,100.04c yathā-yathā mitradhitāni saṃdadhur ā sarvatātim aditiṃ vṛṇīmahe //
analyzed: yathā yathā mitradhitāni saṃdadhuḥ ā sarvatātim aditim vṛṇīmahe

original: RV_10,100.05a indra ukthena śavasā parur dadhe bṛhaspate pratarītāsy āyuṣaḥ /
analyzed: indraḥ ukthena śavasā paruḥ dadhe bṛhaspate pratarītā asi āyuṣaḥ

original: RV_10,100.05c yajño manuḥ pramatir naḥ pitā hi kam ā sarvatātim aditiṃ vṛṇīmahe //
analyzed: yajñaḥ manuḥ pramatiḥ naḥ pitā hi kam ā sarvatātim aditim vṛṇīmahe

original: RV_10,100.06a indrasya nu sukṛtaṃ daivyaṃ saho 'gnir gṛhe jaritā medhiraḥ kaviḥ /
analyzed: indrasya nu su kṛtam daivyam sahaḥ gniḥ gṛhe jaritā medhiraḥ kaviḥ

original: RV_10,100.06c yajñaś ca bhūd vidathe cārur antama ā sarvatātim aditiṃ vṛṇīmahe //
analyzed: yajñaḥ ca bhūt vidathe cāruḥ antamaḥ ā sarvatātim aditim vṛṇīmahe

original: RV_10,100.07a na vo guhā cakṛma bhūri duṣkṛtaṃ nāviṣṭyaṃ vasavo devaheḷanam /
analyzed: na vaḥ guhā cakṛma bhūri duṣkṛtam na āviṣṭyam vasavaḥ deva heḷanam

original: RV_10,100.07c mākir no devā anṛtasya varpasa ā sarvatātim aditiṃ vṛṇīmahe //
analyzed: mākir naḥ devāḥ anṛtasya varpasaḥ ā sarvatātim aditim vṛṇīmahe

original: RV_10,100.08a apāmīvāṃ savitā sāviṣan nyag varīya id apa sedhantv adrayaḥ /
analyzed: apa amīvām savitā sāviṣat varīyaḥ id apa sedhantu adrayaḥ

original: RV_10,100.08c grāvā yatra madhuṣud ucyate bṛhad ā sarvatātim aditiṃ vṛṇīmahe //
analyzed: grāvā yatra madhuṣut ucyate bṛhat ā sarvatātim aditim vṛṇīmahe

original: RV_10,100.09a ūrdhvo grāvā vasavo 'stu sotari viśvā dveṣāṃsi sanutar yuyota /
analyzed: ūrdhvaḥ grāvā vasavaḥ stu sotari viśvā dveṣāṃsi sanutar yuyota

original: RV_10,100.09c sa no devaḥ savitā pāyur īḍya ā sarvatātim aditiṃ vṛṇīmahe //
analyzed: sa naḥ devaḥ savitā pāyuḥ īḍyaḥ ā sarvatātim aditim vṛṇīmahe

original: RV_10,100.10a ūrjaṃ gāvo yavase pīvo attana ṛtasya yāḥ sadane kośe aṅgdhve /
analyzed: ūrjam gāvaḥ yavase pīvaḥ attana ṛtasya yāḥ sadane kośe aṅgdhve

original: RV_10,100.10c tanūr eva tanvo astu bheṣajam ā sarvatātim aditiṃ vṛṇīmahe //
analyzed: tanūḥ eva tanvaḥ astu bheṣajam ā sarvatātim aditim vṛṇīmahe

original: RV_10,100.11a kratuprāvā jaritā śaśvatām ava indra id bhadrā pramatiḥ sutāvatām /
analyzed: kratuprāvā jaritā śaśvatām avaḥ indraḥ id bhadrā pramatiḥ sutāvatām

original: RV_10,100.11c pūrṇam ūdhar divyaṃ yasya siktaya ā sarvatātim aditiṃ vṛṇīmahe //
analyzed: pūrṇam ūdhar divyam yasya siktaye ā sarvatātim aditim vṛṇīmahe

original: RV_10,100.12a citras te bhānuḥ kratuprā abhiṣṭiḥ santi spṛdho jaraṇiprā adhṛṣṭāḥ /
analyzed: citraḥ te bhānuḥ kratu prāḥ abhiṣṭiḥ santi spṛdhaḥ jaraṇi prāḥ adhṛṣṭāḥ

original: RV_10,100.12c rajiṣṭhayā rajyā paśva ā gos tūtūrṣati pary agraṃ duvasyuḥ //
analyzed: rajiṣṭhayā rajyā paśvaḥ ā goḥ tūtūrṣati pari agram duvasyuḥ

original: RV_10,101.01a ud budhyadhvaṃ samanasaḥ sakhāyaḥ sam agnim indhvam bahavaḥ sanīḷāḥ /
analyzed: ud budhyadhvam samanasaḥ sakhāyaḥ sam agnim indhvam bahavaḥ sanīḍāḥ

original: RV_10,101.01c dadhikrām agnim uṣasaṃ ca devīm indrāvato 'vase ni hvaye vaḥ //
analyzed: dadhikrām agnim uṣasam ca devīm indrāvataḥ vase ni hvaye vaḥ

original: RV_10,101.02a mandrā kṛṇudhvaṃ dhiya ā tanudhvaṃ nāvam aritraparaṇīṃ kṛṇudhvam /
analyzed: mandrā kṛṇudhvam dhiyaḥ ā tanudhvam nāvam aritra paraṇīm kṛṇudhvam

original: RV_10,101.02c iṣkṛṇudhvam āyudhāraṃ kṛṇudhvam prāñcaṃ yajñam pra ṇayatā sakhāyaḥ //
analyzed: iṣkṛṇudhvam āyudhā aram kṛṇudhvam prāñcam yajñam pra nayata sakhāyaḥ

original: RV_10,101.03a yunakta sīrā vi yugā tanudhvaṃ kṛte yonau vapateha bījam /
analyzed: yunakta sīrā vi yugā tanudhvam kṛte yonau vapata iha bījam

original: RV_10,101.03c girā ca śruṣṭiḥ sabharā asan no nedīya it sṛṇyaḥ pakvam eyāt //
analyzed: girā ca śruṣṭiḥ sabharāḥ asat naḥ nedīyaḥ id sṛṇyaḥ pakvam eyāt

original: RV_10,101.04a sīrā yuñjanti kavayo yugā vi tanvate pṛthak /
analyzed: sīrā yuñjanti kavayaḥ yugā vi tanvate pṛthak

original: RV_10,101.04c dhīrā deveṣu sumnayā //
analyzed: dhīrāḥ deveṣu sumnayā

original: RV_10,101.05a nir āhāvān kṛṇotana saṃ varatrā dadhātana /
analyzed: niḥ āhāvān kṛṇotana sam varatrāḥ dadhātana

original: RV_10,101.05c siñcāmahā avatam udriṇaṃ vayaṃ suṣekam anupakṣitam //
analyzed: siñcāmahai avatam udriṇam vayam suṣekam an upakṣitam

original: RV_10,101.06a iṣkṛtāhāvam avataṃ suvaratraṃ suṣecanam /
analyzed: iṣkṛta āhāvam avatam su varatram suṣecanam

original: RV_10,101.06c udriṇaṃ siñce akṣitam //
analyzed: udriṇam siñce akṣitam

original: RV_10,101.07a prīṇītāśvān hitaṃ jayātha svastivāhaṃ ratham it kṛṇudhvam /
analyzed: prīṇīta aśvān hitam jayātha svasti vāham ratham id kṛṇudhvam

original: RV_10,101.07c droṇāhāvam avatam aśmacakram aṃsatrakośaṃ siñcatā nṛpāṇam //
analyzed: droṇa āhāvam avatam aśma cakram aṃsatra kośam siñcata nṛpāṇam

original: RV_10,101.08a vrajaṃ kṛṇudhvaṃ sa hi vo nṛpāṇo varma sīvyadhvam bahulā pṛthūni /
analyzed: vrajam kṛṇudhvam sa hi vaḥ nṛpāṇaḥ varma sīvyadhvam bahulā pṛthūni

original: RV_10,101.08c puraḥ kṛṇudhvam āyasīr adhṛṣṭā mā vaḥ susroc camaso dṛṃhatā tam //
analyzed: puraḥ kṛṇudhvam āyasīḥ adhṛṣṭāḥ mā vaḥ susrot camasaḥ dṛṃhata tam

original: RV_10,101.09a ā vo dhiyaṃ yajñiyāṃ varta ūtaye devā devīṃ yajatāṃ yajñiyām iha /
analyzed: ā vaḥ dhiyam yajñiyām varte ūtaye devāḥ devīm yajatām yajñiyām iha

original: RV_10,101.09c sā no duhīyad yavaseva gatvī sahasradhārā payasā mahī gauḥ //
analyzed: sā naḥ duhīyat yavasā iva gatvī sahasra dhārā payasā mahī gauḥ

original: RV_10,101.10a ā tū ṣiñca harim īṃ dror upasthe vāśībhis takṣatāśmanmayībhiḥ /
analyzed: ā tu siñca harim īm droḥ upasthe vāśībhiḥ takṣata aśmanmayībhiḥ

original: RV_10,101.10c pari ṣvajadhvaṃ daśa kakṣyābhir ubhe dhurau prati vahniṃ yunakta //
analyzed: pari svajadhvam daśa kakṣyābhiḥ ubhe dhurau prati vahnim yunakta

original: RV_10,101.11a ubhe dhurau vahnir āpibdamāno 'ntar yoneva carati dvijāniḥ /
analyzed: ubhe dhurau vahniḥ āpibdamānaḥ ntar yonā iva carati dvi jāniḥ

original: RV_10,101.11c vanaspatiṃ vana āsthāpayadhvaṃ ni ṣū dadhidhvam akhananta utsam //
analyzed: vanaspatim vane āsthāpayadhvam ni su dadhidhvam a khanantaḥ utsam

original: RV_10,101.12a kapṛn naraḥ kapṛtham ud dadhātana codayata khudata vājasātaye /
analyzed: kapṛth naraḥ kapṛtham ud dadhātana codayata khudata vājasātaye

original: RV_10,101.12c niṣṭigryaḥ putram ā cyāvayotaya indraṃ sabādha iha somapītaye //
analyzed: niṣṭigryaḥ putram ā cyāvaya ūtaye indram sabādhaḥ iha soma pītaye

original: RV_10,102.01a pra te ratham mithūkṛtam indro 'vatu dhṛṣṇuyā /
analyzed: pra te ratham mithūkṛtam indraḥ vatu dhṛṣṇuyā

original: RV_10,102.01c asminn ājau puruhūta śravāyye dhanabhakṣeṣu no 'va //
analyzed: asmin ājau puruhūta śravāyye dhana bhakṣeṣu naḥ vaḥ

original: RV_10,102.02a ut sma vāto vahati vāso 'syā adhirathaṃ yad ajayat sahasram /
analyzed: ud sma vātaḥ vahati vāsaḥ syāḥ adhiratham yat ajayat sahasram

original: RV_10,102.02c rathīr abhūn mudgalānī gaviṣṭau bhare kṛtaṃ vy aced indrasenā //
analyzed: rathīḥ abhūt mudgalānī gaviṣṭau bhare kṛtam vi acet indrasenā

original: RV_10,102.03a antar yaccha jighāṃsato vajram indrābhidāsataḥ /
analyzed: antar yaccha jighāṃsataḥ vajram indra abhidāsataḥ

original: RV_10,102.03c dāsasya vā maghavann āryasya vā sanutar yavayā vadham //
analyzed: dāsasya vā maghavan āryasya vā sanutar yavaya vadham

original: RV_10,102.04a udno hradam apibaj jarhṛṣāṇaḥ kūṭaṃ sma tṛṃhad abhimātim eti /
analyzed: udnaḥ hradam apibat jarhṛṣāṇaḥ kūṭam sma tṛṃhat abhimātim eti

original: RV_10,102.04c pra muṣkabhāraḥ śrava icchamāno 'jiram bāhū abharat siṣāsan //
analyzed: pra muṣka bhāraḥ śravaḥ icchamānaḥ jiram bāhū abharat siṣāsan

original: RV_10,102.05a ny akrandayann upayanta enam amehayan vṛṣabham madhya ājeḥ /
analyzed: ni akrandayan upayantaḥ enam amehayan vṛṣabham madhye ājeḥ

original: RV_10,102.05c tena sūbharvaṃ śatavat sahasraṃ gavām mudgalaḥ pradhane jigāya //
analyzed: tena sūbharvam śatavat sahasram gavām mudgalaḥ pradhane jigāya

original: RV_10,102.06a kakardave vṛṣabho yukta āsīd avāvacīt sārathir asya keśī /
analyzed: kakardave vṛṣabhaḥ yuktaḥ āsīt avāvacīt sārathiḥ asya keśī

original: RV_10,102.06c dudher yuktasya dravataḥ sahānasa ṛcchanti ṣmā niṣpado mudgalānīm //
analyzed: dudheḥ yuktasya dravataḥ saha anase ṛcchanti sma niṣpadaḥ mudgalānīm

original: RV_10,102.07a uta pradhim ud ahann asya vidvān upāyunag vaṃsagam atra śikṣan /
analyzed: uta pradhim ud ahan asya vidvān upāyunak vaṃsagam atra śikṣan

original: RV_10,102.07c indra ud āvat patim aghnyānām araṃhata padyābhiḥ kakudmān //
analyzed: indraḥ ud āvat patim aghnyānām araṃhata padyābhiḥ kakudmān

original: RV_10,102.08a śunam aṣṭrāvy acarat kapardī varatrāyāṃ dārv ānahyamānaḥ /
analyzed: śunam aṣṭrāvī acarat kapardī varatrāyām dārū ānahyamānaḥ

original: RV_10,102.08c nṛmṇāni kṛṇvan bahave janāya gāḥ paspaśānas taviṣīr adhatta //
analyzed: nṛmṇāni kṛṇvan bahave janāya gāḥ paspaśānaḥ taviṣīḥ adhatta

original: RV_10,102.09a imaṃ tam paśya vṛṣabhasya yuñjaṃ kāṣṭhāyā madhye drughaṇaṃ śayānam /
analyzed: imam tam paśya vṛṣabhasya yuñjam kāṣṭhāyāḥ madhye drughaṇam śayānam

original: RV_10,102.09c yena jigāya śatavat sahasraṃ gavām mudgalaḥ pṛtanājyeṣu //
analyzed: yena jigāya śatavat sahasram gavām mudgalaḥ pṛtanājyeṣu

original: RV_10,102.10a āre aghā ko nv itthā dadarśa yaṃ yuñjanti tam v ā sthāpayanti /
analyzed: āre aghā kaḥ nu itthā dadarśa yam yuñjanti tam u ā sthāpayanti

original: RV_10,102.10c nāsmai tṛṇaṃ nodakam ā bharanty uttaro dhuro vahati pradediśat //
analyzed: na asmai tṛṇam na udakam ā bharanti uttaraḥ dhuraḥ vahati pradediśat

original: RV_10,102.11a parivṛkteva patividyam ānaṭ pīpyānā kūcakreṇeva siñcan /
analyzed: parivṛktā iva pati vidyam ānaṭ pīpyānā kūcakreṇa iva siñcan

original: RV_10,102.11c eṣaiṣyā cid rathyā jayema sumaṅgalaṃ sinavad astu sātam //
analyzed: eṣaiṣyā cit rathyā jayema su maṅgalam sinavat astu sātam

original: RV_10,102.12a tvaṃ viśvasya jagataś cakṣur indrāsi cakṣuṣaḥ /
analyzed: tvam viśvasya jagataḥ cakṣuḥ indra asi cakṣuṣaḥ

original: RV_10,102.12c vṛṣā yad ājiṃ vṛṣaṇā siṣāsasi codayan vadhriṇā yujā //
analyzed: vṛṣā yat ājim vṛṣaṇā siṣāsasi codayan vadhriṇā yujā

original: RV_10,103.01a āśuḥ śiśāno vṛṣabho na bhīmo ghanāghanaḥ kṣobhaṇaś carṣaṇīnām /
analyzed: āśuḥ śiśānaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ na bhīmaḥ ghanāghanaḥ kṣobhaṇaḥ carṣaṇīnām

original: RV_10,103.01c saṃkrandano 'nimiṣa ekavīraḥ śataṃ senā ajayat sākam indraḥ //
analyzed: saṃkrandanaḥ nimiṣaḥ eka vīraḥ śatam senāḥ ajayat sākam indraḥ

original: RV_10,103.02a saṃkrandanenānimiṣeṇa jiṣṇunā yutkāreṇa duścyavanena dhṛṣṇunā /
analyzed: saṃkrandanena animiṣeṇa jiṣṇunā yutkāreṇa duścyavanena dhṛṣṇunā

original: RV_10,103.02c tad indreṇa jayata tat sahadhvaṃ yudho nara iṣuhastena vṛṣṇā //
analyzed: tat indreṇa jayata tat sahadhvam yudhaḥ naraḥ iṣu hastena vṛṣṇā

original: RV_10,103.03a sa iṣuhastaiḥ sa niṣaṅgibhir vaśī saṃsraṣṭā sa yudha indro gaṇena /
analyzed: saḥ iṣu hastaiḥ sa niṣaṅgibhiḥ vaśī saṃsraṣṭā sa yudhaḥ indraḥ gaṇena

original: RV_10,103.03c saṃsṛṣṭajit somapā bāhuśardhy ugradhanvā pratihitābhir astā //
analyzed: saṃsṛṣṭa jit soma pāḥ bāhuśardhī ugra dhanvā pratihitābhiḥ astā

original: RV_10,103.04a bṛhaspate pari dīyā rathena rakṣohāmitrāṃ apabādhamānaḥ /
analyzed: bṛhaspate pari dīya rathena rakṣaḥ hā amitrān apabādhamānaḥ

original: RV_10,103.04c prabhañjan senāḥ pramṛṇo yudhā jayann asmākam edhy avitā rathānām //
analyzed: prabhañjan senāḥ pramṛṇaḥ yudhā jayan asmākam edhi avitā rathānām

original: RV_10,103.05a balavijñāya sthaviraḥ pravīraḥ sahasvān vājī sahamāna ugraḥ /
analyzed: sthaviraḥ pravīraḥ sahasvān vājī sahamānaḥ ugraḥ

original: RV_10,103.05c abhivīro abhisatvā sahojā jaitram indra ratham ā tiṣṭha govit //
analyzed: abhivīraḥ abhisatvā sahaḥ jāḥ jaitram indra ratham ā tiṣṭha go vid

original: RV_10,103.06a gotrabhidaṃ govidaṃ vajrabāhuṃ jayantam ajma pramṛṇantam ojasā /
analyzed: gotrabhidam go vidam vajra bāhum jayantam ajma pramṛṇantam ojasā

original: RV_10,103.06c imaṃ sajātā anu vīrayadhvam indraṃ sakhāyo anu saṃ rabhadhvam //
analyzed: imam sajātāḥ anu vīrayadhvam indram sakhāyaḥ anu sam rabhadhvam

original: RV_10,103.07a abhi gotrāṇi sahasā gāhamāno 'dayo vīraḥ śatamanyur indraḥ /
analyzed: abhi gotrāṇi sahasā gāhamānaḥ dayaḥ vīraḥ śata manyuḥ indraḥ

original: RV_10,103.07c duścyavanaḥ pṛtanāṣāḷ ayudhyo 'smākaṃ senā avatu pra yutsu //
analyzed: duścyavanaḥ pṛtanāṣāh ayudhyaḥ smākam senāḥ avatu pra yutsu

original: RV_10,103.08a indra āsāṃ netā bṛhaspatir dakṣiṇā yajñaḥ pura etu somaḥ /
analyzed: indraḥ āsām netā bṛhaspatiḥ dakṣiṇā yajñaḥ puras etu somaḥ

original: RV_10,103.08c devasenānām abhibhañjatīnāṃ jayantīnām maruto yantv agram //
analyzed: deva senānām abhibhañjatīnām jayantīnām marutaḥ yantu agram

original: RV_10,103.09a indrasya vṛṣṇo varuṇasya rājña ādityānām marutāṃ śardha ugram /
analyzed: indrasya vṛṣṇaḥ varuṇasya rājñaḥ ādityānām marutām śardhaḥ ugram

original: RV_10,103.09c mahāmanasām bhuvanacyavānāṃ ghoṣo devānāṃ jayatām ud asthāt //
analyzed: mahāmanasām bhuvanacyavānām ghoṣaḥ devānām jayatām ud asthāt

original: RV_10,103.10a ud dharṣaya maghavann āyudhāny ut satvanām māmakānām manāṃsi /
analyzed: ud dharṣaya maghavan āyudhāni ud satvanām māmakānām manāṃsi

original: RV_10,103.10c ud vṛtrahan vājināṃ vājināny ud rathānāṃ jayatāṃ yantu ghoṣāḥ //
analyzed: ud vṛtrahan vājinām vājināni ud rathānām jayatām yantu ghoṣāḥ

original: RV_10,103.11a asmākam indraḥ samṛteṣu dhvajeṣv asmākaṃ yā iṣavas tā jayantu /
analyzed: asmākam indraḥ samṛteṣu dhvajeṣu asmākam yāḥ iṣavaḥ tāḥ jayantu

original: RV_10,103.11c asmākaṃ vīrā uttare bhavantv asmāṃ u devā avatā haveṣu //
analyzed: asmākam vīrāḥ uttare bhavantu asmān u devāḥ avata haveṣu

original: RV_10,103.12a amīṣāṃ cittam pratilobhayantī gṛhāṇāṅgāny apve parehi /
analyzed: amīṣām cittam pratilobhayantī gṛhāṇa aṅgāni apve parehi

original: RV_10,103.12c abhi prehi nir daha hṛtsu śokair andhenāmitrās tamasā sacantām //
analyzed: abhi prehi niḥ daha hṛtsu śokaiḥ andhena amitrāḥ tamasā sacantām

original: RV_10,103.13a pretā jayatā nara indro vaḥ śarma yacchatu /
analyzed: pra ita jayata naraḥ indraḥ vaḥ śarma yacchatu

original: RV_10,103.13c ugrā vaḥ santu bāhavo 'nādhṛṣyā yathāsatha //
analyzed: ugrāḥ vaḥ santu bāhavaḥ na adhṛṣyāḥ yathā asatha

original: RV_10,104.01a asāvi somaḥ puruhūta tubhyaṃ haribhyāṃ yajñam upa yāhi tūyam /
analyzed: asāvi somaḥ puruhūta tubhyam haribhyām yajñam upa yāhi tūyam

original: RV_10,104.01c tubhyaṃ giro vipravīrā iyānā dadhanvira indra pibā sutasya //
analyzed: tubhyam giraḥ vipra vīrāḥ iyānāḥ dadhanvire indra piba sutasya

original: RV_10,104.02a apsu dhūtasya harivaḥ pibeha nṛbhiḥ sutasya jaṭharam pṛṇasva /
analyzed: apsu dhūtasya harivas piba iha nṛbhiḥ sutasya jaṭharam pṛṇasva

original: RV_10,104.02c mimikṣur yam adraya indra tubhyaṃ tebhir vardhasva madam ukthavāhaḥ //
analyzed: mimikṣuḥ yam adrayaḥ indra tubhyam tebhiḥ vardhasva madam uktha vāhaḥ

original: RV_10,104.03a progrām pītiṃ vṛṣṇa iyarmi satyām prayai sutasya haryaśva tubhyam /
analyzed: pra ugrām pītim vṛṣṇe iyarmi satyām prayai sutasya haryaśva tubhyam

original: RV_10,104.03c indra dhenābhir iha mādayasva dhībhir viśvābhiḥ śacyā gṛṇānaḥ //
analyzed: indra dhenābhiḥ iha mādayasva dhībhiḥ viśvābhiḥ śacyā gṛṇānaḥ

original: RV_10,104.04a ūtī śacīvas tava vīryeṇa vayo dadhānā uśija ṛtajñāḥ /
analyzed: ūtī śacīvas tava vīryeṇa vayaḥ dadhānāḥ uśijaḥ ṛta jñāḥ

original: RV_10,104.04c prajāvad indra manuṣo duroṇe tasthur gṛṇantaḥ sadhamādyāsaḥ //
analyzed: prajāvat indra manuṣaḥ duroṇe tasthuḥ gṛṇantaḥ sadhamādyāsaḥ

original: RV_10,104.05a praṇītibhiṣ ṭe haryaśva suṣṭoḥ suṣumnasya pururuco janāsaḥ /
analyzed: praṇītibhiḥ te hari aśva suṣṭoḥ suṣumnasya puru rucaḥ janāsaḥ

original: RV_10,104.05c maṃhiṣṭhām ūtiṃ vitire dadhānā stotāra indra tava sūnṛtābhiḥ //
analyzed: maṃhiṣṭhām ūtim vitire dadhānāḥ stotāraḥ indra tava sūnṛtābhiḥ

original: RV_10,104.06a upa brahmāṇi harivo haribhyāṃ somasya yāhi pītaye sutasya /
analyzed: upa brahmāṇi harivas haribhyām somasya yāhi pītaye sutasya

original: RV_10,104.06c indra tvā yajñaḥ kṣamamāṇam ānaḍ dāśvāṃ asy adhvarasya praketaḥ //
analyzed: indra tvā yajñaḥ kṣamamāṇam ānaṭ dāśvān asi adhvarasya praketaḥ

original: RV_10,104.07a sahasravājam abhimātiṣāhaṃ suteraṇam maghavānaṃ suvṛktim /
analyzed: sahasra vājam abhimātiṣāham suta īraṇam maghavānam suvṛktim

original: RV_10,104.07c upa bhūṣanti giro apratītam indraṃ namasyā jarituḥ pananta //
analyzed: upa bhūṣanti giraḥ apratītam indram namasyāḥ jarituḥ pananta

original: RV_10,104.08a saptāpo devīḥ suraṇā amṛktā yābhiḥ sindhum atara indra pūrbhit /
analyzed: sapta apaḥ devīḥ su raṇāḥ amṛktāḥ yābhiḥ sindhum ataraḥ indra pūḥ bhid

original: RV_10,104.08c navatiṃ srotyā nava ca sravantīr devebhyo gātum manuṣe ca vindaḥ //
analyzed: navatim srotyāḥ nava ca sravantīḥ devebhyaḥ gātum manuṣe ca vindaḥ

original: RV_10,104.09a apo mahīr abhiśaster amuñco 'jāgar āsv adhi deva ekaḥ /
analyzed: apaḥ mahīḥ abhiśasteḥ amuñcaḥ jāgar āsu adhi devaḥ ekaḥ

original: RV_10,104.09c indra yās tvaṃ vṛtratūrye cakartha tābhir viśvāyus tanvam pupuṣyāḥ //
analyzed: indra yāḥ tvam vṛtratūrye cakartha tābhiḥ viśvāyuḥ tanvam pupuṣyāḥ

original: RV_10,104.10a vīreṇyaḥ kratur indraḥ suśastir utāpi dhenā puruhūtam īṭṭe /
analyzed: vīreṇyaḥ kratuḥ indraḥ su śastiḥ uta api dhenā puruhūtam īṭṭe

original: RV_10,104.10c ārdayad vṛtram akṛṇod u lokaṃ sasāhe śakraḥ pṛtanā abhiṣṭiḥ //
analyzed: ārdayat vṛtram akṛṇot u lokam sasāhe śakraḥ pṛtanāḥ abhiṣṭiḥ

original: RV_10,104.11a śunaṃ huvema maghavānam indram asmin bhare nṛtamaṃ vājasātau /
analyzed: śunam huvema maghavānam indram asmin bhare nṛtamam vājasātau

original: RV_10,104.11c śṛṇvantam ugram ūtaye samatsu ghnantaṃ vṛtrāṇi saṃjitaṃ dhanānām //
analyzed: śṛṇvantam ugram ūtaye samatsu ghnantam vṛtrāṇi saṃjitam dhanānām

original: RV_10,105.01a kadā vaso stotraṃ haryata āva śmaśā rudhad vāḥ /
analyzed: kadā vasoḥ stotram haryataḥ āva śmaśā rudhat vāḥ

original: RV_10,105.01c dīrghaṃ sutaṃ vātāpyāya //
analyzed: dīrgham sutam vātāpyāya

original: RV_10,105.02a harī yasya suyujā vivratā ver arvantānu śepā /
analyzed: harī yasya su yujā vivratā veḥ arvantā anu śepā

original: RV_10,105.02c ubhā rajī na keśinā patir dan //
analyzed: ubhā rajī na keśinā patiḥ

original: RV_10,105.03a apa yor indraḥ pāpaja ā marto na śaśramāṇo bibhīvān /
analyzed: apa yoḥ indraḥ pāpa jaḥ ā martaḥ na śaśramāṇaḥ bibhīvān

original: RV_10,105.03c śubhe yad yuyuje taviṣīvān //
analyzed: śubhe yat yuyuje taviṣīvān

original: RV_10,105.04a sacāyor indraś carkṛṣa āṃ upānasaḥ saparyan /
analyzed: sacā ayoḥ indraḥ carkṛṣe ām upānasaḥ saparyan

original: RV_10,105.04c nadayor vivratayoḥ śūra indraḥ //
analyzed: nadayoḥ vivratayoḥ śūraḥ indraḥ

original: RV_10,105.05a adhi yas tasthau keśavantā vyacasvantā na puṣṭyai /
analyzed: adhi yaḥ tasthau keśavantā vyacasvantā na puṣṭyai

original: RV_10,105.05c vanoti śiprābhyāṃ śipriṇīvān //
analyzed: vanoti śiprābhyām śipriṇīvān

original: RV_10,105.06a prāstaud ṛṣvaujā ṛṣvebhis tatakṣa śūraḥ śavasā /
analyzed: prāstaut ṛṣva ojāḥ ṛṣvebhiḥ tatakṣa śūraḥ śavasā

original: RV_10,105.06c ṛbhur na kratubhir mātariśvā //
analyzed: ṛbhuḥ na kratubhiḥ mātariśvā

original: RV_10,105.07a vajraṃ yaś cakre suhanāya dasyave hirīmaśo hirīmān /
analyzed: vajram yaḥ cakre su hanāya dasyave hirīmaśaḥ hirīmān

original: RV_10,105.07c arutahanur adbhutaṃ na rajaḥ //
analyzed: a ruta hanuḥ adbhutam na rajaḥ

original: RV_10,105.08a ava no vṛjinā śiśīhy ṛcā vanemānṛcaḥ /
analyzed: ava naḥ vṛjinā śiśīhi ṛcā vanema anṛcaḥ

original: RV_10,105.08c nābrahmā yajña ṛdhag joṣati tve //
analyzed: na abrahmā yajñaḥ ṛdhak joṣati tve

original: RV_10,105.09a ūrdhvā yat te tretinī bhūd yajñasya dhūrṣu sadman /
analyzed: ūrdhvā yat te tretinī bhūt yajñasya dhūrṣu sadman

original: RV_10,105.09c sajūr nāvaṃ svayaśasaṃ sacāyoḥ //
analyzed: sajūs nāvam sva yaśasam sacā ayoḥ

original: RV_10,105.10a śriye te pṛśnir upasecanī bhūc chriye darvir arepāḥ /
analyzed: śriye te pṛśniḥ upasecanī bhūt śriye darviḥ arepāḥ

original: RV_10,105.10c yayā sve pātre siñcasa ut //
analyzed: yayā sve pātre siñcase ud

original: RV_10,105.11a śataṃ vā yad asurya prati tvā sumitra itthāstaud durmitra itthāstaut /
analyzed: śatam vā yat asurya prati tvā sumitraḥ itthā astaut durmitraḥ itthā astaut

original: RV_10,105.11c āvo yad dasyuhatye kutsaputram prāvo yad dasyuhatye kutsavatsam //
analyzed: āvaḥ yat dasyu hatye kutsa putram prāvaḥ yat dasyu hatye kutsa vatsam

original: RV_10,106.01a ubhā u nūnaṃ tad id arthayethe vi tanvāthe dhiyo vastrāpaseva /
analyzed: ubhau u nūnam tat id arthayethe vi tanvāthe dhiyaḥ vastrā apasā iva

original: RV_10,106.01c sadhrīcīnā yātave prem ajīgaḥ sudineva pṛkṣa ā taṃsayethe //
analyzed: sadhrīcīnā yātave pra īm ajīgaḥ su dinā iva pṛkṣaḥ ā taṃsayethe

original: RV_10,106.02a uṣṭāreva pharvareṣu śrayethe prāyogeva śvātryā śāsur ethaḥ /
analyzed: uṣṭārā iva pharvareṣu śrayethe prāyogā iva śvātryā śāsuḥ ethaḥ

original: RV_10,106.02c dūteva hi ṣṭho yaśasā janeṣu māpa sthātam mahiṣevāvapānāt //
analyzed: dūtā iva hi sthaḥ yaśasā janeṣu mā apa sthātam mahiṣā iva avapānāt

original: RV_10,106.03a sākaṃyujā śakunasyeva pakṣā paśveva citrā yajur ā gamiṣṭam /
analyzed: sākaṃyujā śakunasya iva pakṣā paśū eva citrā yajuḥ ā gamiṣṭam

original: RV_10,106.03c agnir iva devayor dīdivāṃsā parijmāneva yajathaḥ purutrā //
analyzed: agniḥ iva devayoḥ dīdivāṃsā parijmānā iva yajathaḥ purutrā

original: RV_10,106.04a āpī vo asme pitareva putrogreva rucā nṛpatīva turyai /
analyzed: āpī vaḥ asme pitarā iva putrā ugrā iva rucā nṛpatī iva turyai

original: RV_10,106.04c iryeva puṣṭyai kiraṇeva bhujyai śruṣṭīvāneva havam ā gamiṣṭam //
analyzed: iryā iva puṣṭyai kiraṇā iva bhujyai havam ā gamiṣṭam

original: RV_10,106.05a vaṃsageva pūṣaryā śimbātā mitreva ṛtā śatarā śātapantā /
analyzed: vaṃsagā iva pūṣaryā śimbātā mitrā iva ṛtā śatarā

original: RV_10,106.05c vājevoccā vayasā gharmyeṣṭhā meṣeveṣā saparyā purīṣā //
analyzed: vājā iva uccā vayasā gharmyeṣṭhā meṣā iva īṣā saparyā purīṣā

original: RV_10,106.06a sṛṇyeva jarbharī turpharītū naitośeva turpharī parpharīkā /
analyzed: sṛṇyā iva jarbharī naitośā iva turpharī parpharīkā

original: RV_10,106.06c udanyajeva jemanā maderū tā me jarāyv ajaram marāyu //
analyzed: udanya jā iva jemanā maderū tā me jarāyū ajaram marāyu

original: RV_10,106.07a pajreva carcaraṃ jāram marāyu kṣadmevārtheṣu tartarītha ugrā /
analyzed: carcaram jāram marāyu kṣadma iva artheṣu tartarītha ugrā

original: RV_10,106.07c ṛbhū nāpat kharamajrā kharajrur vāyur na parpharat kṣayad rayīṇām //
analyzed: ṛbhū kharamajrā kharajruḥ vāyuḥ na kṣayat rayīṇām

original: RV_10,106.08a gharmeva madhu jaṭhare sanerū bhagevitā turpharī phārivāram /
analyzed: gharmā iva madhu jaṭhare sanerū turpharī

original: RV_10,106.08c patareva cacarā candranirṇiṅ manaṛṅgā mananyā na jagmī //
analyzed: patarā iva cacarā candra nirṇij manaṛṅgā mananyā na jagmī

original: RV_10,106.09a bṛhanteva gambhareṣu pratiṣṭhām pādeva gādhaṃ tarate vidāthaḥ /
analyzed: bṛhantā iva gambhareṣu pratiṣṭhām pādā iva gādham tarate vidāthaḥ

original: RV_10,106.09c karṇeva śāsur anu hi smarātho 'ṃśeva no bhajataṃ citram apnaḥ //
analyzed: karṇā iva śāsuḥ anu hi smarātha u ṃśā iva naḥ bhajatam citram apnaḥ

original: RV_10,106.10a āraṅgareva madhv erayethe sāragheva gavi nīcīnabāre /
analyzed: āraṅgarā iva madhū erayethe sāraghā iva gavi nīcīna bāre

original: RV_10,106.10c kīnāreva svedam āsiṣvidānā kṣāmevorjā sūyavasāt sacethe //
analyzed: kīnārā iva svedam āsiṣvidānā kṣāmā iva ūrjā sū yavasāt sacethe

original: RV_10,106.11a ṛdhyāma stomaṃ sanuyāma vājam ā no mantraṃ sarathehopa yātam /
analyzed: ṛdhyāma stomam sanuyāma vājam ā naḥ mantram sa rathā iha upa yātam

original: RV_10,106.11c yaśo na pakvam madhu goṣv antar ā bhūtāṃśo aśvinoḥ kāmam aprāḥ //
analyzed: yaśaḥ na pakvam madhu goṣu antar ā bhūtāṃśaḥ aśvinoḥ kāmam aprāḥ

original: RV_10,107.01a āvir abhūn mahi māghonam eṣāṃ viśvaṃ jīvaṃ tamaso nir amoci /
analyzed: āvis abhūt mahi māghonam eṣām viśvam jīvam tamasaḥ niḥ amoci

original: RV_10,107.01c mahi jyotiḥ pitṛbhir dattam āgād uruḥ panthā dakṣiṇāyā adarśi //
analyzed: mahi jyotiḥ pitṛbhiḥ dattam āgāt uruḥ panthāḥ dakṣiṇāyāḥ adarśi

original: RV_10,107.02a uccā divi dakṣiṇāvanto asthur ye aśvadāḥ saha te sūryeṇa /
analyzed: uccā divi dakṣiṇāvantaḥ asthuḥ ye aśva dāḥ saha te sūryeṇa

original: RV_10,107.02c hiraṇyadā amṛtatvam bhajante vāsodāḥ soma pra tiranta āyuḥ //
analyzed: hiraṇya dāḥ amṛta tvam bhajante vāsaḥ dāḥ soma pra tirante āyuḥ

original: RV_10,107.03a daivī pūrtir dakṣiṇā devayajyā na kavāribhyo nahi te pṛṇanti /
analyzed: daivī pūrtiḥ dakṣiṇā deva yajyā na kavā aribhyaḥ nahi te pṛṇanti

original: RV_10,107.03c athā naraḥ prayatadakṣiṇāso 'vadyabhiyā bahavaḥ pṛṇanti //
analyzed: athā naraḥ prayata dakṣiṇāsaḥ vadya bhiyā bahavaḥ pṛṇanti

original: RV_10,107.04a śatadhāraṃ vāyum arkaṃ svarvidaṃ nṛcakṣasas te abhi cakṣate haviḥ /
analyzed: śata dhāram vāyum arkam svar vidam nṛ cakṣasaḥ te abhi cakṣate haviḥ

original: RV_10,107.04c ye pṛṇanti pra ca yacchanti saṃgame te dakṣiṇāṃ duhate saptamātaram //
analyzed: ye pṛṇanti pra ca yacchanti saṃgame te dakṣiṇām duhate sapta mātaram

original: RV_10,107.05a dakṣiṇāvān prathamo hūta eti dakṣiṇāvān grāmaṇīr agram eti /
analyzed: dakṣiṇāvān prathamaḥ hūtaḥ eti dakṣiṇāvān grāmaṇīḥ agram eti

original: RV_10,107.05c tam eva manye nṛpatiṃ janānāṃ yaḥ prathamo dakṣiṇām āvivāya //
analyzed: tam eva manye nṛpatim janānām yaḥ prathamaḥ dakṣiṇām āvivāya

original: RV_10,107.06a tam eva ṛṣiṃ tam u brahmāṇam āhur yajñanyaṃ sāmagām ukthaśāsam /
analyzed: tam eva ṛṣim tam u brahmāṇam āhuḥ yajñanyam sāma gām uktha śāsam

original: RV_10,107.06c sa śukrasya tanvo veda tisro yaḥ prathamo dakṣiṇayā rarādha //
analyzed: sa śukrasya tanvaḥ veda tisraḥ yaḥ prathamaḥ dakṣiṇayā rarādha

original: RV_10,107.07a dakṣiṇāśvaṃ dakṣiṇā gāṃ dadāti dakṣiṇā candram uta yad dhiraṇyam /
analyzed: dakṣiṇā aśvam dakṣiṇā gām dadāti dakṣiṇā candram uta yat hiraṇyam

original: RV_10,107.07c dakṣiṇānnaṃ vanute yo na ātmā dakṣiṇāṃ varma kṛṇute vijānan //
analyzed: dakṣiṇā annam vanute yaḥ naḥ ātmā dakṣiṇām varma kṛṇute vijānan

original: RV_10,107.08a na bhojā mamrur na nyartham īyur na riṣyanti na vyathante ha bhojāḥ /
analyzed: na bhojāḥ mamruḥ na nyartham īyuḥ na riṣyanti na vyathante ha bhojāḥ

original: RV_10,107.08c idaṃ yad viśvam bhuvanaṃ svaś caitat sarvaṃ dakṣiṇaibhyo dadāti //
analyzed: idam yat viśvam bhuvanam svar ca etat sarvam dakṣiṇā ebhyaḥ dadāti

original: RV_10,107.09a bhojā jigyuḥ surabhiṃ yonim agre bhojā jigyur vadhvaṃ yā suvāsāḥ /
analyzed: bhojāḥ jigyuḥ surabhim yonim agre bhojāḥ jigyuḥ vadhvam yā su vāsāḥ

original: RV_10,107.09c bhojā jigyur antaḥpeyaṃ surāyā bhojā jigyur ye ahūtāḥ prayanti //
analyzed: bhojāḥ jigyuḥ antaḥpeyam surāyāḥ bhojāḥ jigyuḥ ye a hūtāḥ prayanti

original: RV_10,107.10a bhojāyāśvaṃ sam mṛjanty āśum bhojāyāste kanyā śumbhamānā /
analyzed: bhojāya aśvam sam mṛjanti āśum bhojāya āste kanyā śumbhamānā

original: RV_10,107.10c bhojasyedam puṣkariṇīva veśma pariṣkṛtaṃ devamāneva citram //
analyzed: bhojasya idam puṣkariṇī iva veśma pariṣkṛtam deva mānā iva citram

original: RV_10,107.11a bhojam aśvāḥ suṣṭhuvāho vahanti suvṛd ratho vartate dakṣiṇāyāḥ /
analyzed: bhojam aśvāḥ suṣṭhuvāhaḥ vahanti suvṛt rathaḥ vartate dakṣiṇāyāḥ

original: RV_10,107.11c bhojaṃ devāso 'vatā bhareṣu bhojaḥ śatrūn samanīkeṣu jetā //
analyzed: bhojam devāsaḥ vata bhareṣu bhojaḥ śatrūn samanīkeṣu jetā

original: RV_10,108.01a kim icchantī saramā predam ānaḍ dūre hy adhvā jaguriḥ parācaiḥ /
analyzed: kim icchantī saramā pra idam ānaṭ dūre hi adhvā jaguriḥ parācais

original: RV_10,108.01c kāsmehitiḥ kā paritakmyāsīt kathaṃ rasāyā ataraḥ payāṃsi //
analyzed: kā asmehitiḥ kā paritakmyā āsīt katham rasāyāḥ ataraḥ payāṃsi

original: RV_10,108.02a indrasya dūtīr iṣitā carāmi maha icchantī paṇayo nidhīn vaḥ /
analyzed: indrasya dūtīḥ iṣitā carāmi mahaḥ icchantī paṇayaḥ nidhīn vaḥ

original: RV_10,108.02c atiṣkado bhiyasā tan na āvat tathā rasāyā ataram payāṃsi //
analyzed: atiṣkadaḥ bhiyasā tat naḥ āvat tathā rasāyāḥ ataram payāṃsi

original: RV_10,108.03a kīdṛṅṅ indraḥ sarame kā dṛśīkā yasyedaṃ dūtīr asaraḥ parākāt /
analyzed: kīdṛś indraḥ sarame kā dṛśīkā yasya idam dūtīḥ asaraḥ parākāt

original: RV_10,108.03c ā ca gacchān mitram enā dadhāmāthā gavāṃ gopatir no bhavāti //
analyzed: ā ca gacchāt mitram enā dadhāma athā gavām gopatiḥ naḥ bhavāti

original: RV_10,108.04a nāhaṃ taṃ veda dabhyaṃ dabhat sa yasyedaṃ dūtīr asaram parākāt /
analyzed: na aham tam veda dabhyam dabhat sa yasya idam dūtīḥ asaram parākāt

original: RV_10,108.04c na taṃ gūhanti sravato gabhīrā hatā indreṇa paṇayaḥ śayadhve //
analyzed: na tam gūhanti sravataḥ gabhīrāḥ hatāḥ indreṇa paṇayaḥ śayadhve

original: RV_10,108.05a imā gāvaḥ sarame yā aicchaḥ pari divo antān subhage patantī /
analyzed: imāḥ gāvaḥ sarame yāḥ aicchaḥ pari divaḥ antān subhage patantī

original: RV_10,108.05c kas ta enā ava sṛjād ayudhvy utāsmākam āyudhā santi tigmā //
analyzed: kaḥ te enāḥ ava sṛjāt a yudhvī uta asmākam āyudhā santi tigmā

original: RV_10,108.06a asenyā vaḥ paṇayo vacāṃsy aniṣavyās tanvaḥ santu pāpīḥ /
analyzed: asenyā vaḥ paṇayaḥ vacāṃsi aniṣavyāḥ tanvaḥ santu pāpīḥ

original: RV_10,108.06c adhṛṣṭo va etavā astu panthā bṛhaspatir va ubhayā na mṛḷāt //
analyzed: adhṛṣṭaḥ vaḥ etavai astu panthāḥ bṛhaspatiḥ vaḥ ubhayā na mṛḷāt

original: RV_10,108.07a ayaṃ nidhiḥ sarame adribudhno gobhir aśvebhir vasubhir nyṛṣṭaḥ /
analyzed: ayam nidhiḥ sarame adri budhnaḥ gobhiḥ aśvebhiḥ vasubhiḥ ni ṛṣṭaḥ

original: RV_10,108.07c rakṣanti tam paṇayo ye sugopā reku padam alakam ā jagantha //
analyzed: rakṣanti tam paṇayaḥ ye su gopāḥ reku padam alakam ā jagantha

original: RV_10,108.08a eha gamann ṛṣayaḥ somaśitā ayāsyo aṅgiraso navagvāḥ /
analyzed: ā iha gaman ṛṣayaḥ soma śitāḥ ayāsyaḥ aṅgirasaḥ navagvāḥ

original: RV_10,108.08c ta etam ūrvaṃ vi bhajanta gonām athaitad vacaḥ paṇayo vamann it //
analyzed: te etam ūrvam vi bhajanta gonām atha etat vacaḥ paṇayaḥ vaman id

original: RV_10,108.09a evā ca tvaṃ sarama ājagantha prabādhitā sahasā daivyena /
analyzed: evā ca tvam sarame ājagantha prabādhitā sahasā daivyena

original: RV_10,108.09c svasāraṃ tvā kṛṇavai mā punar gā apa te gavāṃ subhage bhajāma //
analyzed: svasāram tvā kṛṇavai mā punar gāḥ apa te gavām subhage bhajāma

original: RV_10,108.10a nāhaṃ veda bhrātṛtvaṃ no svasṛtvam indro vidur aṅgirasaś ca ghorāḥ /
analyzed: na aham veda bhrātṛ tvam no svasṛ tvam indraḥ viduḥ aṅgirasaḥ ca ghorāḥ

original: RV_10,108.10c gokāmā me acchadayan yad āyam apāta ita paṇayo varīyaḥ //
analyzed: go kāmāḥ me acchadayan yat āyam apa atas ita paṇayaḥ varīyaḥ

original: RV_10,108.11a dūram ita paṇayo varīya ud gāvo yantu minatīr ṛtena /
analyzed: dūram ita paṇayaḥ varīyaḥ ud gāvaḥ yantu minatīḥ ṛtena

original: RV_10,108.11c bṛhaspatir yā avindan nigūḷhāḥ somo grāvāṇa ṛṣayaś ca viprāḥ //
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ yāḥ avindat nigūḍhāḥ somaḥ grāvāṇaḥ ṛṣayaḥ ca viprāḥ

original: RV_10,109.01a te 'vadan prathamā brahmakilbiṣe 'kūpāraḥ salilo mātariśvā /
analyzed: te vadan prathamāḥ brahma kilbiṣe kūpāraḥ salilaḥ mātariśvā

original: RV_10,109.01c vīḷuharās tapa ugro mayobhūr āpo devīḥ prathamajā ṛtena //
analyzed: vīḍu harāḥ tapaḥ ugraḥ mayaḥ bhūḥ āpaḥ devīḥ prathama jāḥ ṛtena

original: RV_10,109.02a somo rājā prathamo brahmajāyām punaḥ prāyacchad ahṛṇīyamānaḥ /
analyzed: somaḥ rājā prathamaḥ brahma jāyām punar prāyacchat a hṛṇīyamānaḥ

original: RV_10,109.02c anvartitā varuṇo mitra āsīd agnir hotā hastagṛhyā nināya //
analyzed: anvartitā varuṇaḥ mitraḥ āsīt agniḥ hotā hasta gṛhya ā nināya

original: RV_10,109.03a hastenaiva grāhya ādhir asyā brahmajāyeyam iti ced avocan /
analyzed: hastena eva grāhyaḥ ādhiḥ asyāḥ brahma jāyā iyam iti ced avocan

original: RV_10,109.03c na dūtāya prahye tastha eṣā tathā rāṣṭraṃ gupitaṃ kṣatriyasya //
analyzed: na dūtāya prahye tasthe eṣā tathā rāṣṭram gupitam kṣatriyasya

original: RV_10,109.04a devā etasyām avadanta pūrve saptaṛṣayas tapase ye niṣeduḥ /
analyzed: devāḥ etasyām avadanta pūrve sapta ṛṣayaḥ tapase ye niṣeduḥ

original: RV_10,109.04c bhīmā jāyā brāhmaṇasyopanītā durdhāṃ dadhāti parame vyoman //
analyzed: bhīmā jāyā brāhmaṇasya upanītā durdhām dadhāti parame vyoman

original: RV_10,109.05a brahmacārī carati veviṣad viṣaḥ sa devānām bhavaty ekam aṅgam /
analyzed: brahmacārī carati veviṣat viṣaḥ sa devānām bhavati ekam aṅgam

original: RV_10,109.05c tena jāyām anv avindad bṛhaspatiḥ somena nītāṃ juhvaṃ na devāḥ //
analyzed: tena jāyām anu avindat bṛhaspatiḥ somena nītām juhvam na devāḥ

original: RV_10,109.06a punar vai devā adaduḥ punar manuṣyā uta /
analyzed: punar vai devāḥ adaduḥ punar manuṣyāḥ uta

original: RV_10,109.06c rājānaḥ satyaṃ kṛṇvānā brahmajāyām punar daduḥ //
analyzed: rājānaḥ satyam kṛṇvānāḥ brahma jāyām punar daduḥ

original: RV_10,109.07a punardāya brahmajāyāṃ kṛtvī devair nikilbiṣam /
analyzed: punar dāya brahma jāyām kṛtvī devaiḥ nikilbiṣam

original: RV_10,109.07c ūrjam pṛthivyā bhaktvāyorugāyam upāsate //
analyzed: ūrjam pṛthivyāḥ bhaktvāya urugāyam upāsate

original: RV_10,110.01a samiddho adya manuṣo duroṇe devo devān yajasi jātavedaḥ /
analyzed: samiddhaḥ adya manuṣaḥ duroṇe devaḥ devān yajasi jātavedaḥ

original: RV_10,110.01c ā ca vaha mitramahaś cikitvān tvaṃ dūtaḥ kavir asi pracetāḥ //
analyzed: ā ca vaha mitra mahas cikitvān tvam dūtaḥ kaviḥ asi pracetāḥ

original: RV_10,110.02a tanūnapāt patha ṛtasya yānān madhvā samañjan svadayā sujihva /
analyzed: tanūnapāt pathaḥ ṛtasya yānān madhvā samañjan svadaya sujihva

original: RV_10,110.02c manmāni dhībhir uta yajñam ṛndhan devatrā ca kṛṇuhy adhvaraṃ naḥ //
analyzed: manmāni dhībhiḥ uta yajñam ṛndhan devatrā ca kṛṇuhi adhvaram naḥ

original: RV_10,110.03a ājuhvāna īḍyo vandyaś cā yāhy agne vasubhiḥ sajoṣāḥ /
analyzed: ājuhvānaḥ īḍyaḥ vandyaḥ ca ā yāhi agne vasubhiḥ sajoṣāḥ

original: RV_10,110.03c tvaṃ devānām asi yahva hotā sa enān yakṣīṣito yajīyān //
analyzed: tvam devānām asi yahva hotā saḥ enān yakṣi iṣitaḥ yajīyān

original: RV_10,110.04a prācīnam barhiḥ pradiśā pṛthivyā vastor asyā vṛjyate agre ahnām /
analyzed: prācīnam barhiḥ pradiśā pṛthivyāḥ vastoḥ asyāḥ vṛjyate agre ahnām

original: RV_10,110.04c vy u prathate vitaraṃ varīyo devebhyo aditaye syonam //
analyzed: vi u prathate vitaram varīyaḥ devebhyaḥ aditaye syonam

original: RV_10,110.05a vyacasvatīr urviyā vi śrayantām patibhyo na janayaḥ śumbhamānāḥ /
analyzed: vyacasvatīḥ urviyā vi śrayantām patibhyaḥ na janayaḥ śumbhamānāḥ

original: RV_10,110.05c devīr dvāro bṛhatīr viśvaminvā devebhyo bhavata suprāyaṇāḥ //
analyzed: devīḥ dvāraḥ bṛhatīḥ viśvaminvāḥ devebhyaḥ bhavata su prāyaṇāḥ

original: RV_10,110.06a ā suṣvayantī yajate upāke uṣāsānaktā sadatāṃ ni yonau /
analyzed: ā yajate upāke uṣāsānaktā sadatām ni yonau

original: RV_10,110.06c divye yoṣaṇe bṛhatī surukme adhi śriyaṃ śukrapiśaṃ dadhāne //
analyzed: divye yoṣaṇe bṛhatī su rukme adhi śriyam śukrapiśam dadhāne

original: RV_10,110.07a daivyā hotārā prathamā suvācā mimānā yajñam manuṣo yajadhyai /
analyzed: daivyā hotārā prathamā su vācā mimānā yajñam manuṣaḥ yajadhyai

original: RV_10,110.07c pracodayantā vidatheṣu kārū prācīnaṃ jyotiḥ pradiśā diśantā //
analyzed: pracodayantā vidatheṣu kārū prācīnam jyotiḥ pradiśā diśantā

original: RV_10,110.08a ā no yajñam bhāratī tūyam etv iḷā manuṣvad iha cetayantī /
analyzed: ā naḥ yajñam bhāratī tūyam etu iḷā manuṣvat iha cetayantī

original: RV_10,110.08c tisro devīr barhir edaṃ syonaṃ sarasvatī svapasaḥ sadantu //
analyzed: tisraḥ devīḥ barhiḥ ā idam syonam sarasvatī su apasaḥ sadantu

original: RV_10,110.09a ya ime dyāvāpṛthivī janitrī rūpair apiṃśad bhuvanāni viśvā /
analyzed: yaḥ ime dyāvāpṛthivī janitrī rūpaiḥ apiṃśat bhuvanāni viśvā

original: RV_10,110.09c tam adya hotar iṣito yajīyān devaṃ tvaṣṭāram iha yakṣi vidvān //
analyzed: tam adya hotar iṣitaḥ yajīyān devam tvaṣṭāram iha yakṣi vidvān

original: RV_10,110.10a upāvasṛja tmanyā samañjan devānām pātha ṛtuthā havīṃṣi /
analyzed: upāvasṛja tmanyā samañjan devānām pāthaḥ ṛtuthā havīṃṣi

original: RV_10,110.10c vanaspatiḥ śamitā devo agniḥ svadantu havyam madhunā ghṛtena //
analyzed: vanaspatiḥ śamitā devaḥ agniḥ svadantu havyam madhunā ghṛtena

original: RV_10,110.11a sadyo jāto vy amimīta yajñam agnir devānām abhavat purogāḥ /
analyzed: sadyas jātaḥ vi amimīta yajñam agniḥ devānām abhavat purogāḥ

original: RV_10,110.11c asya hotuḥ pradiśy ṛtasya vāci svāhākṛtaṃ havir adantu devāḥ //
analyzed: asya hotuḥ pradiśi ṛtasya vāci svāhākṛtam haviḥ adantu devāḥ

original: RV_10,111.01a manīṣiṇaḥ pra bharadhvam manīṣāṃ yathā-yathā matayaḥ santi nṛṇām /
analyzed: manīṣiṇaḥ pra bharadhvam manīṣām yathā yathā matayaḥ santi nṛṇām

original: RV_10,111.01c indraṃ satyair erayāmā kṛtebhiḥ sa hi vīro girvaṇasyur vidānaḥ //
analyzed: indram satyaiḥ ā īrayāma kṛtebhiḥ sa hi vīraḥ girvaṇasyuḥ vidānaḥ

original: RV_10,111.02a ṛtasya hi sadaso dhītir adyaut saṃ gārṣṭeyo vṛṣabho gobhir ānaṭ /
analyzed: ṛtasya hi sadasaḥ dhītiḥ adyaut sam gārṣṭeyaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ gobhiḥ ānaṭ

original: RV_10,111.02c ud atiṣṭhat taviṣeṇā raveṇa mahānti cit saṃ vivyācā rajāṃsi //
analyzed: ud atiṣṭhat taviṣeṇa raveṇa mahānti cit sam vivyāca rajāṃsi

original: RV_10,111.03a indraḥ kila śrutyā asya veda sa hi jiṣṇuḥ pathikṛt sūryāya /
analyzed: indraḥ kila śrutyāḥ asya veda sa hi jiṣṇuḥ pathikṛt sūryāya

original: RV_10,111.03c ān menāṃ kṛṇvann acyuto bhuvad goḥ patir divaḥ sanajā apratītaḥ //
analyzed: āt menām kṛṇvan acyutaḥ bhuvat goḥ patiḥ divaḥ sana jāḥ apratītaḥ

original: RV_10,111.04a indro mahnā mahato arṇavasya vratāminād aṅgirobhir gṛṇānaḥ /
analyzed: indraḥ mahnā mahataḥ arṇavasya vratā amināt aṅgirobhiḥ gṛṇānaḥ

original: RV_10,111.04c purūṇi cin ni tatānā rajāṃsi dādhāra yo dharuṇaṃ satyatātā //
analyzed: purūṇi cit ni tatāna rajāṃsi dādhāra yaḥ dharuṇam satyatātā

original: RV_10,111.05a indro divaḥ pratimānam pṛthivyā viśvā veda savanā hanti śuṣṇam /
analyzed: indraḥ divaḥ pratimānam pṛthivyāḥ viśvā veda savanā hanti śuṣṇam

original: RV_10,111.05c mahīṃ cid dyām ātanot sūryeṇa cāskambha cit kambhanena skabhīyān //
analyzed: mahīm cit dyām ātanot sūryeṇa cāskambha cit kambhanena skabhīyān

original: RV_10,111.06a vajreṇa hi vṛtrahā vṛtram astar adevasya śūśuvānasya māyāḥ /
analyzed: vajreṇa hi vṛtrahā vṛtram astar adevasya śūśuvānasya māyāḥ

original: RV_10,111.06c vi dhṛṣṇo atra dhṛṣatā jaghanthāthābhavo maghavan bāhvojāḥ //
analyzed: vi dhṛṣṇaḥ atra dhṛṣatā jaghantha atha abhavaḥ maghavan bāhu ojāḥ

original: RV_10,111.07a sacanta yad uṣasaḥ sūryeṇa citrām asya ketavo rām avindan /
analyzed: sacanta yat uṣasaḥ sūryeṇa citrām asya ketavaḥ rām avindan

original: RV_10,111.07c ā yan nakṣatraṃ dadṛśe divo na punar yato nakir addhā nu veda //
analyzed: ā yat nakṣatram dadṛśe divaḥ na punar yataḥ nakir addhā nu veda

original: RV_10,111.08a dūraṃ kila prathamā jagmur āsām indrasya yāḥ prasave sasrur āpaḥ /
analyzed: dūram kila prathamāḥ jagmuḥ āsām indrasya yāḥ prasave sasruḥ āpaḥ

original: RV_10,111.08c kva svid agraṃ kva budhna āsām āpo madhyaṃ kva vo nūnam antaḥ //
analyzed: kva svid agram kva budhnaḥ āsām āpaḥ madhyam kva vaḥ nūnam antaḥ

original: RV_10,111.09a sṛjaḥ sindhūṃr ahinā jagrasānāṃ ād id etāḥ pra vivijre javena /
analyzed: sṛjaḥ sindhūṃr ahinā jagrasānām āt id etāḥ pra vivijre javena

original: RV_10,111.09c mumukṣamāṇā uta yā mumucre 'dhed etā na ramante nitiktāḥ //
analyzed: mumukṣamāṇāḥ uta yāḥ mumucre dhā id etāḥ na ramante nitiktāḥ

original: RV_10,111.10a sadhrīcīḥ sindhum uśatīr ivāyan sanāj jāra āritaḥ pūrbhid āsām /
analyzed: sadhrīcīḥ sindhum uśatīḥ iva āyan sanāt jāraḥ āritaḥ pūrbhid āsām

original: RV_10,111.10c astam ā te pārthivā vasūny asme jagmuḥ sūnṛtā indra pūrvīḥ //
analyzed: astam ā te pārthivā vasūni asme jagmuḥ sūnṛtāḥ indra pūrvīḥ

original: RV_10,112.01a indra piba pratikāmaṃ sutasya prātaḥsāvas tava hi pūrvapītiḥ /
analyzed: indra piba pratikāmam sutasya prātaḥsāvaḥ tava hi pūrva pītiḥ

original: RV_10,112.01c harṣasva hantave śūra śatrūn ukthebhiṣ ṭe vīryā pra bravāma //
analyzed: harṣasva hantave śūra śatrūn ukthebhiḥ te vīryā pra bravāma

original: RV_10,112.02a yas te ratho manaso javīyān endra tena somapeyāya yāhi /
analyzed: yaḥ te rathaḥ manasaḥ javīyān ā indra tena soma peyāya yāhi

original: RV_10,112.02c tūyam ā te harayaḥ pra dravantu yebhir yāsi vṛṣabhir mandamānaḥ //
analyzed: tūyam ā te harayaḥ pra dravantu yebhiḥ yāsi vṛṣabhiḥ mandamānaḥ

original: RV_10,112.03a haritvatā varcasā sūryasya śreṣṭhai rūpais tanvaṃ sparśayasva /
analyzed: haritvatā varcasā sūryasya śreṣṭhaiḥ rūpaiḥ tanvam sparśayasva

original: RV_10,112.03c asmābhir indra sakhibhir huvānaḥ sadhrīcīno mādayasvā niṣadya //
analyzed: asmābhiḥ indra sakhibhiḥ huvānaḥ sadhrīcīnaḥ mādayasva niṣadya

original: RV_10,112.04a yasya tyat te mahimānam madeṣv ime mahī rodasī nāviviktām /
analyzed: yasya tyad te mahimānam madeṣu ime mahī rodasī na aviviktām

original: RV_10,112.04c tad oka ā haribhir indra yuktaiḥ priyebhir yāhi priyam annam accha //
analyzed: tat okaḥ ā haribhiḥ indra yuktaiḥ priyebhiḥ yāhi priyam annam accha

original: RV_10,112.05a yasya śaśvat papivāṃ indra śatrūn anānukṛtyā raṇyā cakartha /
analyzed: yasya śaśvat papivān indra śatrūn anānukṛtyā raṇyā cakartha

original: RV_10,112.05c sa te purandhiṃ taviṣīm iyarti sa te madāya suta indra somaḥ //
analyzed: sa te purandhim taviṣīm iyarti sa te madāya sutaḥ indra somaḥ

original: RV_10,112.06a idaṃ te pātraṃ sanavittam indra pibā somam enā śatakrato /
analyzed: idam te pātram sanavittam indra piba somam enā śatakrato

original: RV_10,112.06c pūrṇa āhāvo madirasya madhvo yaṃ viśva id abhiharyanti devāḥ //
analyzed: pūrṇaḥ āhāvaḥ madirasya madhvaḥ yam viśve id abhiharyanti devāḥ

original: RV_10,112.07a vi hi tvām indra purudhā janāso hitaprayaso vṛṣabha hvayante /
analyzed: vi hi tvām indra purudhā janāsaḥ hita prayasaḥ vṛṣabha hvayante
